I would note that the Balboa Peninsula's influx of day visitors, at times heavy, makes it wonderful to have a pedestrian base of operations if you're a beach lover.  And it's a fine beach.  Everything in my room was in excellent condition, including the home-style water control for the shower.   Didn't have to worry about getting scalded.   Tile flooring in the entry/bath area was in immaculate condition, as was paint.  Bathroom wallpaper was possibly ever so slightly wrinkled, but I
Manager Response: David,  Thank you for writing such a thorough and wonderful review of your stay! It makes me smile to read that you thought our wallpaper might be hard to replace! It's such a perfect pattern, isn't it? I am happy that you got a chance to explore Newport Beach on foot from our hotel and that you enjoyed the hotel's amenities when you returned. Hope you'll come back for another stay in the future.

Summary: Decided to take a last minute trip to the beach. Its been along time at Newport. It just a wonderful place to go. Especially at this hotel. To the left is the bay and to the right is the beach. I just park my car the whole stay and walked. A lot of places to eat at walking distance.  They offer chairs, towels and bikes.  Best of all NO resort or parking fee. I will visit them again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We went out to Newport for a last minute trip and loved this hotel.  It is close to the beach and has everything you need to enjoy your time at the beach.  The breakfast is great and everything is very clean.  The staff was very helpful and kind.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We visit Newport quite often and just found out about Bay Shores. This will be the only place we will stay moving forward. DONNA is about the most wonderful staff member in the region. So helpful and went beyond to assist in whatever was needed. "Thank You" Donna!! Rooms are cozy, comfortable and breakfast beyond great.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Best location for vacation in Newport Beach
Summary: I have been staying at this hotel every year for a bout 5 years now. Never had a problem with this place. Everything is always amazing when I stay here. The location is PERFECT. The thing that stood out the most during our stay this year was the customer service. Donna was so pleasant and helpful when it came to everything. Let me say that again DONNA WAS AWESOME! She was so kind and welcoming, and she even helped my friend, who was staying in a separate room, secure an extra night on the 4th of July for a great rate! Can't wait to come back next year as I hope to see Donna again! Donna was the best hotel concierge I've have ever had the pleasure of meeting.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This charming boutique hotel has it all going on. From the minute you arrive you are greeted by warm, friendly staff members who make you feel at home, even down to a handwritten welcome note in your room.  The breakfasts are amazing, as are the afternoon cookies. Coffee and water always available as well are delicious fresh fruit.  Beach towels, chairs, toys, all available for free, as well as a wide selection of dvds for viewing.  The rooms are cozy and have everything you need to make your stay comfortable.   The location is perfect - situated halfway between the bay and the ocean, and near a variety of restaurants.  The best part of our regular stays at Bay Shores is the hotel staff who consistently go above and beyond to make the time special.  Particular shout outs to
Manager Response: Nicki,  I am so happy to read that you thoroughly enjoyed your stay. Thank you for the 5/5 review. It always makes me happy to hear that our staff create such a welcoming atmosphere for our guests. I hope you'll come stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Absolutely beautiful. Room was wonderful, bed was comfortable but what really made this stay perfect was the staff. HUGE shout outs to Donna and Brigitte! These 2 young ladies are phenomenal and one of the reasons I'll be a frequent resident. Thanks to Brigitte for saving my bestie's cell phone from the roof. Lol. Hugs! See you all soon!
Manager Response: Deb,  Thank you for your 5/5 review! It was wonderful to have you stay with us, and I'm so glad you found your stay to be comfortable. We would love to welcome you back for another stay.

Summary Heading: What a wonderful stay... Once again!
Summary: Dear Bay Shores Team, thank you for another wonderful stay at your hotel. There is a reason why you are the number one rated hotel in NB!   The actual Covid 19 situation forced us to stay a few more days in the area what is not so bad I guess? I visited this hotel about 8 or 9 years ago and there was absolutely no alternative for me than staying here again. Your lovely rooms, location, breakfast, free parking, sun deck, fresh cookies and most important your team was just another reason why we came back.   Warren and Donna are the most friendly and helpful people we met in hotels during the years. Absolutely outstanding service. No matter what we needed they were there to help us out and provided informations and help. The moment we walked though the door we felt welcomed. So it
Manager Response: Dominik,  Thank you for your wonderful shoutout. I don't know how this review wasn't responded to earlier this year, but I wanted to personally say thank you for your patronage and for taking the time to write such kind words! We look forward to welcoming you back in the future for another stay.

Summary: This is a small, but comfort hotel with close access to the beach and good restaurants. The staff is friendly and helpful. The breakfast is okay, but not outstanding. They have free chairs and items for the beach Wonderful view from the roof.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at Bay Shores. I'm happy to hear that you found our staff friendly and helpful, and that you made it up to the sundeck to enjoy the view! Hope you'll stay with us again in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: A charming small hotel with the friendliest staff.  Beautifully decorated and obviously cared for.  From fresh orchid in bathrooms to fresh cookies every afternoon, it is all perfect. We were a group of 10, the Suite was our headquarters. The upper deck our sunset spot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We've stayed at Bay Shores several times and always enjoy it. It's not a fancy place, but has everything you'd want in a B&B. The staff is always friendly and helpful. The rooms are very comfortable. The rooftop deck has beautiful views in every direction. And this February we very fortunate to have warm, sunny weather. SO great to pick up a towel and a chair and walk across the street to the beach! Hope we'll be able to return again and again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Such a charming hotel...love this place!
Summary: My hubby and I stayed here for 2 nights in Feb 2020...this has to be one if the most charming hotels I‚Äôve ever seen!   The rooms were very clean and had so much character...the rooftop deck has a beautiful view and would be a lovely place to enjoy breakfast.  The breakfast (included) was great! They offer breads, fresh baked croissants, muffins, cereal, fruit, boiled eggs, oatmeal ect. as well as breakfast sandwiches that you put in the microwave. While I didn‚Äôt try one of those, my hubby seemed to enjoy them.  In the afternoon we came back and found fresh baked cookies in the lobby as well as delicious spa water flavoured with different fruits like pineapple and strawberries.  They have a large collection of DVD‚Äôs that you can borrow for free if you want a quiet movie night in
Manager Response: Christina,  Thank you for taking the time to write us such a nice review. I am so happy that you got to enjoy all of the little extras that Bay Shores has to offer! The afternoon cookies are my favorite! Our staff is really wonderful, and I couldn't be happier that you found them to be genuine and friendly. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Great service and location. Clean, comfortable rooms.
Summary: The staff were incredibly friendly and helpful.  The hotel, located just one block from both the ocean and Newport Bay along with numerous places to eat and parks for the kids, is very clean and comfortable.  Having a large DVD library and beach toys makes it great for families.  The views from the rooftop deck are gorgeous and it is a great place to enjoy the included breakfast.  I would definitely stay there again if traveling to the Newport Beach area.
Manager Response: David,  Thank you for your 5/5 review! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you'll be back in the future!

Summary Heading: We loved it, just loved it!
Summary: The room was plenty fine, the bathroom too, the staff were extra nice, the breakfast was nothing fancy but very tasty, coffee and cookies 24/7 available and fine. No view because we were in the first floor but it was fine too, very close to the beach, parking was free and available. Convenient, friendly, clean, inexpensive laundry, instead of cable TV they have DVDs to rent, this time we needed this and it was such a great selection. So refreshing to be in a hotel without a chain name. Just super!!!
Manager Response: Melia,  I am so happy to hear that felt so relaxed and comfortable at Bay Shores.Thank you for such a great review! I hope you'll come back and stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Great helpful staff and fantastic views.
Summary: We spent a long weekend and had a great time.  The staff goes out of their way to be helpful.  The roof deck is a great place to spend a sunny breakfast, lunch or dinner.  The room was very clean.  Beach chairs and towels for use.  We'll be back.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving us such a great review. The rooftop sundeck is definitely a favorite! The views are unbeatable- I'm happy you took a meal upstairs to enjoy them! We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: I can‚Äôt say enough about the BEST experience at Bay Shores! FRIENDLY STAFF, CLEAN rooms, convenient to great restaurants and beach, and the smell of Fresh Baked cookies everyday!!! Thank you Bay Shores!!!
Manager Response: Karen,  I'm so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay so much. It is our joy have you, and our staff really does go out of their way to make you feel at home away from home. Please book another stay with us next time you're visiting!

Summary: We visited Dec 29- Jan 1 and have nothing but great things to say about Bay Shores.    The staff was super friendly from when we arrived- Donna welcomed us with a tour and suggestions for Newport, Reggie was nice and helpful as well.   It‚Äôs a hotel that pays attention to the little things- the fresh bagels at (free) breakfast from the bakery down the street, warm cookies in the afternoon, free movie rental and free popcorn. My girlfriend was also very happy with the shampoo/conditioner/makeup remover provided (crabtree and evelyn), and the room cleaning was very thorough (twice a day).   The location can‚Äôt be beaten. It‚Äôs steps from the beach. The rooftop deck has a beautiful view of the Bay and Beach. You don‚Äôt need a car, but it‚Äôs LA- it‚Äôs easier with a car, so good thing
Manager Response: Happy New Year, Blake! Thank you for your great review. We really do try to pay attention to the little things that make a guest's stay more enjoyable. I'm happy you had such a nice view from your room, and I'm always happy when guests make the little walk up to the rooftop deck! Hope you both stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: This is the most amazing hotel!
Summary: Just back from an annual visit to this hotel to see the Newport Beach Christmas Boat Parade viewed from the rooftop balcony!   What more can you ask for?  From start to finish you are treated like royalty by all.  A special shout out to Donna who checked us in and out and provided us with lots of good information for our stay.  She's more than amazing!  Thank you.  Can't wait to see all of you next year!
Manager Response: Debbie,  Happy New Year! We look forward to seeing you for the boat parade later this year as well! So glad you had a nice visit, and thank you for the wonderful review.

Summary: What a place. Stayed here for 2 nights last week. Room was only small but had everything. Even old school dvd player with vast library at reception. Alk the staff were reall friendly and thanks to donna who went out of her way on several occasions. Coffee and tea always available downstairs and even a little breakfast to keep you going. We met some really nice people here. Overall a great stay in wonderful newport
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! I loved hearing that you enjoyed the "old school" DVD player. It's definitely 2020 isn't it!? I'm so happy to hear that Donna was so warm and welcoming, and that you had a nice overall stay in Newport Beach.

Summary Heading: You couldn't ask for a more serene place in Newport Beach
Summary: Needed a 1 day break between 2 trips and this place was perfect.  The views from the rooftop terrace were tranquil; the ocean on one side and the bay on the other.  I was in the Stars & Stripes room and it was very comfortable.  Warren at the front desk was very welcoming and I even received a post card afterwards thanking me for my stay.  I will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: The rooftop deck is by far my favorite feature of the hotel! I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed the view and that you'll be back for another stay. Thank you for the great review.

Summary Heading: Perfect for Me! Friendly service, spotless, great location!
Summary: After a six hour drive due to fires around two major freeways , I walked in to be greeted by Bridget who checked me in and made sure I had everything I needed.   This is my third time staying here and I will always come back! You can‚Äôt beat the amenities, especially if you want to spend time on the beach. Towels and boogie boards are all provided!   I really like this place and you will too!
Manager Response: I am sorry to hear that you had that experience due to fires, but I am overjoyed that you found your refuge here with us at Bay Shores. We always look forward to welcoming you back, and I we hope to see you again in the future. Hope you had a great New Year!

Summary: Found this hotel on Booking.com and what a gem . Yes it‚Äôs an older building but it has so much charm and character. The staff are so friendly and helpful. Breakfast is a continental , lots of fresh fruit,cereals. Fresh fruit is put in your room daily. Beds are really comfortable. Location is fantastic just a road away from the beach. Five minute walk to the pier. Lots of choices of food. We stayed for 3 nights, would definitely return. The roof terrace gives you the most beautiful views.
Manager Response: Paula,  Sorry your review went without response! Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review. It was our joy to have you stay with us and we look forward to seeing you back in the future.

Summary: This is by far a great place to stay! We were very warmly and personally greeted by a wonderful, effervescent lady named Bridget. It was the kind of personal welcome that you would expect from one who has looked forward to meeting you for quite some time. She is filled to the brim with knowledge not only about the hotel and its great accommodations and extras (like beach towels, chairs & other stuff you can borrow from there), but also what there is to do in the area. Absolutely the most positive reception I've ever had in a hotel! Already 5 stars.  The room was wonderfully adorned with cozy furniture and artwork. It felt more like a studio apartment than a hotel room. And on the bed was a hand written welcome card (also from Bridget).  And a BIG bonus for me was...the windows
Manager Response: Thanks for such a wonderful detailed review. Sorry that it slipped through the holiday cracks and didn't get a response until now, but I wanted to personally thank you for staying with us as well. I hope you'll come back in the future for another visit.

Summary: Fantastic hotel with an even more fantastic staff!   Greeted by Warren with hot cookies.  Entire hotel is as advertised.  Donna was fantastic.... more cookies!!! Breakfast by Donna was fantastic...  hot croissants!!  Will always stay here when visiting Newport Beach!!  Oh, the rooftop is also fantastic!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Brought our family to Newport Beach for the 1st time. Booked the Bay Shore Peninsula Hotel due to it's great reviews. They weren't joking. This place is a home away from home. Very cute clean hotel with beachy vibes,outstanding customer service,  sun deck view to the gorgeous beach, the guy in the front who checked us in remembered my husband's name very polite (also the ladies in the front desk, super nice!!) and even told my husband about a space to park our big truck. Security cameras are everywhere and that is a plus!! They let us borrow beach chairs, boogie boards, an umbrella and toys for my little ones.  We had 2 beds 1 king and 1 queen and the suite was awesome.  Breakfast was  great and they have delicious cookies and hot cocoa and snacks!!! We didn't think the hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Absolutely fantastic experience in all regards.
Summary: I checked in a bit earlier than I should have, however the warm welcome and incredible hospitality i received from Donna when I checked in left a very warm and incredibly satisfying first impression of Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel! Upon check - in Donna invited me to park in the reserved parking spaces for hotel guests, which was AWESOME since parking can be difficult along the peninsula. Afterwards I was shown the kitchen, given a free breakfast, offered coffee, cookies, and even access to a completely complimentary DVD collection! This place rocks. Every staff member I encountered was full of life and so attentive to my needs. On top of the hotel there is a GREAT rooftop hangout, also introduced to me by Donna. I ended up spending hours up there, watching the sunset and enjoying
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 4 nights, as part of our 60th birthday celebration and holiday to Southern California and wow!! what a lovely hotel.  The staff we dealt with Donna, Jenny and Warren could not have been more helpful and welcoming. The hotel has a great location, a few minutes from the beach and bay. The cleanliness of the rooms was excellent. The Wi-Fi was fine, bedrooms, linen and bathrooms all good. The team assisted with hotel parking and they very helpfully provide free beach towels, sun loungers and umbrellas.  The value for money was excellent compared to other hotels we stayed in during our stay. The breakfast was adequate to get you started in the morning with coffee, cereal and plenty of fresh fruit. We stayed at 5 hotels in our 16 day visit, and this hotel
Manager Response: Jim,  I can't tell you what a pleasure it was to read your wonderfully detailed review. So sorry that it went without response until now-  it must have slipped through the holiday cracks! With that said, I am overjoyed that you enjoyed your 60th, and I hope you had a safe and happy holiday season. We would love to welcome you back to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Here is the good and the downside to this hotel.  The location is fantastic, located right across the street from the beach.  They also are located within walking distance to some great restaurants.  The hotel has a cool surfer/60s type of vibe, the staff is super friendly and the rooftop sitting area is awesome.  The downside to this property is the musty smell in the rooms, the small size of the rooms and the breakfast was primarily frozen Jimmy Dean sausage biscuits.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a detailed review. Our breakfast has always been a simple continental style breakfast, and the personality of our older beach vibes hotel definitely shines through at times. I hope you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary Heading: Quaint, clean, comforts small hotel close to the beach
Summary: We stayed here with our parents, one of which is on a wheelchair. Make sure to give that info at booking because they have a room that is designed with more room for this and you won‚Äôt have to squeeze into the antique elevator     The hotel is older/historic, quaint, has small rooms with clean but tight bathrooms and a mini fridge in the closet. The beds slept well and the furnishings clean and nice.   They have outside hotel doors with patio furniture by each room to sit and enjoy the evening. There is also a top 4th floor with open air table and chairs to go and get a view and enjoy a drink or snack.   The staff is wonderful, helpful and so friendly. The breakfast included with the room and was full of variety of items to satisfy us all.   Oh and bonus, they put out
Manager Response: Bailey,  Thanks for such a wonderful detailed review. Sorry that it slipped through the holiday cracks and didn't get a response until now, but I wanted to personally thank you for staying with us as well. I hope you'll come back in the future for another visit. Let us know how we can get that 5 stars!

Summary: Great location staff could not have been nicer or more accommodating we totally enjoyed our stay and look forward to returning. Just a short walk to the boardwalk and then longer walk to Balboa Island but we thoroughly enjoyed it
Manager Response: Thanks for the great review! Hope you had wonderful holidays and Happy New Year! We hope you'll stay with us again sometime.

Summary Heading: Classic beach hotel with personal touches
Summary: What a great stay!  I spent two nights here with my 11 year daughter for a  beach getaway and would love to come back.  I chose Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel because of the great reviews I read and I must say everything is true.  Coming from Chicago we loved the beachy feel and decorations and the amenities include thoughtful touches other hotels don't provide.  We had everything we needed for beach fun and the staff were so friendly and helpful in giving us recommendations.  I wondered if I would mind not being directly on the beach but it is adjacent to a lovely park with lighthouse and there is a beach on the bay one block in one direction and the ocean beach one block in the other direction.  We never needed a car. Really, really great classic beach hotel.  Thanks for the
Manager Response: Linda,  It was such a joy to hear that you came all the way from Chicago and that you enjoyed your beach getaway with us at Bay Shores. It is really nice to be nestled right between the beautiful bay and the beach and I'm so glad you got a chance to go to both and enjoy yourselves. We would love to welcome you both back for a future visit- maybe a family tradition in the making! Thank you for your review.

Summary: This hotel is safe, clean, comfortable, well maintained, conveniently located and staffed by some of the nicest people you will ever meet.  It also has free parking, continental breakfast and lots of beach toys to borrow for a great day of relaxation with the family.  I would definitely come back here again!
Manager Response: Laureen,  Thank you for your wonderful review. I'm so happy to hear that you were treated so nicely and offered a warm welcome. We really aim to make you feel at home away from home!

Summary: We grew up in the Newport area and after moving out of state visit the Newport area regularly to visit family and have family vacations. This is the first time we stayed at bay shores and believe me it won‚Äôt be the last! We have stayed at other boutique hotel and the ‚Äúbig ones‚Äù and this little gem was fantastic.  The rooms were quite roomy and clean. Everything  you could possibly need was available (chairs, boogie boards etc) the walking distance to beach and restaurants super easy. The entire staff was so helpful and friendly. I wish I knew all the names but Donna and Warren stuck out in my mind.  If there was a sixth star I‚Äôd have given it!
Manager Response: Wow! What a wonderful review. Thank you for taking the time to highlight Donna and Warren. They are exceptional members of the hotel family and I am so happy to hear that you were offered such a warm welcome from them both. I am also glad you got a chance to take out some of our beach equipment and enjoy the nearby restaurants. Hope to see you again in the future for another stay.

Summary: From the moment we checked in until we checked out, the property, room, staff, amenities and location were and are 5 Star.  We were informed of places to go, things to do and restaurants to dine.  Additionally, the property offered, as part of the stay, free gear for our beach excursions.  If you have the opportunity to stay here, do so.  You and your loved ones will not be disappointed.
Manager Response: Jason,  Thank you for leaving Bay Shores such a great review. I can't tell you how happy I am to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We always like to make recommendations of things to do, and go out of our way to make you feel at home while you're away from home. Hope to see you again in the future!

Summary: Newport Beach has beautiful beaches and great for body surfing, surfing, bike riding, walking. Bay Shores is located at 18th street which is the perfect location for the aforementioned. This was our second stay there. It's a close walk to the pier which has bike rentals food , tons of places, bars. Up the street is Jacks surf shop which has loads of beach gear.  We came back because the themed and nice rooms, laid back back style. Its a short walk to the beach and we kept our goodies in the refrig in the room.. strolled back for lunch. Nice places to site outside and on rooftop deck. Enjoy!
Manager Response: Carl,  It really does sound like you were able to relax during your stay with us. It is our ultimate goal for you to feel at home away from home and to explore all that Newport Beach has to offer while you're at Bay Shores. Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a great review. It was a pleasure welcoming you back for a second stay.

Summary Heading: Amazing front desk and old school great hospitality
Summary: Wow, there is a reason why this hotel is #1 in Newport Beach. Even though the exterior may look like an older hotel, my room was very clean and felt comfortable.  The front desk provides amazing service and a great conversation (Donna, you are awesome!) I also loved the little extras and guest customization that's hard to find these days, from the hand written card on the pillow with chocolates to the post card they send to your home address after you depart.  You start feeling like more than a guest, but more like a friend that they welcome back again in the future. Well done! I am so so glad I switched to this hotel at the last minute after first booking at the Balboa Bay Resort, where they charge a hefty valet parking fee on top of a ridiculous resort fee.  Bay Shores
Manager Response: Tammy,   Reading your review was such a pleasure. We really do want your stay to be enjoyable from start to finish! Thank you for taking the time to tell us how much you enjoyed all of the little details. Please don't hesitate to stay with us again in the future. We can't wait to welcome you back- like a friend!

Summary: Arrived and was given a warm welcome by Jenny who checked me in and then gave me a tour of the hotel and facilities. Allocated Room 208 on the side of the hotel and away from the main road. Room comfortable and well equiped. Personalised welcome note from the hotel. Ate far too many of the cookies and then hit the streets and the beach! Great base for the area and the beach. Lots of beach equipment and towels to hire. Desk staff full of local information and recommendations in terms of cycle hire, bars and restaurants. Sad to leave when the time came to Uber back to LAX.
Manager Response: Donald,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review! I am so happy to hear that you felt welcomed and comfortable. I hope you took some of that free beach equipment to relax in the sunshine on 18th St. beach. Make sure to come back and stay with us again soon!

Summary Heading: Traveling to Newport Beach for work
Summary: Having had a request from a client to travel from the Valley of the Sun to Newport Beach in order to design their window treatments, my husband and I jumped at the idea to at least feel the ocean breeze. In very close proximity to our job I discovered this charming hotel that has more of a feel of a B & B. All of the employees from the front desk to the maid service were extremely kind and helpful. The small kitchen area where the help yourself breakfast is layed out, is available for snacks (yogurt, fruit, cookies, coffee, tea, etc.) 24/7 and beach equipment is ready for the taking with no added fees.The room we stayed in was of normal hotel size and was clean and loaded with nice little surprises (fruit, DVD player,more cookies, etc.) When we return to complete our work there,
Manager Response: What a treat to read this review, and hear that you enjoyed your stay with us while you were in Newport Beach for work! We always try to make you feel relaxed and comfortable while you're here with us. See you next time! We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Some places just understand hospitality. This is definitely one of them
Summary: My wife and I decided to stay at Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel for an extended weekend trip while attending a wedding. We loved our stay here. The staff is extremely friendly and Warren greeted my wife and I warmly upon our arrival. We parked our car here and all except for the last night there was space at the hotel. The last night though Warrren was nice enough to keep the meter fed in a metered spot 2 steps away from the hotel. The hotel also has all these wonderful amenities that most hotels would charge you for or just don't have such as: continental breakfast, 3PM warm choco chip cookies, spa water (infused), free DVD rentals, free beach towel rentals, free beach chairs and beach toy rentals, etc... My wife and I threw on a movie at the end of most nights (took like 3 nights
Manager Response: Michael,  It's always such a joy to hear that our guests take full advantage of all of the amenities that our hotel has to offer. I am so happy to hear that you felt welcome, and comfortable in the rooms with the films and fresh baked cookies! Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a fantastic review.

Summary Heading: Like most other guests, only positive feedback
Summary: I had a great stay at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel.  The building looks like it is from the 50s, but the rooms are up to date and brightly decorated.  I was on the 2nd floor and there was a balcony with chairs outside of my room - which provided a perfect place to enjoy an afternoon beer or two.  Others were doing the same, which gave the property a social atmosphere.  I didn't have a car but hardly felt the need for one, as there was a cluster of restaurants and bars about five minutes away by foot.  The included breakfast was good.  Service was consistently excellent - attentive and very friendly.  I would return without hesitation.
Manager Response: Bill,  I'm so glad that you got a chance to kick your feet up and relax during your stay with us. The balcony, the beach air, and the atmosphere at Bay Shores really makes for a nice stay. Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a wonderful review. It's always our goal to treat you like family- we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Shhh...Don't Tell Everyone About This Place!!
Summary: Chose to stay at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel based on other TripAdvisor reviews and was not disappointed!!  Great location.  Easy walk across the street to the beach and several restaurants close by.  The staff is great, very friendly and helpful.  Room was clean and well kept.  Parking can be a bit of a challenge, but we were never without a spot and it's free with the room!!  Overall great stay, we will definitely visit again!
Manager Response: Douglas,  I would understand you not wanting to tell anyone about this place, but please do! I'm happy to hear that you had a really nice stay with us. I'm glad you explored the beach and nearby restaurants- there is so much to do in Newport Beach. We're looking forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: I decided to do an overnight with my grandson at this hotel. This will be our "go to" place when I can afford a beach getaway for now on.  I am from Sacramento. Perfect for us in all ways.  Older property,  rooms are smaller but 5 star experience.  Clean, wonderful staff, and kid friendly.  Location was perfect, which for us, was important. My only regret was that we couldn't stay more than one night.  It is rather pricey, but so are all the other beach hotels.
Manager Response: 5 star experience is what I like to hear! Thank you so much for your review. I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with you grandson. It sounds like a tradition in the making! We look forward to welcoming you back to stay with us again!

Summary: The staff was amazing!!! Everybody was nice and went out of their way to be helpful. The complimentary breakfast had lots of options to choose from. They had everything you needed for a day at the beach. The hotel is only a couple of blocks from the sand, and the Newport pier is in walking distance. It has the relaxed beach town feeling. The list goes on and on of how nice this hotel was. We will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Amy,  I really enjoyed reading your review. It is so nice to hear that you got a chance to walk to the beach, and explore Newport Pier. It is one of my favorite parts of being so close to the beach. Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review, and I really hope you'll be back again in the future.

Summary: Good job!  Booked for my Aunt and Uncle who said even though property is a little older it was a 5 star experience.  Furnishings are like a nice home rather than cookie cutter business.  Will use again in the future.
Manager Response: Lucinda,  I appreciate your great review. We really hope to make our guests feel at "home away from home". We would love to welcome your aunt and uncle back to Bay Shores in the future!

Summary: They provide chairs, beach towels, toys and an excellent daily breakfast.  There is turn-down service and unlimited freshly baked cookies. The owners are very helpful. Beach is across the street, and pier is walking distance.
Manager Response: Colleen,  Having the beach so close is such a wonderful feature of the hotel. I'm happy to hear that you took the chairs/ beach equipment out and that you enjoyed your stay overall. We'd love to welcome you back in the future for another stay!

Summary: Staff is very friendly and helpful.....   Quaint shore feeling... very well maintained, attention to little details.  Great complimentary breakfast, (more than a continental breakfast. ) Amazing view from the rooftop patio.   Great location.  Free parking which is a big plus in Newport Beach. Lots of complimentary beach stuff for use.....  Will definitely be back.....  Loved the fresh flowers on the breakfast tables!
Manager Response: Maureen,  I really appreciate that you took the time to leave us such a great review. I'm happy to hear that you will be back and  that you enjoyed all of the small details. We always want to make you feel at home during your stay.

Summary Heading: Best travel experience I've had in this $ bracket, bar none
Summary: Newport Beach, meh. Bay Shores? Wonderful.  Stayed here on a business trip and was absolutely thrilled. It feels like you fell through a wormhole with all the best parts of beach chic from days past.   One block away from the beach, amazing service and not a dang thing I would change. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: I'm so happy to hear that you were thrilled with your stay at Bay Shores, and that you you wouldn't change "a dang thing". We love to provide that kind of service. I hope you will stay with us again in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary Heading: Fantastic Gem - best value, superb customer service and amazing view of ocean
Summary: We found this place by random searching and we were so happy with our choice. I want to personally thank Ralph for all his help and tips and kindness. He made us feel like family, rather than just customers. Also Donna and Mark were just as friendly too. The hotel is clean, provides free parking , wifi and as well as free breakfast including some hot items too. I would not hesitate to stay here again . I can‚Äôt enough say We love this place
Manager Response: MKassapian,   We appreciate your wonderful review, and thank you so much for the 5/5! It's our goal to make you feel like family and I'm so happy to hear that Ralph, Donna, and Mark did that for you! We look forward to welcoming you back in the future for another stay.

Summary: Awesome gem in Newport Beach.  The best hotel staff I have encountered in all my years of traveling.  The rooms are small and quaint that very clean and well-stocked.  The best part is you can wake up in the morning and walk on the beach just a few steps away. This is my new favorite.
Manager Response: I'm so happy to hear that Bay Shores is "your new favorite". We're so happy to welcome you to the Bay Shores family! Come and stay with us again; we look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: This hotel was just our style, cozy with character. We felt right at home. Jenny, at the front desk, was a big help to us. She gave us the grand tour and let us know that my husband could store his fishing catch in the freezer over the weekend until we headed home on Sunday. There were so many things within walking distance. The itinerary for couples was very helpful too. We definitely would like to return with our family.
Manager Response: Kimberly,  Happy Anniversary! It sounds like you two had such a special time. I'm happy that Jenny made you feel right at home, and I look forward to you coming back to stay with us with the family.

Summary: I tool my wife to the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel for her birthday weekend.  From the time we got there until we left, the staff treated us like royalty.  The room was clean and was just the right size.  Had a nice view of the bay and everything was within walking distance.  Will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Robert,   I'm so glad that you were treated so well while you stayed with us. Our staff is just wonderful and I'm not surprised that they were so welcoming. Thank you so much for your great review. We look forward to your stay with us in the future.

Summary: We had never stayed here before, but as many others have done, we took a chance based on the reviews online and the pictures on the site.  The 2 $$ rating on one of the other sites had us a bit concerned because we have gotten burned by taking the chance in the past.  We are not complicated or demanding travelers. All we ask is that the place we are staying at be comfortably arranged, give us a good nice sleep, be clean and well kept, central to what we want to do in the area, staffed by "people" people, and reasonably priced. Another words, just live up to the advertising.  We were, and are so pleased with the Bay shores that we took a chance on this little gem, and we can't wait to go back.  The strongest plus is that the Hotel is so central that you really won't use your car
Manager Response: Ralph and Caroll,  This was such a pleasure to read. I couldn't be happier to hear that you enjoyed all that Bay Shores has to offer. The service is really where we hope to shine and to make you feel welcome, and like family. Thank you for taking the time to write us such a wonderful review! We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: Fantastic place!  Room was perfect (clean, nice comforts), breakfast was great, and staff was friendly (and most had been at this family-owned hotel for 15-20 years)!!  It is central to Newport Beach - between the Bay and the Beach, a few blocks from Newport pier.  We've already reserved our room for next year!
Manager Response: Jeff,  Thank you for leaving us these reviews. It was a pleasure to read twice that you'll be back next year. I'm not surprised that you had such a good experience with my staff- they really are a wonderful team and I'm lucky to have them, See you next year!

Summary: It is a great little B & B.  Breakfast was great, location was perfect and the extra touches were excellent...ie...free parking, chocolate milk, beach toys, location, warm cookies, great rooftop patio...we will return!
Manager Response: MarggeA,   It sounds like you had a great time with us and in Newport Beach. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future. Don't forget that right around this time every year there are also wonderful holiday festivities!

Summary Heading: There is almost no place like home...
Summary: If there are truly hidden gems, this is one. It may not be fancy, but the nicest folks work here and all the amenities you need are here. Very convenient to the ocean and the marina. Easy walking to great food and drink up the boardwalk. The view from my room could not be nicer.
Manager Response: Judim59,  Thanks for the great review! I'm glad you had an enjoyable stay with us and I'm always so happy to hear that you were treated well by my wonderful staff. Hope you'll come back and stay with us again in the future. Enjoy your holidays!

Summary: We stayed two nights at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel and we liked it a lot. The room was clean and spacious enough. Breakfast is okay and the rooftop terrace is a great place to hang out on  To be honest, this should probably have been an average hotel if it wasn't for two things that makes this place great... The location and it's staff. Warren is amazingly friendly and helpful, he alone is worth the extra mark in the rating.
Manager Response: Mentla,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review for my hotel! I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you received excellent service from Warren. I hope you had a wonderful holiday and that you'll come back and stay with us again in the future.

Summary: We came here on a two day get away and did our research and found this gem. The reviews are spot on with how amazing this place is! The front desk both (Warren and Ralph) were exceptional, friendly and so helpful! The place is immaculate and eveything we needed and then some! The location is prime, the roof top deck is amazing, beach is so close and bars and restauants all over! We rented bikes and had a blast! We are so thankful for finding this place and look forward to coming back!!! Thank you again Warren for all your help and kindness!!!! See you soon!
Manager Response: I'm happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you received excellent service from Warren and Ralph! They're both wonderful and I'm happy to hear that you were shown around and got a chance to enjoy the sundeck and the surrounding Newport Beach. I hope you'll come back and stay with us again sometime in the future! We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Although I didn¬¥t manage to see a lot of the area, I found it very nice and the beach is almost in sight of the hotel. The staff is very friendly and helpful. I had trouble with my GPS in the car, and they went very far in trying to solve the problem for me. Thank you for that. The rooms are very nice and clean and the atmosphere like a beach house. There are all kinds of water sport materials for free use, and you can even bring the towels to the beach. There is a sun deck, which I presume would feature a very nice sunset/down, but I didn¬¥t manage to see it during my stay because of work. Breakfast is good for American hotel with a variety of fresh goods, bread, cereals and stuff. The dining room is small and cosy and it encourages you to chat with the other guests, which I
Manager Response: Britta,   I'm so happy to hear that the staff at my hotel went the extra mile for you. I really see that time and time again with them and it makes the most difference in people's stay. I am so happy that they helped you with your GPS and took the time to welcome you to Newport Beach. I hope you'll come back again (for work, or for pleasure) and if you do we would look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: This is one of the small best independent hotels I've found in my 36 years in California. The facilities are all there-- buffet breakfast, coffee in room, all bath lotions, fee parking, free WiFi, free afternoon cookies in the lounge, and wonderful views of the harbour. Add to that a VERY friendly staff, all eager to help. They deserve to be #1 in Newport Beach, and in my view #1 getaway beach hotel in Southern California.  Love the surfer wallpaper in the bath!
Manager Response: Thomas,   What a great review! Thank you for staying with us and commenting on all of the things you enjoyed during your stay at Bay Shores. The surfer/vintage vibe is part of the charm of the place, isn't it? I'm happy to hear that my staff was kind and welcoming and we look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary Heading: The best Newport Beach small hotel
Summary: The staff was extremely helpful of all of our needs. I liked he roof top area. The rooms were well furnished and quiet. The hotel was within walking distance to the beach as well as the back bay. The staff went out of their way to assist you.
Manager Response: Ralph,    Thank you for taking the time to leave such kind words about my hotel. It sounds like my staff went out of their way to make you feel at home during your time with us. That's all I can ever hope for. I hope you'll chose to stay with us again in the future. We'd love to welcome you back.

Summary: We enjoyed our stay in Newport Beach.  Off-street parking and included continental breakfast help the budget.  The hotel staff were exceptional.  But there was too much street noise to justify 5 stars.  So bring your earplugs and enjoy!
Manager Response: Daniel,   I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Next time you book a stay with us, please don't hesitate to let my front desk staff know about this experience and we'll make sure to put you in a quieter room away from the main street. I'm glad my staff welcomed you and treated you well during your time with us!

Summary: If you want to feel like you are a guest in someone's home, this is the place for you. Cute country cottage guestrooms and a super helpful and friendly staff. I lost my hotel and luggage keys while out, and called the front desk and they immediately went to my room and changed the keys for me and then cut the luggage lock when I returned. Beautiful roof top with an ocean and back bay view. Walk across the street to the beach. Also walking distance to the Newport Beach pier and many restaurants and activity rentals. Hot cookies every afternoon and a good breakfast. Was here for business and will return when I am back in the area.
Manager Response: Jet,   It sounds like you had quite the stay! Sorry you lost your keys but I'm definitely glad my staff was able to help you out with your luggage. Next time you're in the area for business or pleasure we'd love to welcome you back!

Summary Heading: Bums Rush - Never had a hotel call me to checkout at 10:30
Summary: Warren at the front desk called me at 10:30 (didn't answer), then again ten minutes later to see if I was going to be checking out on time at 11:00. The guy had literally saw/spoken to me at 10 when I ate breakfast. He said sometimes people fall asleep or don't remember to check out on time....really? Baring this experience, I would have given the hotel a strong 4 because the rooms were super cute/clean. The location is ideal and the other staff were completely friendly. I don't know if its the hotels policy to give their patrons the bums rush, but I wont stay there when I have to come back next month.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  I agree with you.  Those early calls will no longer a policy at my hotel.  Thank you for your other kind comments, I'm gald you otherwise enjoyed the hotel and had a nice stay.  Fred Pratt, Owner

Summary Heading: Stay Here & You Will NOT Wanna Leave!
Summary: Location, amenities, AMAZING staff, cleanliness, roof top deck, the list goes on and on.  This place is a gem.  First time in Newport Beach.  Everything you want for a vacation is literally steps away.  Ownership has thought of everything to make a stay special.  We will be back sooner than later - hopefully.
Manager Response: I can't believe that such a wonderful review slipped through without a response! Thank you for such a wonderful review of my hotel. I am so happy to hear that you had a great first trip to Newport Beach. We look forward to your stay with us in the future!

Summary: Besides the perfect location in Newport Beach, what you'll also notice most is the awesome service from the very friendly and helpful staff.  We stayed in the Bay Suite which was fantastic for the 3 of us on our weekend getaway. This isn't the Ritz, but very clean and comfortable with complimentary amenities like fresh baked cookies in the afternoon, breakfast in the morning, and everything you need for a day at the beach (towels, chairs, umbrellas, and boogie boards.)  Walk a block to the beach, and just a couple more to the pier, shops, great restaurants, and bike rentals (we rode bikes to Balboa and took the ferry to Balboa Island---so fun!)  I can't recommend Bay Shores highly enough!
Manager Response: Karen,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us such a great review! Sorry I'm just now getting back to you. I'm glad you had such a great stay. It sounds like you got to explore all around Balboa Island and the beach! I'm glad you appreciated our quaint hotel and relaxed vintage vibes. We'd love to have you back to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: This was a great place to stay right across the street from Newport Beach.  Walkable from hotel.  Staff and amenities are excellent.  I had the suite with a couple of friends.  We really enjoyed it, although didn't user the kitchen.  If I book the suite again I would definitely plan to cook.  Have planned to go again next week, but a regular room, not a suite!
Manager Response: Patricia,  I'm just now seeing this review. You may have already stayed with us again, but I wanted to make sure I said thank you for leaving us such a great review!

Summary: This is exactly what an older hotel should be - clean, refurbished, charming, and comfortable! Staff Ralph and Donna welcomed us like we were family, and made sure we knew where to find the beach stuff (towels, chairs, toys, ice) available for guests to use. The rooftop lounge is great! Tables, chairs, loungers, and unbeatable view. Ralph made sure that we knew we were welcome to take a bottle of wine up to enjoy the sunset and that our friends (residents we were there to visit) were welcome, too. We were also welcome to use the dining room when we ordered our pizza. Our friends will have their visiting family stay there. Location is terrific - one block from beautiful beach, with restaurants, park, and shopping nearby. Post-stay follow up was in the form of an email from the
Manager Response: J Summer W,   It sounds like you got great follow-up about your stay already but I wanted to personally say thank you for taking the time to leave us such a nice review.   I am so happy that you were welcomed to use the dining room and the sundeck for your pizza and entertaining! That's what vacations are all about! We appreciate that you encouraged your friends to stay at Bay Shores and we hope that you'll come back and stay with us again in the future as well.

Summary Heading: Great Location, Cozy, Clean and Friendly
Summary: Perfect spot with access to the bay and ocean.  Walking distance to many restaurants.  Staff was very friendly.  Rooms were small but very clean and comfortable.  Great breakfast.  Don't miss the rooftop deck for incredible views of the water and sunset.
Manager Response: Josh,   The rooftop deck is what it's all about, isn't it? Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us some kind words and for giving us a great rating and review. We really hope you'll come back and stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Our visit to Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel was memorable and fun. The staff was incredibly attentive, and it felt more like a bed and breakfast because we were treated so well. We will definitely return again!
Manager Response: Michael,   I'm sorry your review somehow slipped through and I didn't get a chance to say thank you so much for the 5/5 and for the great, short, perfect review of what we're all about at Bay Shores. We love to make you feel at home away from home and we would look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: This quaint old hotel is situated on the Balboa peninsula just one block from the beach. Walking distance to the beach Less than 5 minutes, to Newport Beach Pier with restaurants and shops 10 minutes. The main road that runs right by the front of the Hotel was noisy throughout the day and night, so we had to keep our windows closed the entire time. Balconies run the length of the building in the back, towards the parking lot and are furnished with tables and chairs, many guests have their breakfast here. Breakfast is mostly packaged. Furniture is charming, the atmosphere very nice, the elevator antique and slow. Staff at reception was friendly and helpful, and gave good recommendations for restaurants and places to see. A room to the side street might be quieter.
Manager Response: Chopstickmama,   Sorry I somehow missed your review of my hotel! I always like to say thank you for taking the time to leave some kind words. It's so nice to read that you enjoyed your stay and that you got a chance to explore the surrounding area. Next time you stay with us, be sure to mention a room preference like that and we will be sure to accommodate!   Thanks again. We look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: Great little hotel with the friendliest staff in the world.  Very clean and nicely decorated.  I was expecting much less for the price but I was pleasantly surprised.  Parking is a little hectic but it's worth the trouble.  Great views from the roof.
Manager Response: I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay. The relaxed surf-inspired vibes at Bay Shores and our great staff really make for a great stay. I'm happy you got the chance to experience it. We would love to welcome you back in the future.

Summary Heading: Beach and surfing decor is fantastic
Summary: Second time in 2 years staying at the Bay Shore Inn on the Balboa Peninsula.  Great fun hotel with excellent staff, breakfast and great beach access.  Room are nicely decorated, very clean with fresh flowers and fruit provided daily.  Highly recommend the Bay Shore Inn!
Manager Response: Arno, I'm happy to hear you made it back for another stay! Thanks for the great review.

Summary: From the first time you enter this delicious hotel with cookies smell you feel in a magic place. Perfect position between the ocean and the laguna, a lovely terrace, an excellent breakfast and the very nice Warren. Simply go there Raffaella, Italy
Manager Response: Raffaella,  Thank you for choosing Bay Shores on your holiday. I'm happy you received such a warm welcome from our staff and that you enjoyed all that our hotel has to offer. I hope you'll come back again next time you come to California!

Summary: If you're looking for contemporary, upscale, trendy ... this is not the hotel for you. Quaint, excellent location, comfortable, nice views from rooftop deck, lots of breakfast options, super friendly staff. Thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Wouldn't hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Teresa,  Thanks for the great review. We're really more of a laid back, relaxed hotel with vintage vibes... and it seem like you picked up on that perfectly! I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay.

Summary Heading: A short walk across the street to the beach with lots of amenities
Summary: Donna was our first impression - and she was terrific!  She checked us in, escorted us around the property to get a lay of the land, and took us to our room to be sure we liked it.  She was very friendly, open and kind.  We were surprised to see how many amenities were included.  We parked at the hotel for free, and didn't have to more our car for the full stay.  If we would have had to move it, the hotel would have paid for parking.  This is a rarity among the hotels I was looking at in Newport Beach!!  They supplied our beach chairs, umbrellas, towels and boogie boards at no charge.  The shampoo, conditioner, soap, shower cap and lotion were replaced every day.  Do you know how often in the high price resorts we have to hunt down the maid service to get those simple items
Manager Response: What a thorough review! I can't believe that this somehow slipped by without a response. I'm so happy you had such a wonderful stay and that all of the smaller amenities made such a difference in your enjoyment of my hotel. You will always be welcomed back like family. Our staff really is happy to see repeat guests and will always make you feel comfortable and welcome.

Summary: Really enjoyed our 3 nights in July, excellent location, room and breakfast. Highly recommended and will certainly visit again if ever back in Newport Beach. Limited parking available but didn't cause us  problem during out short stay.
Manager Response: AshT,   Thanks for the 5/5 review, If you ever come back to Newport Beach, we'd love to have you back to stay with us again.

Summary: Not on the beach, but only a block away. The rooms were just a typical hotel room, but they were clean, quiet and the bed was comfy.  Newport Beach is very pretty and the sunsets were amazing! The hotel supplies all the stuff you'll need for a fun day at the beach, including towels. Parking can be a bit of a pain, but we were able to deal with it. There's really no need for a car there as everything is within walking distance of the hotel. We would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Steve,  I'm glad you'll stay with us again in the future. It is really nice to be able to take advantage of a place without a car, isn't it? Thank you for the great review.

Summary: When we were booking accommodation for Newport Beach, the wonderful reviews swayed us to make the booking. From the pictures, it looked quite old fashioned and I was a little dubious to be honest. However, I have to admit, this place is fabulous! Upon arrival, the staff couldn't do anymore to welcome us and make us feel right at home. The location is spot on.... a stones throw from the inland waterway and from the beach, and a short walk to the bars and restaurants. The room was comfortable and spotlessly clean. The breakfast offered everything from cereals, pastries, fruit, bread and bagels, hard boiled eggs and even the option of a breakfast bun which can be heated in the microwave.  The hotel had a wide selection of beach equipment and DVDs which we could borrow. The free
Manager Response: Jan,  What a stellar review. I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us!

Summary: Honestly, I hate to give this place a good review because it's such a hidden gem. But I must give them their due. It's an excellent place to stay. The staff is amazing (and I do not exaggerate).  Super helpful and friendly. The rooms were really clean. I don't know how they do that being across from the beach. But they do. The bed and bedding are comfortable and it is quiet. YOU CANNOT GET A BETTER LOCATION.  Everything is walkable. The beach. The marine park with kayaking and sailing rentals. A playground and park. A harbor beach if you have young kids. The boardwalk with easy bike rentals. Lots of great restaurants.  Plus, they supply everything you need for a great beach day. Boogie boards, umbrellas, chairs, towels. They even have an outdoor hose to rinse off your feet at
Manager Response: Alice,  I'm glad you broke your silence and left us such a wonderful review! (Can we quote you in our newsletter!?)  It sounds like you really took advantage of everything that Bay Shores and its location has to offer. The cookies really do seal the deal, don't they? Thanks again, and we look forward to your next stay with us.

Summary: Bay Shores has everything you need to thoroughly enjoy Newport area! Nicely decorated rooms, comfortable beds, beach chairs, boogie boards, umbrellas, free movies, a continental breakfast, fresh fruit in your room, a sundeck with amazing views, freshly baked cookies each afternoon, personable staff, and our favorite location on the peninsula! You are 2 blocks from Newport Pier & a quick bike ride or longer walk to Balboa Pier. You are steps from the calm waters of the marina & a block from the beautiful sand beach!  We absolutely love this place because they take every effort to make this feel like home. We look forward to our return again next year.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a great review! I'm glad you really enjoyed all the little things that sets Bay Shores apart. We look forward to welcoming you back, and we're happy you felt at home away from home.

Summary: This was our 4th stay in 5 years. We love staying here.. location, clean, friendly employees, and good amenities. We were very disappointed when we realized our room didn‚Äôt have a refrigerator. The rooms are advertised with mini-refrigerators and we have always had one in our previous stays. When I questioned this I was told that all but two rooms have a refrigerator. We were offered to put things in their refrigerator or a foam cooler. So if you need a refrigerator for your stay make sure you confirm the room you are getting has one. Other than that we enjoyed our stay. The location is perfect and they are always friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: If you've stayed here 4 times in 5 years, you guys are now officially part of the Bay Shores family! Thanks so much for staying with us at our little beach hotel. We're happy to welcome you back every year you come to stay!

Summary: I have been coming to Newport for years, always rented a home.  The past few years have rented hotels as can't stay a full week anymore. This was our first stay and loved the place and the employees!  Everything was great! Location is walking distance to lifeguard 17-18 beach side. A restaurant within walking distance.  They even have limited on site parking.  Will continue to stay here over renting a house (the kids can do that now!), we will choose the peace and quiet.
Manager Response: Anne,  I'm glad staying at Bay Shores has become a new tradition for you. We're so happy that you enjoyed everything Bay Shores has to offer. We definitely look forward to welcoming you back. Thanks for the great review!

Summary: This is such a sweet, cute hotel which I have somehow managed to not notice in all my many trips to the beach! From the second we walked in and were greeted by the very friendly concierge, to the second we left, we felt pampered and spoiled staying so close to the beach at such a reasonable price! We had a corner room with a view of the Blvd and ocean from one window, and the bay out the other window. The bed was comfy, pillows fluffy, and the bedspread felt fresh and clean. Warren (the concierge) asked me where I parked and made sure that I downloaded the app on my phone to pay my minimal parking fee to the city. He showed us around, pointing out the pool, the little kitchen with fresh fruit and freshly baked lemon cookies, and the rooftop terrace with a killer nighttime view.
Manager Response: Susan,  I'm glad Bay Shores was able to make you feel so spoiled! We can't wait to have you back for another stay.

Summary Heading: A little gem, without a doubt
Summary: As a start, it‚Äôs important to clarify one thing: This is no high-end resort of upscale trendy hotel. This is a laid-back, old-school beach hotel. If you have the right expectations, you won't be disappointed. As many people pointed out, the staff here is great. I had the chance to interact with Warren, Donna and may others, all friendly and helpful. The king size room we had was decent sized, and much better looking than what the Booking .com pictures are showing (it should be updated!). They are super clear and there is some great bathroom amenities. The bed was also very comfortable. We were not facing the main street, but the smaller "18th street". I am not sure if facing would have changed a lot the noise level in the room, but the one I had was quiet enough for me (and I'm
Manager Response: Olbernatchez,  I'm glad you took the time to write such a great review. You hit the nail on the head with "laid back, old-school beach hotel". We are so happy you enjoyed exactly what we are and that you had such a relaxed comfortable stay. The location is great and I'm happy to hear you were able to take your little one to the beach and to the park. Hope you'll stay with us again. We'd love to have you back.

Summary: I stayed at this quaint beautiful hotel in June. I didn't know a whole lot about Newport Beach as it was my first visit! A gentleman by the name of Warren at the front desk was just a delight to talk to! He gave us a plethora of information where to go what to see past history and current events! I loved sitting on the top of the building and looking out at all the beautiful scenery! Next time I go to Newport Beach, I will stay there again!
Manager Response: Tigerrose7,  I can't believe your great review slipped through the cracks without a response. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. The views from the sundeck are spectacular, aren't they? I hope you'll stay with us again in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: We really enjoyed our brief stay here. Nice room, friendly service, beach towels, boogie boards and umbrellas. And free chocolate chip cookies in the lobby! I'm writing the rest of this to fill out TripAdvisor's 200-character minimum for reviews. TripAdvisor, sometimes less is more ; )
Manager Response: Sunsetblvd,   Sometimes less IS more! Your short review was just fine. Thank you for taking the time to leave kind words about Bay Shores. I'm so happy you enjoyed your stay.

Summary: We could not have been more pleased with our stay! We found it just driving by and they still had one room left. The staff was incredibly nice to us, the room was perfect, and they supplied our every need for the beach free of charge. Even offer a free breakfast. To top it all off, my husband accidentally left his wallet in our room and when we called to ask about it, they checked the room, found it, and returned it to us even with a few hundred dollars of cash inside. Thank you!!! We will be back!
Manager Response: beeplumber,   Our staff is so wonderful, and I'm happy to hear you were treated with such care during your stay at Bay Shores. All that beach equipment is really nice to have when you're walking distance to the beach, isn't it? I hope you enjoyed the rest of your time in Newport Beach. (Such luck that your wallet was found as well!)

Summary Heading: Delighted with room, location, and service!
Summary: Little hotel with BIG amenities. A block from the beach, boardwalk, shops, restaurants, and pier.  Loved our room and south-view on the 3rd floor. 24hr. staff. Free breakfast coffee, bagels, croissant egg-sandwiches, cereal, juice, milk, fruit, toast. Free fresh-baked cookies in afternoon were awesome. Free boogie boards, beach towels, umbrellas.  Free fresh fruit in room daily. Free DVD movies and books.  Relaxed atmosphere in a nice area of town. Loved the open 4th floor with terrific view, ocean to west, marina to west, complete with big padded patio furniture and umbrellas.  Was a great view 4th of July fireworks!  Very clean, safe, and beautiful grassy community center across street to south for play and/or exercise.
Manager Response: Kenton L,   I'm happy to hear you enjoyed your 4th of July. Independence Day in Newport Beach is pretty special, and the views all around Bay Shores are pretty spectacular. Thank you for taking the time to write such a comprehensive stellar review of my hotel. We'd be happy to welcome you back in the future for another stay.

Summary Heading: Nice little hotel in a great location
Summary: This hotel is in a prime location on the Balboa Peninsula.  A short walk across the street and you‚Äôre on the beach.    The hotel has parking for your car, and offers beach gear for guests to use.  The daily breakfast is nice.  Rooms aren‚Äôt overly large, but do the trick; plus you‚Äôre in Newport to spend time sitting in your room. There is also a great rooftop deck for morning breakfasts or nightly sunsets.    You can easily walk from the hotel to a number of restaurants and bars.  Prices were also decent for the rooms.  Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hacher,  I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Bay Shores. It's true- With so much to do in Newport Beach, you won't want to spend too much of your time in your room. Thank you for such a great review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary: The location of this hotel is perfect!  Excellent customer service - very friendly and helpful people at the check in desk.  Our room was very clean and a perfect size.  Not only did they leave a thank you note for us; but they left us chocolates on the pillows!  They provide beach equipment at no charge, include free breakfast, all day coffee and warm chocolate chip cookies in the lobby!
Manager Response: Eumox,   Thank you for the 5/5 review! Our staff is so wonderful- I'm so glad you were made to feel comfortable and at home at Bay Shores. I hope you enjoyed your 4th of July in Newport Beach!

Summary: Awesome location.  There is a rooftop patio where you can see the ocean on one side and the harbor marina on the other.  Breathtaking!  Super helpful staff.  Just a block off the beach, restaurants and shops.  Clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Edlori60,  I'm glad you enjoyed your stay with us at Bay Shores. The view from the sundeck is pretty spectacular, isn't it? I hope you'll stay with us again in the future! We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Our new destination spot. Awesome friendly staff from check in to check out! Location is ideal to beach and walking to restaurants. Fresh baked cookies and fruit infused water was a treat. They have everything you need for the beach, chairs umbrellas, boogie board so you don‚Äôt need to bring your own. Really glad we found this gem. Thank you!
Manager Response: Having all of that beach equipment is so nice when you're so close to the water isn't it? It's been years and years and I still can't get enough of those fresh baked cookies! Thanks so much for the great review. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future.

Summary: This hotel is a great place to stay. Clean comfortable, very welcoming. Warren at the front desk was so helpful! Checked us in gave us the local places to go and see. I loved this hotel. They have a great rooftop area, you can bring your breakfast or your own drinks and snacks. I would recommend this hotel to anyone staying in this area.
Manager Response: Rusty1Ma,   I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay at Bay Shores. I'm glad you got a chance to enjoy the view from the sundeck! Thanks for recommending us to others too. I hope you'll stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Very good location very close to the beach. Staff super friendly and we felt at home at once. Room like a regular hotel room with some extras. Real orchid in the bathroom. Complimentary water in the frige. Very good breakfast that is included. One thing it's a bit noisy from the road, we was not disturbed but if you need very quiet location this can bather you.
Manager Response: R_Sweden,   Thank you for the great review! Glad you enjoyed all the little details. I'm always happy to hear you felt at home during your stay. Hope you'll come back and see us again sometime!

Summary: For the last three years I have visited the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel for an extended stay, while going to spend time with relatives in the area.  It really does feel like a second home, and this time I met people who had also been there during my stay the year before!  In fact almost everyone said they were repeat visitors, or hoped to be.  There is nothing not to like about the place. From the friendly and helpful staff (hello Donna, Jenny, Warren, Ralph and Bruce - and all the lovely people who keep the hotel so clean and welcoming) to the comfortable rooms it is great.  The hotel is situated in a great location, just a couple of minutes from the beach and a very short walk to the pier and shops.  There is a breakfast room, although some guests like to take breakfast up to
Manager Response: Petalle,   What an amazing review! I'm so glad you hear that you've made Bay Shores a home away from home. Even though you relatives have moved we hope you'll have the chance to make it out to stay with us again in the future! We look forward to welcoming you back.

Summary: Everything about this place was great: the people, the price, the location, the view from the rooftop deck. The breakfast buffet was very nice. Nothing extravagant, but it had the essentials. We didn't use the complimentary beach towels, beach chairs, boogie boards or DVDs, but it was nice to have them available to us. I don't plan on staying anywhere else in future trips to Newport Beach.
Manager Response: Hi Sean,  I like your ID photo, presumably you were/are a Marine.  I also was a Marine, a Vietnam helicopter pilot '68-'69.  Glad you had a nice time at my hotel and we look forward to having you back.  Semper Fi buddy!     ---Fred

Summary: Great employees (Warren, Ralph, Donna, the maint guy I think is paul?). They give you a water bottle in your room the first day for free to get you started. The 3rd floor rooms are great as you get either a view of the ocean or the bay or both. Fresh made cookies at 3pm in the lobby. Free dvd's to check out to watch in your room with easy to follow directions in your room to switch the tv back n forth from tv mode to dvd mode. free to use beach chairs and boogie boards too. Go to the bay behind the hotel if you have smaller kids or no kids and just want a shorter walk and to relax. Can't really say enough about this place. We had a fantastic time. oh and it is easy walking to the pier and a BUNCH of great places to eat. They put fresh fruit in the room each day if you want them.
Manager Response: Pspoker,   It sounds like you had a fabulous time during your stay. You found the beach, the bay, the boogie boards, the breakfast buffet, and the beautiful views! Hope you'll stay with us again in the future. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Stay when you've got some time
Summary: We picked this place based on reviews. It is so refreshing. Not your chain hotel that you see in most places. Greeted warmly by Warren. Gave us dining recommendation and explained all the amenities. Did not use the beach chairs, towels, boards, movies, or games that are available to guests. Did sit on the rooftop terrace 3 times, once in the afternoon, once in evening with wine, and then we ate breakfast up there. We stayed in the Stars & Stripes room, which was very pleasant, though it looked a little smaller perhaps than some of the other rooms. There is a park next door, perfect for children, and then a 1-block walk to the beach. Fabulous. My spouse and I were glad we were able to spend some time at the hotel. Usually we arrive at night and leave the next morning. This is the
Manager Response: Thank you so much for such a detailed wonderful review! Next time you come, I hope you go get the chance to take some of the beach equipment to the beach, or take a movie up to your room to wind down and relax. I'm happy to hear you received a warm welcome and that you enjoyed a nice, albeit short, stay. Hope you get the chance to stay with us again!

Summary: The location is IDEAL, block from the beach and 1/2 block from the marina.  Next to a nice park.  The hotel is ran like a bed and breakfast with personable employees, cozy rooms that are very clean.  There is a great roof- top terrace to soak up sun, or take a bottle of wine.  The breakfast is more than adequate with hot/ cold cereals, fruits, yogurt, breakfast sandwiches to microwave.  Coffee and tea are available all day.  There are cookies baked everyday at 3pm.  I am already missing the warm greeting we received  from  Warren each time we passed through the lobby.We will be back.
Manager Response: JArcherBennett,   I'm so happy to hear you received such a warm welcome from Warren, and that you enjoyed your stay with us at Bay Shores. We love to make you feel at home away from home (right down to the homemade cookies!). Hope you get the chance to stay with us again soon!

Summary: We had one awesome vacation and Bay Shores Hotel played a big part in making that happen. From the breakfast to the free parking the clean stylish hotel room and location of the hotel-we would walk the beach after breakfast every morning and in the evening after  spending a day on the highway site seeing we would park the car and walk to dinner in the evening. very relaxing
Manager Response: Trebebradfisch,   Thanks for the great review! We are happy to have such a wonderful location near the harbor, the beach, and the restaurants and shopping. It sounds like you were able to do quite a bit while you were here!  If you haven't already had the chance to relax on the sundeck and watch the sunset, that's something you'll definitely have to enjoy next time! We'd be so happy to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: We had a great time.  Unfortunately, we were only there one night.  Warren welcomed us upon arrival with great service, information and fresh baked cookies!  The hotel is a very short walk to the beach.  Our room was clean and comfortable.  We headed to the beach and pier and had a beautiful sunset.  We returned late to the hotel and found our bed turned down and chocolate on the pillow.  We certainly did not expect this!!!  Breakfast was very basic, but fine for us.  Donna (I think that is her name, I am terrible with names) was very pleasant and had many recommendations for us as we were traveling south along the coast.  This was great!!  Donna also offered to mail our postcard to our Grandson for us.   Fresh flowers in the lobby and breakfast area were lovely.  We even had a
Manager Response: BraveTraveler,   I so appreciate your wonderful review. It's true- the small details make all the difference, and it's how we strive to make you feel welcome, and special. There's nothing like a turned down bed and a piece of chocolate! I'm so glad Warren was able to get you settled in and that you received some good recommendations from Donna. We hope you'll stay with us again in the future!

Summary Heading: Felt like home away from home
Summary: From the minute I checked into Bay Shores, I was taken on a nice tour by the front desk staff and told all about the accommodations offered.
