We both have health issues and I was very concerned about several issues that I perceived as potentially problematic challenges that could spoil our visit: (1) parking, (2) transportation, (3) noise, (4) breakfast, (5) help with luggage, (6) bed too small, and other presumed disquieting situations.   The excellent and talented staff addressed and solved every single one of my concerns and literally made it one of the best vacations we've ever had.   We will definitely be returning for future vacations, some of which we had not planned on but are now looking forward to as an excuse to stay at the Bay Shores Peninsula.
Manager Response: As the owner, nothing gives me greater pride than hearing a guest say "the excellent and talented staff addressed and solved every single one of my concerns". Thank you for coming to stay, we all look forward to your return visit and welcoming you with an encore performance.

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel for a short stay in Newport Beach
Summary: This is a very well located hotel with great service and attention to detail. The extras (free parking, beach towels and other body board and beach accessories) are really a great plus and offered very generously! The rooftop terrace is really lovely as well. You feel really relaxed and at home in this hotel. We would definitely recommend it to people wanting to stay in Newport Beach for a couple of days.
Manager Response: It's our pleasure to extend generous hospitality to our guests and to try to make their stays as enjoyable as possible.  Thank you for leaving such a nice review and for recommending us to other travelers to Newport Beach!

Summary Heading: Amazing! Staff cannot do enough for you!
Summary: Not the fanciest of hotels but my gosh the staff cannot do enough for you! Freshly made cookies every afternoon. Beach towels provided clean every day. Great recommendations from the staff for where to eat and go for the evening. Fresh coffee maker in the room and chocolates left in the room! Nothing negative to say and would definitely go back! Fantastic views from the roof top terrace!
Manager Response: No, we're definitely "not the fanciest" but we're happy to get those 5 Stars for what really matters to our guests - cleanliness, friendliness and value. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I started staying here about 3 1/2 years ago when I moved from Palos Verdes to Denver. I stay here when I am in town, and feel so welcomed and cared for every time. Average about 3-4 times a year minimum.  Rooms are clean and very "beachy", the Staff (Warren, Ralph, Jenny) all are fantastic and so helpful it is way beyond the normal attention.  The location is great, and now with the lovely park across the street it is even better.  It's hard to recommend, because then the secret will be out. My favorite place to stay and I will always be a cheerleader for this hotel.  Go enjoy, have fun......but leave some dates available for me!  :-)
Manager Response: Don't worry about letting the secret out - there will always be a room for you!  Thank you for once again making us your Newport Beach choice.

Summary: In an area known for over-the-top conspicuous consumption, the Bay Shores Peninsula hotel is a delightful, serene and unassuming surprise.  This small hotel is only steps from the ocean or the bay, and has a rooftop patio from which you can enjoy views of both.  The rooms are thoughtfully equipped, and clean.  I found a lovely hand-written note on my bed when I first walked in to my room, along with a small bowl of fresh fruit (apples and oranges).  Even luxury hotels don't do that for first time visitors.  This place is a GEM!  I will absolutely be back.
Manager Response: So happy to have hosted you and equally happy to have been an unassuming surprise! Look forward to your return one day.

Summary Heading: nice place very great location a block from the beach.
Summary: the staff was awesome!!  Very friendly, helpful and accommodating.  Love having beach chairs, towels, biggie boards and toys available.  Our room was large enough for 3 of us with no problems - clean and appealing.   I would definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Happy to supply the beach toys. Glad to hear you enjoyed them!

Summary: This is such a great little hotel for a mini getaway! The location is fantastic, the beach and bay are within steps from the hotel! Restaurants and great bars are within walking distance from it.  Parking can be tricky but the staff will help you find a spot if the parking lot is full. Everything is within walking distance that we didn't even use our car.   The room was spotless and bright and airy, it doesn't feel stuffy at all! We loved the nautical decor, the fresh fruit and flowers were a great touch. Though it gets a little loud during the afternoon because of traffic, but that's if you leave the window open.   The staff were super friendly and helpful, they really make you feel at home. It's all about the little touches from the turndown service to fresh baked cookies that
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for mentioning the fresh fruit and flowers.  They were a past guest suggestion; if you have others, just let is know!

Summary: Small hotel one block from the beach.  Nice comfortable room. Friendly and helpful staff. They supply all the equipment, board, towels etc. to enjoy the beach. The Crab Cooker and 21 Oceanfront restaurant are within a three block walk as other restaurants.
Manager Response: I've loved the Crab Cooker for over four decades - glad you enjoyed it too!

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, fun nautical decor and breakfast, too!
Summary: This is a great small hotel -- half a block from the bay beach and close to the ocean. Both Warren, the evening manager, and Jenny, the day manager are friendly, multi-talented people. The breakfast room is charming with stained glass windows and quality breakfast products.  Love the croissants, but I had to cut one in half, they are too big! The rooms are very clean and cute. The shampoo etc, is "tested on film stars, not animals!" They will loan you beach chairs, boogie boards and towels. They have DVD players and a large library of DVDs you can borrow. The roof-top deck has a wonderful view. They have a lot of return guests, and I can see why.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for positively commenting on some of our amenities.  Glad you enjoyed the shampoo - well, when we're so close to Hollywood, it makes sense!

Summary: This a cute spot located near the beach. I prefer luxury hotels, but wanted to give this a try. The location is really great, however I was missing the basic comforts of a 5 star hotel. If you are after a casual, low-key beach vacation, then this is the spot for you.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for nicely capturing our vibe in your review.

Summary: This isn't your run of the mill chain hotel, it's far more special. From the warm greeting by Warren (himself a gem) on the front desk, to the smell of freshly baked cookies and fresh fruit in the lobby, this hotel is the perfect choice for anyone seeking easy beach and dining access in Newport Beach. From the comfortable sundeck you can enjoy the yacht harbor to on side, the Pacific to the other.  Our king bedded room with a view of the marina was very comfortable. A mini fridge in the closet was a welcome surprise as was the fresh fruit on the desk, the vanity mirror in the bathroom, and the far above average cleanliness of the room in general.  An easy two block walk to the beach and restaurant row makes the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel a place we'll return to often! Say a
Manager Response: As the owner, believe me, I know how very blessed I am to be supported by such terrific staff!  I will be particularly sharing your kind words with Warren and thanking my whole staff for being the kind of team that elicits and warrants reviews such as yours!

Summary Heading: #1 in Newport, the best hotel we have ever stayed, fabulous
Summary: #1 rating on TripAdvisor and the Certificate of Excellence are earned and well deserved.  This is the best hotel we have ever stayed.  Room 302, comfortable, clean, beautifully decorated, real orchid in the bathroom, good alarm clock/radio/cd player, dvd player with full library in the office to check out, lots of electric outlets, two sliding windows opening to a great view of the ocean, coffee/tea service, mini-frig, large closet, bathroom perfect.  The TV remote included a laminated operation instruction on one side and all the channels listed on the other in large enough print for seniors to read.  Outside our front door, on the balcony, a table for two with comfortable chairs.  One floor up the stairs, a dozen chairs and tables with views of the marina, ocean, up town, down
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you so much for your glowing and extensive review.  It really is wonderful of you to take the time to alert others to all of our amenities, our location and our level of service.  Thank you again, I and my hardworking, personable staff are so very grateful.

Summary Heading: Wow - They Really Deserve #1 in Newport Beach
Summary: No, this hotel isn't one of those large chain hotels surrounding the shopping malls one usually finds in Newport Beach. It's a small, privately-run place that has that elusive quality that makes it feel almost as comfortable as home. The location was 2 blocks from the ocean and half a block from a sheltered waterway. A kids' playground was right across the street. From the moment we checked in, until our departure, we were treated courteously by each staff member we dealt with, all of whom displayed a genuine can-do attitude, with no request any trouble, from finding an already check-out movie to promptly making more afternoon cookies even though it was the evening. We stayed in room #304, a king bed room on the top floor. The room wasn't large, but it was well laid out, with an
Manager Response: Your use of the word 'bracing' for the interruption in hot water flow in the shower is most charitable - I do apologize for the rude awakening that must have induced!  I'll be checking into that and alerting my general manager.  Thank you for mentioning so many of our amenities and those of our immediate neighbors; having Marina Park open next door has been wonderful for our guests.

Summary: The reviews don't lie. I stayed here for a quick business trip. I look for reliable basics: breakfast, business center (aka the ability to print out a document if I need to) and while I prefer a place with room service for dinner and a fitness center, this hotel had substantially better reviews than the chain hotels in Newport Beach, so I went with the people. The Bay Shore is awesome. Professional, friendly and all-around great staff. Reliable wifi, clean rooms and good location. This is now my Newport Beach go-to for business and vacation.
Manager Response: I am thrilled that we are now your '"go-to" hotel in Newport Beach! We greatly admire those of you out there building and growing businesses and as a former 'road warrior' myself, I am so glad that the facilities we provided for you rated an "awesome"! Just let us know if there are any other small touches we could add to make your work day even easier - and of course I look forward to hosting you when you have more time to relax!

Summary Heading: Exactly as described- we loved it!
Summary: Just returned from a 9 night California vacation.  I spent much time researching hotels as I wanted to feel comfortable in a clean, cared for, not intimidating place.  First two nights in Santa Barbara in an 18 room B&B and found it nothing like the pictures, it was fine but wouldn't return.  Next three nights were at Bayshores Peninsula and it lived up to the pictures and reviews.  But what makes it really special is the staff, so kind, friendly, warm and helpful.  They truly care about the guests.  Our room, as the entire hotel, was just plain comfortable, clean, cared for, sweet, and cool!  My husband was impressed with the care given to the hotel and would return.  Out next four nights were in San Diego on Shelter Island.  It appeared to be what I was looking for but wasn't.
Manager Response: I'm so glad we lived up to your expectations, our 'Five Star' reviews are earned by being true to our description, "small, friendly and with a vintage vibe". While you self describe as being 'picky', I am sure you are just like most travelers, you're looking for somewhere clean and comfortable with great value. Sounds like we delivered on our promise and I look forward to meeting your expectations again soon.

Summary: Loved the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel.   Friendly older gentleman greeted me and knew everywhere to go in Newport Beach.   I think his name was Fox.   I thought he must be the owner because he was too good to be an employee.   Anyway, absolutely loved my stay at your hotel.   It's the perfect location!
Manager Response: "Fox", love it, I think I'll change my name!  Actually in fairness, while it may well have been me (Fred) it could equally have been any of my male staff who take such pride in their work, you could easily mistake them for the owner. And of course, the gals on my team are just as friendly and knowledgable, its just that there's no danger in mixing them up with us geezers!  Glad you had a great stay, I hope we all get the pleasure of your company again soon.

Summary Heading: A place that goes the extra mile
Summary: Even though this hotel is rated number one in Newport I was a little unsure about it, given the lower star rating.  All I can say is that I am so glad I decided to stay there.  I had two separate visits to the hotel, one of two days and one of four days and two different rooms- all the rooms have names too.  Both of these were lovely, comfortable, attractive and very clean.  Fresh fruit is provided in the room every day and a free newspaper, and every night the bed is turned down and chocolates left on the pillow. There are fresh cookies every day, and beach towels, chairs, buckets and spades for children, and even boogie boards, can be borrowed free of charge. There are three floors, accessible from two lots of stairs, and there is also a quaint, old fashioned lift.  The first
Manager Response: And we're glad you "decided to stay" here too!  Really appreciate you mentioning so many of our amenities and our location in your extensive review... which you said you were "reluctant to to finish"! You know, if you do think of anything else, you can always write another! Hope you come back one day, we loved hosting you.

Summary Heading: Like all of the review mention - It was fantanstic
Summary: All around excellent stay.  Close to everything including the beach bike rental restaurants sights and bars, great staff, clean rooms.  It's not the Four Seasons from a room standpoint obviously but very clean, no smells, good ammenities like beach equipment to use, huge selection of DVDs for free, great breakfast and did I mention great staff :-) You are right on a very busy street and it is noisy except for a few hours between 1am and 5am or so.  I live in a big city so it didn't bother me but if you're coming from a quiet area it may be an annoyance.  Perfect stay in my opinion I am already planning a trip back to Newport Beach and will definitely stay at Bay Shores. .
Manager Response: Thank you for describing us as a "perfect stay", also thank you for mentioning the potential noise.  At busy times, because we are so close to the beach and many of the area restaurants, we can have a certain amount of traffic. The rooms to the rear of the hotel are quieter so please request these next time you book, and of course whenever possible, we are happy to relocate guests to other rooms if noise becomes troublesome. Thank you again for your review and look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Nice place in the perfect beach location
Summary: We spent three nights at the Bay Shores and found it to be a perfect location for visiting family and friends in the area and going to the beach, which is one block away.  Since we were still on Central time for the first day or two, we appreciated that coffee and light breakfast was available very early in the day.  There were other nice touches like a free copy of the LA Times for every room and fresh cookies daily at 3pm.  The staff was also very friendly and helpful.  All in all a great place near the beach.
Manager Response: Oh, those time changes can be a bear - I'm still trying to just cope with 'springing forward'! Glad the newspaper and the coffee were there to greet you and other fellow early risers. Thank you for coming to stay and for your review.

Summary Heading: If only I could live this place
Summary: I want to love this place. I truly do. Honestly, the service was great, the rooms comfortable, the location is divine, and they have warm cookies served every afternoon. Honestly, what more could you possibly want? And then, on night 2, there was sand in my bed. Now, you may be thinking--it's a beach hotel. If you're on the beach, then there's going to be sand, right? But here's the thing. I didn't go to the beach...and it was in my bed on the second night of my stay. Which can only mean that the sand inexplicably was "added" to the bed AFTER I had slept there one night. I loved everything else, but the scratchy bizarre night's sleep? Not so much.
Manager Response: Sorry for your 'scratchy' night - please know that my staff are there 24 hours and if you ever have that experience again, just call the front desk and we'll happily strip and freshly remake your bed. Glad you enjoyed the service and location, I hope we see you soon.

Summary Heading: The cookies alone make this a great place!
Summary: Spent a couple of nights at the Bay Shore and it ended up being an excellent choice.  As I said in the title, the fresh baked cookies each afternoon really hit the spot.  The location of the hotel near the beach was very convenient.  The room was kept nicely and the beds were comfortable.  The roof top patio was very relaxing and a good place to enjoy a glass of wine.  The hotel provided a nice breakfast and fresh fruit was always available.  Also, having beach towels and some beach equipment was very nice.  We will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for the prospect of enjoying your company again. Glad you got to visit the beach and those views from the rooftop. See you soon...the fresh baked cookies will be waiting!

Summary: This hotel had a stellar rating on TripAdvisor, so I decided to give it a shot for an overnight business trip and see if it lives up to its reputation.  It did.  Considering what you can pay in the Newport Beach area for accommodations, this property is a great value when you look at what is delivered versus the price point.  For starters, the location is great - within a three minute walk to the beach which can be easily seen from upper level floors.  It is also close to a number of nice restaurants and shopping just a short way down the street.  The room was very comfortable.  It won't blow you away with high-end luxuries, but that is not what this hotel promises to deliver.  The bed was comfortable, the room was really nicely decorated, had a refrigerator, nice TV,
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and highlighting what we promise to deliver - location, cleanliness and service. So glad you gave us a shot and that you'll be coming back - Warren will happily be there to greet you!

Summary Heading: 3 Star Hotel that acts like a 5 Star Hotel
Summary: In my opinion you should not make a visit to Newport Beach without at least one stay in this Hotel. About the only thing better for my taste would be a Beach House Rental.  Pros: Location, Location, Location ‚Äì this hotel is about a block away from the beach and yards from the Bay side. You can literally sit up on the roof deck and look at the ocean or bay. (see pictures). We ate breakfast up there on two occasions and I don‚Äôt know why you would not as oppose to the smaller room in the lobby. It has a small park adjacent to the hotel which would be good if you have a pet or small children. Easy walk to the boardwalk/pier with restaurants, bars, and small shops. Also, if you are up for about a mile plus walk down towards the Balboa area for shops, boats tours (whales, Dolphins
Manager Response: none

Summary: We just checked out after staying here for the last week. We've done Airbnb rentals and stayed at a number of hotels in the area and this is our favorite by far.   For a hotel that's close to the beach, it's exceptionally clean. Our bathroom is about as clean as we've ever seen in a hotel anywhere.  We had a king room on the 3rd floor.  The bed was comfy, but the pillows were small and flat. To be fair, I never asked if others were available.   The complimentary beach chairs are a nice touch and the beach towels were nicer than I've seen in much more expensive hotels.  Free parking is also nice but when returning after 7:00 or so the lot was always full , leaving us roaming the neighborhood for a spot.  Not a big deal.   We've had to do the same at a pricy Airbnb rental.   The
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and do hope that this is just the first of many visits,  Couple of tips for the next time, please do ask us for other pillows - we have a stock of varying sizes and firmness, if you have difficulty parking on site, let the staff know, they will happily feed meters if you have use the street and lastly don't ever be concerned about those cookies...the staff are used to me!

Summary: This hotel is located on the Newport peninsula, in the heart of Newport Beach.  It is basically a beach motel although there are some nice touches such as free breakfast, a roof top patio with great views and beach toys available at no charge.  The staff are very friendly and helpful.  We did not love our room which was on the ground floor facing the street.  If you are considering staying here request a higher floor on the side street.  Rooms are clean but by no means luxurious.  Photo is view from rooftop patio, take a bottle of wine along and enjoy the view!
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing us as a beach motel, that's us - small, friendly and with a vintage vibe. Sorry that the location of your room was not as expected, please know that I always want our guests to let our staff know if the location of their room is not completely to their liking. A glass of wine on the rooftop - now that's such a great way to end the day!

Summary: From the outside, this hotel may appear to be slightly funky, but there is nothing lacking at the BSPH. Every one of the staff members at the reception was helpful and friendly. The location is within walking distance to both sides of Balboa Peninsula. The rooms are clean, comfortable and well equipped. Breakfast is reasonable, there is fruit on the main table, cookies in the afternoon and a spectacular view from the rooftop.
Manager Response: Glad that you enjoyed our vintage vibe and our classic service.  Appreciate you mentioning our proximity to both sides of the Peninsula, and now our adjacency to the beautiful Marina Park!  Hope we see you again soon, thank you for coming to stay.

Summary Heading: Best kept secret in Newport Beach
Summary: we have been coming to Newport Beach for over 20 years, but this is the first time we ever stayed here! What a treat! We are two blocks from the beach, gorgeous deck on the roof where we shared a bottle of wine with a gorgeous view of the marina and beach. Our room was super clean, and was perfect for a romantic getaway. The staff has been extremely helpful and kind. There are free baked cookies every afternoon, a selection of free movies are available, and even free beach towels, boogie boards, chairs, and toys available for check out! We will definitely stay here again and again!
Manager Response: So glad we were your choice for your romantic getaway and that you'll be coming to stay again - we love our return guests -  and yes, the view from the rooftop is wonderful isn't it!

Summary Heading: Great value in the heart of Newport Beach California
Summary: I love travelling to Newport Beach and have stayed at the Bay Shores for the last 3 years.  The Bay Shores Peninsula continues to deliver great service and great value right in the heart of Newport.  50m walk to the beach and a short stroll to the bars and restaurants.  I love staying here.
Manager Response: We love our return guests - what a privilege to have your company again!  Thank you for making us your 'go-to' place in Newport Beach.  See you next year!

Summary: We stayed for two days in mid-March.  Check in was a breeze and we were impressed by the service mindedness of the staff and all the nice touches, like complimentary fresh baked cookies in the afternoon, a good selection of dvds and books avaliable, various beach toys and boards to loan etc.  There was a fresh copy of the LA Times at our door every morning.   The room was nice and we slept well in the big comfortable bed.   There is free parking.   We had a late flight on the departure day and were allowed to leave our luggage at  the hotel until we left for the airport.   The hotel has a nice relaxed atmosphere with friendly staff.   The beach is literally a two minute walk from the hotel.   The walls are thin so you will hear your neighbours. There is also wall to wall carpets
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for mentioning so many of the amenities you enjoyed.  Hope your return trip was uneventful and that you got safely home after your Newport Beach vacation.  Hope to see you again one day!

Summary: We are extremely particular in our hotel choices - rarely stay at a lower rated star hotel.  However, Bayside will forever be our exception!  I needed a hotel at the last minute and because everything around was booked solid, I ended up by default at this quaint, quirky, SUPER CLEAN and really great little inn.  It will be my first choice if I ever need a hotel in the area again.  All reviews before mine are more than accurate so I won't belabor the details, just know that it is ALL TRUE.  Great place, I'll be back for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a chance on us and for letting others know that we're worth it!  Hope we get to offer you our hospitality again soon.  Thank you for taking the time to post your review!

Summary: I have stayed at Pelican Hill & The Balboa Bay Club many times and rented several houses in Newport over the years, but they can't come close to matching the value of Bay Shores. First of all, you're going to fork out $450-$1200 a night to stay at the other places. Second point, they can't compare with Bay Shores location, cleanliness or friendliness of the staff. Third, NOBODY else gives you free parking, free breakfast and the use of beach equipment. Bay Shore may not be rated as a "five-star" hotel, but it is a five-star experience and value. My new go to place in Newport!
Manager Response: To be so soundly commended for our value, service, cleanliness and location is an honor indeed. I thank you for your ringing endorsement and very much look forward to your next visit.

Summary Heading: Thank you,  for a wonderful stay with my family! The personal care & attention they gave us was exceptional.
Summary: I can't say enough good things about this hotel. The staff being very helpful provided us with local info so we could choose where to have dinner along with attractions within walking distance from hotel. Love the beach chairs, towels, and sand toys available to check out and take to the beach. Rooms were very clean and bright. We all liked the patio my sons room had. Fresh cookies were a added bonus. My son had 2 additional guest that were joining us, and it was no problem providing a larger room. I'm bad at remembering names,  but when I checked in a very pretty girl with long brown hair gave me all info I requested and was very helpful.  I believe Warren was the other staff member I met. He gave us a tour of the hotel which was really nice. He remembered my name, which I
Manager Response: "Great Place, Great People" - I hope you didn't copywrite that because I can see that tripping off my tongue quite often!  Thank you for coming to stay and for bringing the whole crowd - I'm glad we were able to offer roomier accommodations so you could all stay together. Happy you enjoyed the postcard too, I'll let everyone back here know you had a great stay!

Summary: We just returned from three wonderful nights at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel.  I discovered this little gem a couple of years ago while on a business trip and couldn't wait to bring my wife for a stay.  The rooms are well decorated, the beds super comfortable, and the little amenities are all there.  The location is perfect for exploring Newport Beach and is just a short walk from great shops and restaurants.  The staff at the hotel are delightful, and go out of their way to make their guests stay comfortable. My wife loved our time in Newport Beach.  We can't wait to return to the Bay Shores!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back - we love our return guests! Walking around the town is one of my favorite things to do too  Just stepping out the front door to stroll on the boardwalk or to browse the shops with a cup of coffee is a great start to anyone's day.  I hope we get to enjoy your company again!

Summary: We had a room on the second floor with 2 King Beds.  The room was big and had a small table, TV, fridge and safe.  Bathroom was also big.  The view of the roof top was amazing!!  There was no elevator but the stairs were doable even with my bad knees.  Parking was a little tough but the staff made every effort to assist us.  They even moved a car ( I'm assuming theirs) so that we could park on the street across from the hotel.  We had cookies in the afternoon and browsed through the movies in the evening.  The continental breakfast was good and offered a variety.  They even had soy milk!!  They had beach chairs, boogie boards and umbrellas.  I would certainly stay here again.  Newport Beach is a lovely town and this hotel is close to everything!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for coming to stay and for taking the time to post your review.  I'm glad you enjoyed the room - that one is a great one isn't it!  I really appreciate you mentioning so many of our amenities, we do try to anticipate our guests every need but if you can think of any other little extras we might provide, I'd be delighted to hear from you!

Summary: We spent one night in this great hotel in late December, but the good memory of our stay lingers on. We loved our beautiful room (front left corner, second floor), the perfect location, the rooftop terrace for breakfast with a panoramic view, free parking, helpful recommendations for drinks and dinner and all the other thoughtful touches that made our stay in Newport Beach so enjoyable. We'll be back!
Manager Response: It's our pleasure to provide those 'thoughtful touches' and indeed if you can think of any other small gestures your think other guests might enjoy, we'd be delighted to hear from you. The project of your return is something we'll all look forward to,thank you for your review!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for our 41st anniversary trip.  It is so fun. We had a nice, comfortable, and very clean room. Breakfast is provided and what a wonderful surprise eating it up on the rooftop. What a wonderful view. The staff was so helpful and friendly, they go out of their way.  This location is amazing, we walked both directions on the boardwalk, to both piers. Our stay was very special.
Manager Response: We always feel so honored when guests choose to make us part of their special celebrations - Happy Anniversary! So glad you were able to enjoy the rooftop and that you were able to just step out the front door of the hotel and immediately enjoy our wonderful boardwalk.  Hope to see you back for #42!

Summary: This hotel goes above and beyond to make your visit a great one, everyone of their staff is excellent and their customer service is to be admired, other hotels can learn a lot from this place, great location, nice rooms and VERY clean, this was our first visit to newport and to this hotel but we will be back, I don't usually take time to review every hotel we stay at but this place deserves a "way to go!" shout out
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to post a review and for the "way to go'! I am always proud of my staff but never more so than when they are the particular focus of a great review. So glad to know that you'll be back, we'll all look forward to your return.

Summary: I stayed at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel for the first time last August on a solo trip.  I had a perfect stay!  My husband and I stayed here again in early December.    Positive: Perfect location (across the street from the beach and within a short walking distance to restaurants, shopping, the pier, etc.)  Outstanding staff  Cleanliness  Amenities (Complimentary items:  WIFI,  parking, coffee available each morning in the dining area, breakfast, use of the lobby computer, the famous chocolate chip cookies) - see more detail in my August 2015 review.  Negative:  None  I liked the room that I stayed in last August so I asked if it would be possible to have the same room again. Since my last stay, the queen bed had been replaced with a king bed making the room seem smaller but
Manager Response: We love our return guests!  Yes, since your last visit we have upgraded our beds to the larger size (they are wider, but not longer) to accommodate the numerous requests we had received to do so. Thank you also for alerting future guests that they can request our larger rooms, best to do this directly with the hotel as our better rooms are not available online (or even on our own website!) Thank you for coming to stay again, I hope we will continue to be able to extend our hospitality many more times in the future.

Summary: Very friendly and helpful. Good advise on where to dine. Didn't get a chance to visit the beach on this trip but will on the next one.  The rooms were quite nice, wouldn't even know it was an older building. Evidence of staff that cares throughout. The 4th floor deck was one of the highlights.
Manager Response: Glad you got to experience the sun deck, you'll just have to come back so you can enjoy the beach! I'll let my staff know that you appreciated their attention to detail, on their behalf, I certainly appreciate you taking the time to leave your review.

Summary: We squeezed a 2 night visit to Newport Beach before a family reunion in Beaumont, so happy we did!  Such a quaint place to stay and the attention to detail was simply impressive.   The staff was amazingly attentive - I would highly recommend this place to anyone.
Manager Response: I am so glad your itinerary allowed for a side trip and that you enjoyed your stay with us.  Thank you for the great review, I hope you can come back next time for a longer visit.

Summary: We stayed one night at the this hotel during the Newport Beach boat parade. It was in a perfect location. Sadly, it rained in the evening and we didn't get to see too many boats, but this cute hotel made up for it. We stayed in two rooms, a standard and a two queen. The rooms were both on the ground floor. I liked the quirkiness of the hotel- it reminded me of the 50's hotels surrounding Disneyland that I used to stay in as a child (I think those are mostly gone now). The cookies, friendliness, beach chairs, etc were all great and nice additions. I did find the hotel a little pricey for the style- our two rooms were $300 and $180. We are Canadian, so with the exchange that was big money (not the hotels fault, certainly!) I think this place would be superb in the summer, when you
Manager Response: Yes, we're small, friendly and with a vintage vibe so I am so glad that you got to enjoy the service of yesteryear that is our hallmark.  Sorry about the rain and the exchange rate - I hope the next time you come back it will be better on both counts!

Summary: The extras here are the friendly and helpful staff, free parking, fruit in the room, chocolates on your pillow at night, nice shampoo and soaps, free use of beach equipment and towels, newspaper, great WiFi, good breakfast and more!  The location is perfect for spending time near the Pier at Newport Beach. Our room on the second floor was cozy and very clean. We'd stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for being so complimentary about our, well ...complimentary amenities! Extra special service and all those little extras give us the greatest of pleasure to provide and we're just thrilled that they prompted your glowing review.

Summary: This was our fourth visit to Newport Beach and Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel was by far the best place we've stayed.  We smelled fresh baked cookies as soon as we arrived and we knew this was no ordinary hotel!  Warren showed us the cute breakfast area and described all the amenities that were available.  We arrived after dark but as soon as the sun came up the next day we were very pleased to see what great views we had from our room and especially the wonderful sundeck.  Warren gave us some great suggestions for places to eat and they did not disappoint!  We're looking forward to our next visit in October and there is no question that we're staying here again!
Manager Response: We love our return guests and now we have the pleasure of your return visit to look forward to! On the welcoming smell of those warm fresh baked cookies? Never get used to it...never want to!!

Summary: Loved this place.  The lost of art of hoteling seems to be alive and well here.  The space was great, the setup is great, the DVD library and cookies are great.  It's so close to the beach and the pier and the restaurants and everything.  This is by far the best value I've ever gotten for my money at a hotel anywhere.
Manager Response: Hospitality is our joy and our passion.  I am so glad you felt that from all my staff and your visit was not only a pleasure but one that was also great value.  Hope we get to see you again soon, thank you for taking the time to share your experience.

Summary: Myself and my boyfriend stayed here for a weekend getaway. There's a reason why they are the number one hotel in Newport. Paul checked us in and he was so kind, told us a little history of the hotel all of the amenities, offered to help with anything we needed and when we got to the room we even found a note and chocolates from him welcoming us! The Sundeck is one of the best things about the hotel. We ate breakfast up their every morning, it was so peaceful and beautiful. The rooms were very cozy and clean. We will absolutely be back this summer.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for taking the time to share your experience with other travelers. I am so glad that you and your boyfriend were able to enjoy the sundeck, it really is a special place isn't it to start the morning.  Looking for you to come back, Newport Beach is even more lovely - if that's possible - in the summer!

Summary: I can't say enough good things about this hotel! You will not be disappointed! When we walked in I felt like we were staying with family. Warren was an excellent host! When we arrived in the afternoon there were even fresh baked cookies in the lobby. Delicious! He gave us a great overview of the hotel and the area, which was fantastic since this was our first visit. We were able to walk to a lot of great things near by and the beach was just across the street! The lobby has a great selection of DVDs you can check out which was great after a long week of sightseeing. The bed was super comfortable and the furnishings just fit in so well with the beach cottage vibe. This hotel has parking onsite, free wi-fi and lots of beach toys and accessories to check out and take with you.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed our vibe, "small and friendly with a vintage vibe" is exactly how we describe ourselves! Thank you for telling other potential guests about our amenities, the DVD's and the beach toys were all a result of traveller suggestions from way back so if you can think of anything else that might have made your stay even more pleasurable, we are always looking for other great ideas! See you when you come back, thank you for your review.

Summary Heading: Great location and amazingly friendly service
Summary: I spent several nights at the Bay Shores while I was in town visiting family for Thanksgiving.  It‚Äôs a fairly basic hotel, but the location really can‚Äôt be beat and the service is amazingly friendly.  Breakfast is included in the hotel rate and includes a fairly standard spread of cereals, coffee, and pastries.  (The plates and cups are all disposable, which seems somewhat wasteful.)  There are fresh cookies every afternoon, which is a nice touch.  The rooms are nice, although slightly worn around the edges.  There‚Äôs an old-fashioned elevator on the property, but it‚Äôs easier to just take the stairs.  The highlights of the Bay Shores are the location and service, though.  It‚Äôs perfectly located near the beach on the peninsula and the service at the front desk is always really
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us and for your comments.  Because we offer self serve breakfast and open access to snacks throughout the day, the Department of Public Health informs our decision to keep with the disposable option on the plates and cups. Of course, having paper cups also allows our guests to be able to take a coffee across the street to enjoy the ocean and for pointing out our proximity to the Pacific we also thank you.

Summary: The service was unbeatable!  Newport Beach is the best during the Christmas Season!  The hotel was centrally located, close to bike rentals, boat rentals, the Newport Beach Fun Zone, and cruises.  We loved the room - spacious, clean, well appointed with a mini fridge and safe.  They had free breakfasts, free boogie boards and beach toys, a rooftop deck from which to enjoy sunrises, sunsets, and just plain relax and take in the vista views of the Balboa Peninsula.  We will stay here again next Christmas.
Manager Response: We were delighted to share the holidays with you and I agree, Newport Beach during Christmas is just magical!  Thank you for taking the time to tell others about us and I do hope that we'll have the pleasure of your company again in 2016.

Summary: We wanted a place on or near the beach and this small hotel was a wonderful choice. Once we arrived we parked the car and walked to the beach and the restaurants. The staff were very helpful in suggesting restaurants and trying to help me figure out how I could avoid a FasPass fine after I mistakenly got in the wrong lane driving to the hotel. (Boo California and all states--mine included--that take advantage of unfamiliar highway visitors to collect money.) Our room was comfortable and we enjoyed the partial view of the beach. The breakfast had a nice variety. This was exactly the type of laid-back beach experience I hoped for.
Manager Response: Oh that the California Highway Patrol could be as laid back as my hotel!  So glad that you had a pleasant stay and that you had the chance to enjoy our amenities and the expertise of my wonderful staff.  Happy New Year to you... and of course to all who keep us safe on the roads, your service is much appreciated.

Summary: This hotel was so close to the beach and our ferry to Catalina! It was so cute and clean!! The staff was super friendly and did everything to make sure our stay was comfortable! They even have movies you can take up to your room! Breakfast... Was amazing! I loved this place and will make it a point to stay there again if we are ever in Newport again!! Thank you so much for the awesome experience!!!
Manager Response: Happy that we were your departure point for Catalina, what a great island that is to visit and explore!  Thank you for alerting fellow travelers to our proximity to this wonderful natural treasure; glad that you had a wonderful time!

Summary: This is a great little place in an excellent location. The beach and boardwalk are just across the street.  They have items you can check out and take to the beach at no additional charge: beach chairs, umbrellas, sand toys, boogie boards.   They have a good complimentary breakfast as well. Milk, oj, yogurt, hard-boiled eggs, coffee, toast etc.  Staff is very pleasant and helpful.¬†   I stayed here with my husband and 3 year old son (after 2 days at Disneyland we were looking to relax) and initially booked a room for only 1 night. We ended up extending our stay for 2 nights because we weren't ready to leave.   There's a ton of bars and restaurants within walking distance. Bike rentals are also close by.  The roof top deck is an added bonus. Terrific views while enjoying a snack
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay - sometimes the 'happiest place on Earth can actually be the most exhausting place on Earth can't it! I am glad that your family was able to enjoy the complimentary breakfast and that it was what your family needed to fuel a great day in Newport Beach.  I hope we get to host you again; thank you for your review.

Summary: We really enjoyed our short stay at Bay Shores. It is such a charming and cozy little place. We experienced nothing but great service. It not a fancy luxury hotel, but it has charm and a perfekt location. We'll definately recommend this place.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for choosing to stay at our small family style hotel. We appreciate your review and recommendation to others. I hope we get the pleasure of your company again!

Summary: This was the best hotel we stayed in over our week hiking the california coast. The staff was wonderful, friendly, kind, and helpful. The room was pleasant, clean, tidy and nicely decorated. The warm cookies in the afternoon and popcorn, movie rental and friendly helpful faces make this a very wonderful place to stay. I highly recommend.
Manager Response: There is nothing like the California Coast for hiking is there? Truly a natural wonder of the world!  Thank you for the accolades and for making us part of your outdoor adventure.  It was our pleasure to host you and I hope we get that joy again.

Summary: Bay Shores is small older quaint hotel. Small, comfortable and a two minute walk to the beach. They include beach towel, beach chairs, umbrellas, sand toys, etc. Great, clean privately owned hotel that caters to you. Couples or families. Can't beat the location if you love the beach.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay, looks like it could be time to share our winter sunshine with you again! The adjacent Marina Project has really come along since you were here last; I think you'll really love those new walking paths and the expanded access to those wonderful views of the harbor. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Stay - Great hotel and People
Summary: Stayed for 3 nights as the end to our honeymoon and really glad we did. The hotel is fantastically located with a beach within 30 yards one side and marina the same distance the other. There are plenty of restaurants nearby with a range of food and prices as well as a series of bars.  What really stood out though was the great service. We were greeted by Warren the evening concierge as old friends and given a good talk through the hotel and the local area, and so,e free cookies! The hotel has loads of lovely little touches like this such as DVDs to borrow, beach towels and chairs all with no charge.  The room was cosy with a comfortable king size bed, plenty of sheets and pillows and all the amenities (en suite, fridge, iron etc). Tv is flat screen with a dvd player.   Breakfast
Manager Response: Many hotels aim for visitors to arrive as guests and leave as friends - we just like to get to the 'friend' part faster!  Thank you for your comments, I will of course pass them on to my staff, particularly Warren. Thank you for making Bay Shores part of your honeymoon; when it comes time to celebrate those special anniversaries, we'd love to welcome you again and celebrate with you!

Summary: This was our second time at the Bay Shores (both for a Buffett concert in Irvine).  It is a fantastic place to stay.  It's 2 blocks from the beach with an amazing rooftop deck for afternoon cocktails and to watch the sunset; continental breakfast included, daily cookies and you have Warren and Ralph!!  What more do you need.  When you walk into the hotel you feel like you're coming home, welcomed by family.   They are so helpful and will do whatever it takes to make you feel at home.  We were in room 308, the suite which was perfect for 4 of us.  JB likely won't be back to Irvine but we'll be back to Newport Beach.  Thanks for everything!!!!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to welcome you to Bay Shores where we have several Parrot Heads ourselves!  Sounds like you had a great stay on both occasions and although you mentioned that Jimmy won't be coming back (was it something I said?), we look forward to your return!

Summary: Great location.  Right in the middle of everything in Newport Beach.  Friendly staff, nice rooms with views, afternoon cookies.  Near the beach and some good restaurants.  Would definitely stay again.  Just wished they had a swimming pool.
Manager Response: I am glad you had a wonderful stay in Newport Beach and that you enjoyed the amenities of my hotel.  Hope that you come back soon!

Summary: Great location and fantastic service!  Probably the warmest hotel staff I have encountered.  From the handwritten mote to welcome us to the room, fresh fruit and cold water, everything felt very friendly.  The room spotlessly clean and the bed was comfortable. Really appreciate having a fridge in the room too.  There is a rooftop patio where you enjoy a view of the harbor in one direction and the ocean in the other!   People can take advantage of the hotels supply of umbrellas, beach chairs and beach towels and walk to the beach in a few minutes.  Wonderful location, convenient to restaurants, shopping and more. Will definitely retun here on our next trip!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for leaving such a complimentary review.  I am delighted that you found my staff to be warm and friendly and the amenities and accommodations to your liking. I look forward to your return visit; don't leave it too long!

Summary Heading: Will ALWAYS come back - felt like home!!!
Summary: I did stay at the Bay Shores with my daughter. We felt "home" after being greeted in the most friendly way by the lady at the reception (my sincerest apologies for forgetting her name). It felt like walking in a living room with cozy reading corners, a small bistro and lots of charming atmosphere. She had to excuse herself quickly during our check-in procedure to take out freshly baked Chocolate Chip cookies out of the oven!! How cool was that. My daughter happily muntching away on her warm cooky while I was finishing check-in.   Our room was impeccable: great decor, comfortable beds, large room and bathroom with wonderful amenities. The roof-top terrace was our favorite spot for breakfast: They offer you warm, huge croissants, bagels, fruits and freshly brewed coffee. We
Manager Response: It is our constant delight to warmly welcome visitors from all over the world.  Thank you for choosing my hotel and for taking the time to leave such a lovely review and for mentioning so many of our amenities.  I am glad your daughter enjoyed our cookies - I have to admit that even after decades of baking them for our guests, I still can't resist them myself!

Summary Heading: Best way to enjoy Newport Beach!
Summary: I was a bit surprised that this little hotel was #1 or 17 in Newport Beach. After a weekend stay I get it! They really go the country mile to make sure your experience is top notch. The added bonus is the rooftop with a 360 degree view that was enjoyable for sunrise, sunset and a few champagne toasts! Cheers, JZ
Manager Response: Thank you for trusting the reviews of the many hundreds who have left online comments.  As a small, independent hotel, we are very proud of our service and the vintage surfer vibe enjoyed by our thousands of guests.  I am so glad you had a wonderful stay and enjoyed our location, views and my terrific staff.

Summary: My husband and I spent 2 nights here and were extremely pleased. The staff was very helpful and polite. Room was clean and quiet with very comfortable bed. Location was directly across from beach and they even lend you beach chairs. Breakfast was also very good. I would definitely recommend this hotel if traveling to Newport Beach area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and for mentioning our wonderful location. I am delighted that you were able to have a lovely stay with us and hope you'll return soon

Summary: We found the Bay Shores on Tripadvisor, read the reviews,and booked it based on it's reviews and centralized location...Now it is my turn to add a favorable review. From the time we drove up, we were greeted with cheery, warm, personal attention...and freshly baked cookies!!! The staff was very informative about the hotel, surrounding area, and answered every question, big or small, with the same excellent customer service. Parking can be tight, especially on busy weekends, but they will do everything they can to find you a spot if there isn't one in the small lot...but we got one in the lot, then never moved our car as everything in the greater Newport area is in easy walking distance...Rooms have refrigerators and the second and third floors have ocean views...but you can
Manager Response: I so appreciate you adding your favorable comments and very happy that you enjoyed the amenities especially the rooftop lounge.  Wine and sunset, what a perfect end to the day!  I will of course pass on your compliments to the staff - I am very lucky to have such a great crew!

Summary Heading: What a gem of a place!
Summary: We stayed here at the end of our touring holiday through California, Phoenix and Nirvana, so glad that we did.  The greeting at Reception was great and they could not do enough for us, very welcoming.  The rooms are nicely decorated, each room has its own table and chairs on an outside shared balcony, breakfast is included and you help your self. Fresh fruit and flowers provided in the room.  What we found so useful, is the roof top terrace with sun beds, take your own drink up. Another nice and thoughtful and useful addition was free beach towels and the free use of all equipment such as boards, chairs, parasols etc. that you can take to the beach.  The views from the roof top are amazing, you can see the marina and the beach.  Would thoroughly recommend a stay here.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay; I am so glad that you were able to enjoy, and to mention, so many of our amenities.  The view from the rooftop lounge is quite something isn't it - I never get tired of watching the maritime activity on the channel and the waves crashing on the beach. Sounds like you had quite the tour through the US, I am so happy that you made Newport Beach part of your vacation.

Summary Heading: Great stay and great location, close to beachfront.
Summary: Had a 2 night stay here and really enjoyed it. Some of the things the have done to the hotel are quirky but are done to make the guests staying as good as possible. Tables and rocking cares on the landing outside the rooms, a great rooftop terrace with 360¬∞ views of the area. The reception and breakfast area has great made to measure wood cabinets with moguls of lighthouses and matching plates inside. Also around are model VW Camper Vans, one of my favourite motors. We were made very welcome by the staff. We have returned home now and received a postcard from the hotel thanking us for staying at the hotel. A very nice touch.
Manager Response: Thank you for leaving a review, I'm pleased you noticed and enjoyed some of our whimsical decorative elements.  The VW campers are a Southern Californian icon in the surfing community along with the 'Woody', the paneled estate cars as I believe they are known in the UK. Our staff will be delighted when I alert them to your compliments; thank you for coming to stay.

Summary Heading: Best low key hotel in the area with a great location
Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here in end of August 2015.  This hotel had a great location, right across the street from the beach and boardwalk and only a couple of blocks from Newport Pier.  The staff were all very friendly and accommodating.  The freshly baked cookies every day were also an added perk.  We really enjoyed the quaint, home-like atmosphere here.  When we arrived, there was a card on the bed with our names on it welcoming us to the hotel.  In such a corporate, technologically advanced world it is nice to see that human touch.  We would definitely recommend this hotel to others and would stay here again ourselves.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for coming to stay and for choosing our small, independently owned hotel. I do hope you'll return one day and enjoy more of our hospitality and of course those cookies!

Summary Heading: Really????  No. #1 on Trip Advisor, not a correct ranking......
Summary: I need to begin my review with the fact that my husband and I travel a lot.  Meaning two to three trips a month, either for business or pleasure.  In the last 30 days I have been to London, Palm Springs, California, Westlake, California, Las Vegas, Santa Barbara, California and next week I am off to Barcelona, Spain.  So needless to say I am an experienced, well traveled individual.    When I go on an excursion I always look to  trip advisor and yelp for both hotel recommendations, restaurants and activities of the area I am visiting.   I read most of the reviews, good and bad, to ensure that I know what I am getting.  Trip advisor and yelp have always been spot on.   Until now....  Trip advisor ranked this particular hotel #1 out of 17 hotels in Newport Beach.  The yelp rating
Manager Response: We are a small family owned and operated 1960s beach hotel and our five stars are entirely based on our excellent friendly service, cleanliness and location; we are not, and have never claimed to be, a luxury resort.   I often personally inspect the rooms, and I, along with the other 600+ online reviewers, have never seen evidence of your claims of unsanitary conditions. Our reviews are from our treasured guests and are genuine and honest; the accusation that they are scripted just leaves me saddened.

Summary: A very quaint hotel one block from the beach and two blocks from Newport Beach Pier. Incredibly friendly and helpful staff; lots of free amenities (like beach towels, beach chairs, boogy boards -- just check them out), cozy, bowl of fresh fruit in my room along with a welcoming note addressed to me personally, LARGE spacious room with ocean decor; though the room has temperature control, I slept like a baby with the window open and cool ocean air -- you can walk to anything you need. FREE parking. Awesome!
Manager Response: As a former business traveler myself, to hear that you were able to sleep like a baby while on the road, is high praise indeed! Thank you choosing us and hope we get the pleasure again next time you're on the West Coast.

Summary Heading: Friendly checkin, nice amenities, blood on headboard!
Summary: We came to Newport for a quick getaway! The hotel offered beach toys for the kids & a great location.   When we returned to our room to sleep, I noticed blood on our headboard. I did not want to scare the kids by making a big deal about it, plus it was late, so I covered it with a towel & tried to sleep.  Upon check out, I mentioned it to the man at the front desk & showed him the picture I had taken. He immediately wanted to argue with me claiming blood turns black. I have been around blood before in my profession & know with all certainty it was blood. He was rude & inconsiderate. His reaction made this experience so much worse!!
Manager Response: I can only apologize for the poor communications that occurred during your stay and assure you that I am familiarizing myself with the events that led up to your concerns.

Summary: We spent a week in California for business and leisure and went out on faith that a non-chain hotel would be okay. This place was great! Ralph was awesome as the first employee we had contact with, allowing us to show up a few hours early with only 15 minutes notice! Within that short amount of time they had our room ready complete with a card welcoming us to the hotel. The room was very well decorated, perfect for the location. Tile flooring in the entry and bathroom, appropriate for being at the beach. I would have liked to see tile or wood throughout with a rug, as the carpet was a bit dirty and definitely could use a deep cleaning or replaced. Carpet holds funky smells and it had a slight smell to the room- but it was unusual weather for them, pretty humid. That was the ONLY
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for mentioning my awesome staff.  I'm going to take a look at the carpets and see if we might move up the scheduled maintenance for that room; I appreciate your understanding that the unusual weather conditions during your stay might have played a part.  Hope we get the pleasure of your company again, thank you for posting your review.

Summary Heading: Pleasant, clean hotel close to beach
Summary: This is a pleasant, clean hotel close to the beach and convenient to good restaurants. We had a bayside view from our room which was large enough and well equipped enough for our needs. There is parking within the hotel grounds and a breakfast is provided. The staff are very eager to help but a few more clear directions inside the room would have reduced their workload (tv, safe both required staff input) Price seems quite high for this level of hotel but no complaints about adequacy of everything.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for your review.  You know, those TV remotes have gotten really complicated over the years and when it's not a familiar layout, can be quite a challenge.  I'm going to take a look at them (and the in-room safes) and see if we can't make it a bit easier on our guests by creating some simplified instructions.  Thank you for bringing it to my attention, hope to see you again.

Summary: We LOVE this hotel!! We have stayed here for our annual Newport Beach weekend for the last 7-8 years. We can park the truck and walk to different bars, shops, and restaurants and the other thing that keeps us coming back is the rooftop seating. Very peaceful overlooking the Pacific as well as the marina. The entire staff including the room attendants are just plain NICE!! I was in customer service in the Las Vegas hotel industry for "too" many years and I know how difficult it can be and these guys knock it out of the ballpark!!! Thank you BAY SHORES and see you next year!!!
Manager Response: I cannot tell you how proud I am to have earned your business for so many years.  I am blessed with terrific staff and wonderful guests like you. Thank you for taking the time post this review; after so many years I am delighted that we can continue to bring you such pleasure.

Summary: It was a very clean, pleasant, affordable, and relaxing place to stay.  The location is great, and the rooftop has a terrific 360 degree view.  They offered a very nice breakfast, hot cookies in the afternoon, plus fresh fruit and coffee all day long.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay for us and for mentioning how much you enjoyed our hospitality.  I love that rooftop view too!  Looking forward to your return.

Summary: I rarely take the time to write reviews but felt compelled to write one about this place. Me and wife stayed here for several days at the start of our honeymoon and thoroughly enjoyed our stay. All the staff were so friendly and helpful from start to finish and really made us feel welcome- we were pretty sad to leave at the end.... highlights include; how near it is to the beach, being able to hire beach stuff like bodyboards, breakfast on rooftop, daily cookies, homely rooms. Hard to fault this place.
Manager Response: I'm thrilled that you broke with your tradition and wrote a review!  We love all of our guests but always feel so honored when they have come from so far away and have decided to stay with us. I am glad you both had a wonderful time and look forward to one day having the pleasure of hosting you again.

Summary: This is a lovely hotel/motel with a perfect location right on Newport Beach and on the peninsula. The place has a wonderful rooftop terrasse with a view to the ocean and 360 degrees around Newport. The Beach is large and beautiful and nearby there are restaurants and cafes. You do not need to drive - just walk.  Rooms are fairly small (the regular ones) and the hotel needs to be updated. The breakfast is continental style. Compared to the standard It is overpriced for what it is.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us, I am glad that you enjoyed the rooftop terrace and our location. The signature of our small, friendly vintage hotel is our service and it was our pleasure to extend this to you.

Summary Heading: Perfect location, Outstanding Staff, Clean and Comfortable Room
Summary: I selected Bay Shores based on the outstanding reviews here on TA.  I was very pleased with my visit and can't say enough positive things about the outstanding front desk staff. A huge thank you to each of them for making this a great experience!!!   From the personalized and handwritten welcome card in the room upon arrival, to the personal touches (fresh fruit in the room, fresh flowers in the bathroom), the homemade chocolate chip cookies, and the thank you card I received a few days after returning home, I now know why this hotel has earned such excellent reviews and a solid return-customer base.     I stayed in a Queen room near the front of the hotel with views of W Balboa Blvd. In spite of the room being close to the blvd, I had no noise issues even though I arrived at
Manager Response: I couldn't be more proud that my staff and my property garnered such an outstanding review!  Hosting guests and sharing our wonderful town is our daily pleasure; thank you for mentioning so many of our amenities and I do hope that we'll get the privilege of hosting you again soon.

Summary: We travelled from UK and, aware that we were full on visiting friends and family in California and Colorado for a month, we decided to have a mini-break in Newport Beach first, just the two of us. Oh, we are so glad we chose the Bay Shores.  We love the luxury of our usual corporate hotels but there are different types of luxury. The luxury of this place is that you are treated like friends, your comfort is obviously their main aim. Yes, it's a little 'old-fashioned' but what's wrong with that? We loved the old school feel, the fact that we could rustle up our own breakfasts, grab cookies from reception, make a drink when we wanted.  Newport centre is just a few blocks away, as is the beach. Very busy, very lively but somehow, for retired folk like us, we thoroughly enjoyed it.
Manager Response: To forward on your belongings was a courtesy we were more than happy to extend to such pleasant guests!  Thank you for sharing part of your American vacation with us; it was our delight to meet you and now we have the pleasant prospect of anticipating your return in the future.

Summary: Perfect is an over-used adjective but in this case, it is the only description.  The location is perfect, the hospitality of the front desk and breakfast/maid service is...perfect and the views from the sun terrace are ...sublime! The room was clean, pretty and well equipped with fridge and coffee maker and the turn-down service was a lovely touch that sets this home from home accommodation apart from many others in the area.  Can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: And we can't wait for you to come back!  Thank you for your appreciation of the staff and amenities and for taking the time to write such glowing words about my hotel. The Welsh are famously hospitable and so I am very flattered that you found us a home away from home.

Summary: This was our second visit & again we were not disappointed. Perfect location, and staff who cannot do enough for you, but in a warm and friendly way. This time we had a Harbour-facing room, which did mean that we were woken early by the sun, but who wants to sleep late in Newport Beach anyway? Continental breakfast that you can eat in the breakast room, or your room, or on the sun terrace,  dependant upon the weather and how you feel. This really is a home from home, but with 2 beaches on your doorstep. Close to local restaurants, easy 1.5 mile walk to Balboa & fun-zone, and all of the beach equipment that you could ever want. Add to that free wifi & 3pm homemade cookies, who could ask for more?
Manager Response: Thank you for coming so far to stay with us and for the complimentary review.  Yes, I quite agree with your comments on the sunshine - there's nothing I like better than to enjoy Newport Beach in the morning as it readies itself for our visitors.  If you have yet to discover it for yourself, I can highly recommend a visit to the see the Dory Fleet come in with its morning catch. Just a short stroll from Bay Shores, its well worth it!

Summary: We stayed here in August 2013 - and came back for a week in June this year for a well earned rest after completing Route 66. We had a marvellous time again - thanks to Warren and the team. Always helpful and friendly - thanks again for a marvellous time!
Manager Response: We are always so delighted to host return guests!  As a lovely of cars and driving myself, I hope that you found Route 66 as engaging as always but that despite its many and fabled attractions, you were glad to find Bay Shores a welcome rest from the road.  Thank you for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you many more times in the future.

Summary Heading: Noisy without much of a view
Summary: We were sold on the great reviews this hotel received and frankly, don't agree.  Our room on the 3rd floor was SO noisy - street noise all day and night, so you could not open your windows.  The only option was the wall unit air conditioner that was not only loud but smelled terrible.  The rooms were quaint, breakfast really nice and parking a challenge as they don't have enough parking spaces for each room.  The staff is really nice, there are loaner beach chairs, towels, boards, etc. and that was great.  Just not sure how the hotel obtained a #1 rating in Newport Beach?
Manager Response: I am sorry that my hotel did not meet your expectations but hope that the features you mentioned that you did enjoy - the pleasant staff, the nice breakfast and the many free amenities - helped to ameliorate those other features which spoiled your stay. The Fourth of July is a very busy time in Newport Beach and the associated traffic from the many thousands of vacationers enjoying the holiday must have indeed contributed to the noise.  I do hope you'll consider returning at a less impacted time; I'd be delighted to once again extend our small hotel hospitality with our signature vintage vibe.

Summary: Stayed here over the July 4th holiday with the family in the Bay Suite (room 308) with two adult sons and another teenager. We couldn't have been anymore pleased with the location, friendliness and helpfulness of the staff or accommodations. The bonus was watching twelve (we counted) different fireworks from the top floor deck.   Minor areas for improvement: A/C could stand to be upgraded and the furnishings are becoming a bit dated. Neither issue would stop us from returning.
Manager Response: So glad you enjoyed the Bay Suite (Room 308), its my favorite too when I am hosting my family  - now three generations!  I will pass on your kind comments about 'friendliness and helpfulness of the staff' to my team, above anything else, they pride themselves on their customer service. The deck is just a great location for people watching, star gazing and in your case, firework enjoying - so happy that we could be part of your 4th July celebrations.  I've made a note to take a look at the A/C in your room and to have a fresh look at the furnishings - I certainly want you to be happy on your return!

Summary: My wife and I traveled to Newport Beach to be part of a surprise birthday party for our daughter set up by her husband. We decided to extend our stay and after reading great reviews, decided to stay at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel. We had planned on taking several day trips, only spending nights at the hotel. As soon as we checked into our beach view king room and went to the rooftop sundeck, plans for day trips went out the same window that the cool ocean breezes passed through. We did not move the car for the entire 5 day vacation. The location to the beach and the many local restaurants is excellent. We thoroughly enjoyed the location, cleanliness, and friendly staff and we do plan on visiting the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel on our next visit to Southern California.
Manager Response: Hearing that you didn't have to move the car in five days makes me very happy indeed!  So glad that you enjoyed our location and that your room was to your liking. Looking forward to your return visit the next time you are in California - who knows, perhaps you'll get surprised with a party!

Summary: What a nice surprise. Quaint, cute, clean beachy surf hotel. Nice clean rooms with wonderful amenities and special touches like fruit, fresh flowers, and bottled water. Bathroom had nice toiletries, cotton ball, q-tips, etc. They even provide beach towels, boogie boards, chairs etc. Lovely breakfast included, and cookies in the afternoon as well as coffee and tea provided all day. Close to everything, with a view of the ocean. Not too loud either considering they are on a main street. We will definitely return. Great customer service and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Glad we could provide the unexpected - and in a good way! Thank you for leaving such a nice review in tandem with the pleasant prospect of a return visit. Appreciate your nice words and compliments to the staff.

Summary: The staff was wonderful. Super friendly!  Room was clean and quiet. Breakfast was an added bonus!  I will definitely be back!!!  A short walk to the beach and pier. Great for families as they have chairs, toys etc to use. Cookies at night also!  You won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for sharing your experience with other travelers. Hope we'll get the pleasure of your company again soon!

Summary: This place is the best to stay in Newport, this is my third year joining my fiance's family staying here and I will definitely be coming back more often on my own. With large chains weeding a lot of the smaller places with the hometown feel, its nice to have a place like this to stay in OC/LA Area. Ralph and all the staff are beyond selfless and do whatever to serve you the best they can. Its a great setup, not quite on the sand but tucked away that its relaxing. They have fresh cookies every day, movies to rent, and any beach equipment you want to check out. Plus its a hotel, so unlike renting a beach house, you don't have to clean or worry about sheets, towels or even shampoo. Its the perfect setup for a real vacation and right in the heart of the strand so its quick to get
Manager Response: It was a pleasure to have you back - a most cherished guest - one of those who come back time and time again! You'll be welcome anytime you want to travel with or without your family; your Bay Shores family will be here waiting to greet you.

Summary Heading: Old Newport Beach in a good way!
Summary: This hotel is like you've stepped back into the 1960s or 70s in a good way.  The rooms are well decorated, comfortable and clean.   Don't expect anything fancy here though - it's a low key property with wonderful amenities including beach towels, beach chairs and even boogie boards.  The location cannot be beat for the price- just a quick 1/2 block from the beach.   They also offer a substantial breakfast each morning.
Manager Response: Your review has captured us perfectly - small, friendly and with a vintage that's us!  So glad you appreciated our amenities and that you mentioned many of them for future guests consideration.  Hoping you'll also be one of those 'future guests' ! Thank you for coming to stay.

Summary: The first minute you walk in you step back in time to a time and place where people cared for each other and are friendly and courteous. The rooms are quaint and cozy and well taken care of. Bathrooms are clean and great water! A hop skip and a jump (almost literally) to the beach and even closer to the bay! I am already making reservations for our anniversary stay!
Manager Response: Couldn't be more honored by your review and for letting us be part of your upcoming anniversary plans! For this special event, take a look at our suites.  There's some nice touches and some super views. Looking forward to hosting you again with our signature friendly, vintage vibe!

Summary: Had to rate this  hotel to write a review.  So my rate is for the customer service.We never got the opportunity to book a room with them because when I called to get rates on rooms Ralph answered and said he was busy and asked for my number and he would call back shortly.Well it has been 3 days already and I still never got a return call.  called and booked with another hotel.
Manager Response: Well, we are utterly devastated at this end. As you can see from the hundreds of other reviews 'customer service' is our hallmark - poor Ralph is just gutted. It's a shame we were unable to share with you our small, friendly hotel; perhaps the future might extend that chance.

Summary: We stayed at the Bay Shores on the last leg of our two week tour of the West Coast and it was fantastic. We arrived at 10:00pm totally exhausted and were met with a lovely warm welcome from Warren who organised us a table at the local Italian and showed us to our room. The d√©cor is classic funky surfer style with quirky bits here and there.  The bed was really comfy and although its on the road, its incredibly quiet at night which is good because the air conditioning unit was a little loud.  A home from home is the perfect way to describe this hotel as you are invited to make yourself comfy- there is a little kitchen which everyone can use throughout the day. Breakfast is a help yourself affair and there was lots to chose from including bagels, muffins, cereal, yogurt, juice,
Manager Response: We couldn't be happier to have extended our signature hospitality to such wonderful guests as yourselves!  I am so glad that you arrived home safely and that you got to enjoy our wonderful State and Newport Beach in particular.  Looking forward to welcoming you back if you should get this way again.

Summary: We found the Bay Shores Peninsula to be a great place to stay in Newport Beach.  It has a very convenient location.  The room was comfortable and clean.  The hotel staff is very helpful.  We will definitely stay there again upon a return trip to Newport Beach.
