Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host you, thank you for coming to stay; we will most certainly look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Still the best in Newport Beach
Summary: We've been going to BSP for over twenty years and it's still our favourite hotel, ever. I've already reviewed the hotel several times so don't have anything much to add personally or to what other travellers have said. Please don't change a thing.
Manager Response: We won't change a thing, if you won't change a thing about who you think is your favourite hotel ever!  Cheers for the years of great reviews from all at Bay Shores!

Summary: This is the second time that we have stayed here.  I like the location right across the road to the sand.  Also within walking distance to some restaurants. They have a nice light breakfast in the room right off the lobby. Also within walking distance to the ferry that takes you to Balboa Island for some shopping. The staff is very nice and they know the area well for questions that might arise. The room was cleaned daily and restocked.
Manager Response: We love our returning guests!  Thank you for coming back to Bay Shores and for posting your review letting other folks know about our beach location and great staff.  Hope you'll come back again real soon!

Summary: Agree with all the positive comments and points made previously. When we first arrived, we were a bit uncertain about our choice, as the exterior approach was not what we were expecting - BUT the experience was awesome. What makes this place is the people running it and that they have thought of just about everything you could expect. You can tell they take pride in this hotel which looks like it's been around in the "good old days" - but the rooms are all updated with great taste and theme. And they even will pay for your street meter parking if their own lot is full!  Who does that!? The Bayshore people make you feel like you've always been there, and treat you as if it's your home - WELL DONE and THANK YOU. PS: We were very surprised when we found out the bathroom products
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a chance after your initial reaction!  I am so glad that you loved what you found inside and that the staff really took care of you. I'm also pleased that you noticed how we had sourced the toiletries.  Took us a while to find those (after a guest suggestion!) so I am glad that you appreciated this little touch.  Hope you come back again one day.

Summary Heading: Very convenient location,clean hotel and helpful staff
Summary: I am giving this hotel/motel a 5 for the very helpful staff, the cleanliness of the room and hotel grounds. I was comfortable and felt safe. It is a small hotel,charming and would highly recommend to family and friends. There are many amenities,for example,free continental breakfast that includes:fruit,muffins,bagels,cereal,instant oatmeal,yogurt,milk, juice and coffee. A library of movie DVD's,which are free of charge(rooms have DVD players). The morning newspaper is delivered to your front door! I must add that the hotel also provides beach equipment free of charge,such as lawn chairs,towels,floating boards,footballs. As far as the proximity,the hotel sits in between a boating dock/pier and the beach, a short one block walk either way. It is a $25 cab ride from the Orange
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for letting future guests know about our convenient location, our amenities and our helpful staff.  I hope that you'll come back soon and enjoy more of what the neighborhood and Newport Beach has to offer!

Summary: This is like our home away from home. Room was very clean again. The breakfast is excellent and healthy with choices of eggs, yogurt, cereal, bagel, and a variety of fruits. The coffee is excellent! Our grandchildren loved the buckets and shovels, as well as the boogie boards. Of course, the ocean was a bit cold this time of year. Close to everything Newport, and the view from the deck is fabulous.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay again and for bringing the grandkids - Newport Beach is a great place for families isn't it? Sorry that the ocean wasn't that warm but glad that the beach toys provided some fun.  Looking forward to your next trip!

Summary: Just yards from beach and two small blocks from bars and restaurants this small and very friendly hotel has it all.  From the moment we were welcomed by jennifer and shown around our 3 night stay has been perfect.  Home cooked cookies at 3, complimentary do it yourself breakfast, loan of beach stuff and DVDs they realise the little things mean a lot.  Highly recommended and probably one of the best small hotels ever stayed in.
Manager Response: I am so glad that you had a wonderful stay;  I am always happy to receive praise from travelers who come from a seaside town themselves!  Thank you for taking the time to recommend the hotel to others, I hope that when you're back this way again, we'll once more have the pleasure of your company.

Summary Heading: Fabulous Place to stay in Newport Beach!
Summary: From the lovingly kept up rooms to the roof top deck this hotel is a just perfect place to enjoy the Newport Beach Peninsula with the beautiful beaches and historic Bay.  The beach and nautical theme throughout this property fits this area wonderfully. Everyone on the staff is most friendly and accommodating!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for coming to stay; I am so glad that you found the amenities and the decor so pleasing. Would be delighted to host you again, so come back soon from 'Canyon Country'!

Summary Heading: Great location close to beach and pier
Summary: We stayed here over spring break with our two teenage sons and loved it.  I read all the reviews and got just what I expected - a very friendly staff, clean rooms, continental breakfast, free wifi, chairs/toys for the beach, and a hotel just steps to the beach and boardwalk.  The view from the rooftop deck was wonderful to enjoy our morning coffee and breakfast.  The hotel is 1/2 block to the beach and just a 5 min walk to the Newport Pier.  You can rent bikes, stake boards and surf boards right there at the boardwalk.  I highly suggest renting bikes and go all the way down to the end of the peninsula to "The Edge" and take the ferry to Balboa Island (you can take your bikes on the ferry).  It was a great day that all of us enjoyed.   We rented the 1 bedroom suite and had a ton
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great time - I agree, renting some 'wheels' to get around is the perfect way to see more of our wonderful neighborhoods. I am now a bit beyond being able to handle the skateboards but put me on a bike, and I could peddle around the Peninsula all day! And for a family, the suites are the way to go; I am so glad that you and yours and a wonderful stay.

Summary: My family of four stayed at the Bay Shores for 3 nights for Spring Break.  We really appreciated all the special touches: the chocolates w/turn down service every night, the freshly baked cookies, and anything you need to have a fun time at the beach.  As travelers coming from the east coast, this made it possible for us to easily walk the one block to the beach w/o having to pack anything extra. We also loved the rooftop deck.  It was a great spot to have morning coffee and enjoy the complimentary breakfast, or to bring up some afternoon beverages.   Warren was super accomodating and nice, and a welcome face at the front desk each evening. All in all, staying at Bay Shores made for a very relaxing start to our trip.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming across the Country to spend your spring break with us!  I'm glad you enjoyed our amenities and that the location and little extras allowed you to travel light! Come back anytime; we'd love for you to have that same relaxing experience again and again.

Summary: My family of three stayed at Bay Shores one night during Spring Break. Great location (one block to beach plus lots of restaurants and shops within walking distance), great accommodations, great service. Don't hesitate to stay here, hopefully we'll get back one day.
Manager Response: We hope you'll be back one day too!  Thank you for sharing your Spring Break with us - sounds like you had a grand time!

Summary: We stayed at the Bay Shores this time just as a quick "mini-break". It is a wonderful place to stay close to our favorite beach. We walked to the Crab Cooker, sat on the rooftop deck and just had a lovely time. We couldn't figure out how to use the dvd player, but we found something else to do instead ! Wink. wink. Lots of breakfast choices-yum!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for leaving us a nice review.  Sounds like you had fun while you stayed with us and was able to enjoy many of the onsite and local amenities. Hoping to see you back soon!

Summary Heading: Beach Hotel - How does it stay so CLEAN?
Summary: I've stayed here a few times over the last 6-8 years. As mentioined in other reviews, the staff is helpful and friendly; good complimentary breakfast. A block or so from the beach (a really nice, large beach, by the way.  This hotel has many nice touches -or freebies including beach equipment! I'm sure there are rooms with better views than the ones I've had; but if you walk to the roof deck or out the front door, you get your "View fix".  What never ceases to blow me away is how clean this place is. You figure: families, beach, free food - all should add up to rooms that are difficult to keep clean. But they are SPOTLESS!  Fairly large room mini-fridge; free wi-fi; comfy bed; nice water pressure in the shower; room safe. My only tip would be if you are renting a car and coming
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us so many times over the years. As someone who used to travel a great deal for business, I have tried to provide as much for the comfort of those on the road as well as those who are here on vacation.  I so appreciate you mentioning the cleanliness of the hotel, which is entirely due to the dedication of my terrific staff. Glad you had another wonderful visit!

Summary Heading: Great holidays - excellent hotel - wonderful place!
Summary: I always read reviews before booking the hotel. Thanks to tripadvisor that helps me to find this great hotel. When we stopped for the first time, Warren showed us everything in the hotel, he was so kind and friendly!!! He helped us to choose a restaurant for the dinner. I liked the room, it's very beautiful! The beach is so near and it's huge! Free parking and coffee all day. The breakfast included and it's free also. I loved the walking here and the sunset!
Manager Response: Our sunsets are really something aren't they - I know it's the same sun that everyone has, but somehow, it just looks better in Newport Beach! So glad that you came to stay; hope you'll come again.

Summary: My wife and I stayed at this gem of a small hotel on Balboa Blvd in Newport CA for four nights recently (March of 2015)  It is a great find in Southern CA.  Very clean and convenient to everything on the Balboa Peninsula. The staff was very helpful, the rooms nice and clean, parking was available.  Nice breakfast along with fresh homemade cookies every afternoon.  Where we will stay any time we are in the area of Newport Beach.
Manager Response: We love our repeat guests! Thank you so much for coming to stay again; I am so glad that once again you had a great time.

Summary Heading: An Absolute Gem in Newport Beach!
Summary: I recently spent four nights here and the hotel is in a fantastic location just steps from the boardwalk between Balboa Pier and Newport Pier (the hotel is located just a couple blocks from Newport Pier).  It is an easy walk to several restaurants at the pier and a longer walk, but really pleasant, to Balboa Pier and the ferry to Balboa Island.  We had two king bed rooms as we were traveling with my elderly (80's) parents.  Both rooms were large, comfortable and spotlessly clean.  A small bowl of fresh fruit was left in the rooms every day which was such a nice touch!  The breakfast was decent and fresh cookies were available in the lobby every day.  The hotel is family owned and operated and every staff person we encountered was friendly, helpful and knowledgeable.  We felt
Manager Response: Thank you so much for coming stay.  I am so glad that you were all comfortable and that both parties found the rooms to their liking.  Happy you enjoyed the fresh fruit too!

Summary: What a neat little hotel with very charming and with lots of love designed rooms. The staff is overwhelmingly friendly and helpful.  Seats on the rooftop to enjoy breakfast with a sea view. The walking distance anywhere is absolutely bearable and you they offer free parking, even if their own spaces are full. They offer coffee around the clock, every day freshly homemade cookies and when we arrived back home we found a postcard from them in our mailbox. This is just a gesture but we will definitely return. Thanks so much, you made our short stay memorable!
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to host you!  Happy to provide the little 'gestures' and looking forward to your return.

Summary: What a wonderful place to stay in Newport Beach, the location is fantastic and the staff have the best customer service I have seen anywhere, we even had a thank you postcard in our mailbox on arriving home in Australia.  You also can't beat the value for money Bay Shores provides. Thanks Warren and everyone else, we will definitely stay with you again.
Manager Response: I always love reading reviews from fellow residents of coastal communities - you have such high standards!  Thank you for staying with us during your recent trip to the US, happy to host and hope we have the pleasure of your company again in the future.

Summary Heading: Take this place for what it is folks
Summary: I rated this charming place "Excellent".  Remember: this is a beach hotel, 1 street literally from the beach, run by super friendly people, CLEAN, with laundry facilities which was one thing we needed into our 2 week vacation.  So I was happy.   Making the reservation on the phone, the gentleman could not have been more friendly, our check in Gal was super.  The room was cute, older, but really clean as was the washroom which can be telling.  Housekeeping does a wonderful job and they are smiling!!!  Not like other places so they must be treated well?.  Both nights we had to park in their "secret, extra spots"...they will tell you about it if you come in to tell them the parking lot is full.  :)  Breakfast is not really something I would eat, some prepackaged food, but hot
Manager Response: Thank you for your 'excellent' rating and for taking the time in your review to capture our 'small, friendly, vintage vibe'. I so appreciate you spending an entire fortnight with us and am glad that during your extended stay, the laundry and the location were a help. Looking forward to hosting you again!

Summary: We just spent the 25th-27th at the Bayshores Hotel. We have stayed in wonderful hotels all over the country and the world, and never had better service! The rooms are well designed and comfortable. With construction next door parking would be and issue; exceot the staff is all over it. We pulled in at 1AM and the desk clerk came out and directed us to a spot off the alley! (At 1AM!!!) The location is perfect for many reasons the roof top deck is a great spot in the morning and evening and the breakfast is just about right.  The next time we go to Orange County we will not look for another place to stay, we are big fans!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and thank you for working with us while our neighbors continue their construction project - we keep telling ourselves how great it will be when it's done! Glad you got to enjoy the rooftop and that breakfast got your morning off to a super start.  Looking forward to hosting you again soon.

Summary: This was the first time we stayed at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel.  It is now at the top of our list for future trips.  Not only is the hotel very up to date, clean, and quaint with great personable service via front desk personnel, it was in a perfect location to watch the Newport Beach Christmas Boat Parade.  We only had to walk behind the hotel to the bay, set up our lawn chairs provided by Bay Shores on the beach, and enjoy the decorated boats as they passed in front of us.  What a view, what a special moment.  Sunset walk on pier half a block away was also a memorable moment.
Manager Response: Isn't that Boat Parade just great? My family and I just never get tired of it! Thank you so much for your review and for specifically mentioning our location and customer service.  Hope we'll have the pleasure of your company next time that 'festive flotilla' passes by!

Summary: I always stay at this hotel when I am in the the area, It is quaint, comfortable, and the staff could not be more helpful.  I arrived very late on 2/16, and night manager Bruce gave a warm welcome  offered me late night snack from the pantry !  The place is peaceful and has an incredible  location, even for a quick, short  walk to the beach when travelling on business!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for selecting my hotel during your recent trip.  I've done my share of time on the road so very much appreciate your comments from a business traveler point of view. Glad that Bruce made sure you retired for the night well-fed and cared for - being on the road can be brutal can't it!  Hoping to be your lodging choice again the next time you're in the area.

Summary: If your a business traveler and used to the Marriott or Hilton this place is not for you. If you are looking for a small boutique hotel that has excellent location to the beach and downtown Newport area this is the place to stay.   The hotel offers excellent customer service , breakfast amenities , and just a great overall experience , quite better than the normal business hotels. Beautiful, clean rooms . Fresh baked cookies every day .   The beach is less than a 2 min walk across the street and the bay is a 2 min walk in the other direction.   We will be back next time we are in Newport area !!
Manager Response: Thank you for highlighting what we do best - we're small, we're friendly and we have that vintage vibe that guests for over fifty years love so much.  Looking forward to you coming to stay again!

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for our annual family christmas get together. The hotel rooms were clean and the suite we stayed in was very roomy. The rest of the family enjoyed their single rooms as well. The property is well maintained and the staff is super nice and helpful.  If we ever make our way back to Newport we will be staying here again! A+++++++++
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing your family to my families' hotel.  I am so happy that you all had a great time and look forward to hosting you again!

Summary: Vintage vibe in very nice hotel. Rooms are small but very quaint with beach theme decor. Wonderful hotel personnel that make the stay! Nice touches include freshly baked evening cookies, morning newpaper at doorstep, roof top deck that overlooks the town and two chairs and table outside each room with view of courtyard. Front desk was extremely helpful with great suggestions on walks and dining options. Location is fairly quiet and well located for walking into town shopping and dining areas,or stroll along coast to pier. Breakfast is self serve with typical cereal, bagels, muffins and juice etc. Adequate for easy start to your day. I would highly recommend this hotel and I am really glad we were able to obtain a last minute one night booking.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for taking the time to write an extensive review.  Glad you were able to enjoy so many of the amenities from the morning newspaper to the evening cookie! Looking forward to the vintage vibe attracting you again.

Summary Heading: Great Location!  Great Service! Great Place!
Summary: Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel is a great place to stay! We wanted a short getaway for my husbands birthday so we picked the Bay Shores.  We weren't sorry!  The staff does everything possible to make your stay great. They are extra helpful and quick to assist with anything you might want or need.   We asked for dining recommendations and were given several.  All great places. ( Il Faro was a favorite)  All within walking distance as the hotel is situated about 3 blocks from the pier where many restaurants, bars and shops are located. The breakfast is nice with a few 'extras' you don't find other places offering a continental meal.  My husband loved the breakfast sandwiches and muffins while I enjoyed the hard boiled eggs and bagels. They  also have coffee and tea available all day
Manager Response: Thank you for your extensive review and for mentioning so many of our amenities. Sounds like you had a wonderful trip and am glad that Bay Shores was your destination of choice.  Hope we'll see you again soon.  I know from personal experience that Bakersfield can heat up quickly in the summer - we'll have cooling ocean breezes when you need some respite!

Summary Heading: Small Hotel with Old Fashioned Attention to Detail
Summary: We saw this small hotel had great reviews on Trip Adviser and decided to give it a try. We were not disappointed. It is not a fancy hotel, but warm and inviting with many amenities and old fashioned values for comfort. For instance there is free wifi, a safe, a small frig, a make up mirror in the bathroom, a night light, several mirrors, a separate make up vanity, turn down service with chocolates and a newspaper at your door every morning. The regular rooms are a little small, but just fine with everything else. There are three suites and court yard parking. They feed the meter for you should you have to park on the street. We thoroughly enjoyed the roof top patio with a view of the bay on one side and the ocean on the other. We also loved the cozy, well decorated breakfast
Manager Response: Thank you for giving us a try and for enjoying our small but welcoming atmosphere.  Regarding the Marina project, the master plan looks like it will really be a wonderful addition to our neighborhood so we are looking forward to its completion.  When you return, I hope you'll be able to enjoy the walking paths and park that will be adjacent to the hotel and the extended access to the waterfront. In the meantime, thank you for your review and glad that you had a great stay.

Summary: Another great trip to CA and this year the weather cooperated as well........warm and sunnyüòÑ. So we really enjoyed the roof top deck!!!!  Our 3 visit to this hotel, and was happy to see Warren still working the front desk, he is very helpful for places to see and go!!!  Cookies are still warm but much prefer the chocolate chip over the peanut butter !!!
Manager Response: Umm, Chocolate Chip versus Peanut Butter?  I think we should run a poll on our Facebook page!  So glad you were able to come and stay again, we just love our return guests.  Happy that you had better weather this time too.  Thank you for always leaving such great reviews!

Summary: I stayed here for 2 nights and it's a wonderful hotel! Very well located with an awesome view. The staff was very very friendly and the room was really comfortable. Breakfast is simple but great and very delicious. Kudos for the rooftop. (y) (y) (y)
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for coming to stay with us. The view from the roof is lovely isn't it -so glad you were able to enjoy that part of the hotel.

Summary: Stayed here 4 days rooms were excellent,staff very helpful nothing to much trouble.There was a terrace on the roof which was very good just to relax,a lot of the guests did'nt go up, you had a lovely view of the harbour,as well as sun lounges for your pleasure. Breakfast was available in a nice little quaint room,also the Los Angeles times was delivered to you door daily.We will be looking forward to staying again at some point.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming so far and for sharing part of your US holiday with us. Glad you were able enjoy all of our amenities especially the roof - got to love that view! Hope you're able to come back one day. Thank you for your review.

Summary: After an exhausting week, we needed a place to crash on our way to and from San Diego and chose this little gem.  The hotel is in a great location and as others have noted, the staff is very friendly and helpful.  We were in Room 306 with a corner view of the boats docked in the bay and the room was comfortable and clean.    I can't think of one single reason not to go back... so we booked a week in July and will be bringing the kids so those boogie boards by the back door will get some use!
Manager Response: So glad you'll be coming back - we love it when a guest has time to use all of the amenities!  See you in July.

Summary: We recently spend 4 nights at the Bay Shores Hotel.  The reviews were very spot on.  Great location. Friendly  staff.  Very clean rooms. Great rates. Nice breakfast. Daily papers.  My room had a good view. It‚Äôs everything I expected. Parking was limited, but I didn‚Äôt have a problem. And apparently I missed the great cookies offered daily. Bottom line I would recommend and will stay there next year during my annual visit.
Manager Response: Oh, I am so sorry you missed the cookies - it's not a proper stay at Bay Shores without a cookie!!  When you come back, they are served every day after 3pm in the lobby.  If you think you'll be back later than that each day, just ask the staff to hold you one back at the front desk;  I know that they will be more than happy you oblige. Thank you for the great review, and see you next year!

Summary: Had a great time. Hotel staff very helpful( able to give us direction how to get to different   locations  in town for us out of towners) and kind. Had a wonderful  10 year anniversary with my wife loved the location very close to the beach .nice veiw on the roof top.thanks.
Manager Response: So glad you had a great stay and to happy to be part of such a wonderful celebration - congratulations on 10 years, I wish you many more!

Summary: My husband and I used Newport Beach as a stopover on our way home to the UK from NZ This hotel is a little gem! Lovely staff, comfortable rooms and a free yummy breakfast. The hotel is in a great location.
Manager Response: So glad we could be a pleasant break from your long haul from New Zealand. Hope you arrived home safely in the UK after the long journey.  Happy to see you again the next time you make such a long trip.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at the Bay Shore Inn last week.  While not the fanciest hotel, the room was extremely clean, the staff wonderful and the complimentary breakfast was more than sufficient.  We stayed in the Bay Shore Suite and enjoyed sitting on the balcony watching the boats.  While not on the water, I would highly recommend staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review; I am glad you enjoyed the Bay Suite - it's my favorite place to be when my family comes to stay! Hoping you'll come again and repeat your pleasant experience.

Summary: This hotel was recommended to me by family. My husband and I stayed here for a duration of our honeymoon and loved it. Our room was clean and the staff extremely friendly and professional. The amenities (breakfast, free DVD and beach equipment rentals, WIFI and much more) make this place an ideal location when visiting Newport. The beach and Newport pier are within short walking distance making this hotel a convenient, hassle free place to stay when visiting an otherwise congested and busy vacation spot.
Manager Response: Congratulations on your recent marriage and thank you for making Bay Shores a part of this very special moment in your lives. I am so glad that you had a wonderful time while staying with us and hope that we might be part of all of your many future anniversaries.

Summary: We stayed here over Christmas while visiting family in the area. Everyone was helpful and friendly. The location was perfect for beach, walking and biking. The upstairs deck had beautiful views of the harbor and beach. Breakfast was adequate,afternoon cookies and fresh fruit were great! A comfortable place for a reasonable rate!
Manager Response: I am so glad that a stay at Bay Shores was part of your Christmas celebration! From your location, I am surmising that you know a little about the pleasures of coastal living and so I very much appreciate your positive comments about our location and hospitality.  Please come and stay again the next time you are in the area - Happy New Year!

Summary: We stayed at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel last night and received such FANTASTIC service, I had to jump on and leave a review. I booked online and spoke with Warren over the phone before we arrived. He was probably the friendliest host I've ever encountered. We were greeted, by him, with a smile, freshly baked cookies, and an informative "welcome" as we were handed our room keys. He even called a cab for us. We had a personalized welcome card waiting for us on our pillows, along with some chocolate. Red carpet treatment throughout our stay.. and I appreciated every effort! We'll be back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review - I couldn't be more pleased.  Sounds like from reservation to stay, you were able to experience the service we are most proud of, our customer service!  I look forward to the privilege of hosting you again soon but until then, on behalf of all the staff who made your last stay great - a very Happy New Year!

Summary: This is a nice hotel close to a lot of sites and restaurants on the Balboa Peninsula.  The rooms are always clean and the staff friendly and attentive.  The breakfast in the morning is good and the afternoon cookies are great.  The only thing that would help is more parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay again; I am glad you another great experience at Bay Shores.  Thank you for the comment about the parking; due to the ongoing project next door, we have lost a number of spaces normally available to us.  I so appreciate your patience and please remember that if you ever have difficulty parking, the staff will take care of that for you on the spot!

Summary Heading: Fair Value for a Boutique Hotel
Summary: The Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel stand out as the top hotel in the TripAdvisor and I believe it has the qualification being so.  However it is important to point out that this hotel has many outstanding qualities and quite a few weakness as well.  Hopefully my review can give proper guidance for future guests to make their educated choice.    Location of the property is good for visitor concentrated in Newport Beach area and may be inconvenient for generic visitor to the area.  Facilities within the property are quite limited.  Rooms are rather small and simple furnished.  Facilities are limited, eg. no fitness room, limited self-service breakfast, and limited free self-parking area.  However they tried to make up with excellent front office services.  The room is well maintain
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay.  As an experienced traveler you rightly identified us as a small boutique hotel.  While we do not have the range of facilities that a large corporate chain may offer, I am so glad that you were able to fully enjoy that which we do have in abundance, courtesy, attention to detail and outstanding customer service.

Summary: If you like being across from the beach, within walking distance to shops and restaurants and pay a reasonable rate then this is the place!  Bay Shores is a privately owned, small property so you get that intimate feeling of staying in a cozy place and knowing the people who work there.  The folks at the front desk are very friendly and helpful.  I used to live in Huntington Beach so I know my way around.  Even with that I still enjoyed the staff's recommendations for many local things.  The rooftop is nice for morning coffee.  Parking is easy with street parking and a metered lot.  Everything is conveniently located around the property.  I certainly enjoyed felling like a local staying here!
Manager Response: Thank you for returning to your roots and for posting such a nice review. I am so glad that the staff took great care of you and that you were able to enjoy Newport Beach from a locals perspective. Hope you'll come back soon; there is so much more to share!

Summary: We were so glad friends tipped us off to this small hotel for our short Newport Beach visit.  This is not a fancy hotel but the staff make you feel like a million bucks!  Everyone there is friendly and helpful and no opportunity for good hospitality is overlooked.  Breakfast is good and the fresh-baked cookies in the afternoon were a real treat.  We had an upstairs king room with a view towards the beach.  While not fancy, the room was very comfortable and attention is paid to the details, like artwork, fresh flowers, and bathroom amenities.  Just a great space to be in.  Nice flat screen TV and the wi-fi worked great.  The location is just great, between the beach and the bay.  Easy to walk a short distance to the Newport Pier and many good restaurants.  Plenty of opportunity
Manager Response: We are glad that your friends tipped you off too.  It was our delight to host you and we look forward to your return!

Summary: My husband & I spend his birthday this past October & have already booked another trip.  Everything was wonderful, from the cookies at check in to free the breakfast.  The room was comfortable & the sitting area outside the room was lovely.  The rooftop patio was a nice place to have breakfast or just to enjoy the views.  Looking forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great birthday stay and thank you for already booking your next trip! Knowing you'll have just as nice a time, looking forward to your return.

Summary: My wife and i spent a delightful night at Bay Shores in Newport Beach on November 10. From the moment we checked in to the moment we checked out- everything was top notch. The home- baked chocolate chip cookies at check in (3pm) set the tone for this delightful and personal hotel. Our room with 2 queen beds was immaculate, spacious and very comfortable. I appreciated the multiple electrical plugs throughout (yes, we have too many devices). The beach access is just across the street and the roof deck is the perfect place for an evening sunset. The friendly and helpful staff was outstanding. This will be our place to stay in Newport.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to submit your review and, despite the provision of multiple electrical plugs, for taking time away from the screens to enjoy the sunset from the roof!  Come back soon, though leaving somewhere as beautiful as San Miguel must be hard!

Summary: Was only here briefly but, from the moment I walked in, I knew I was in the type of hotel I like. Privately owned. Not a chain. Oozing character. I like the location and the room was fine. I will definitely try to return.
Manager Response: Looking forward to extending the experience you got a brief taste of; hope you'll be back soon!

Summary Heading: Nothing but good things to say
Summary: This was such a cute place! Right across from the beach, they provide you w/ towels, umbrellas, basically everything but a swimsuit. Really friendly staff, comfortable room, shampoo, soap and lotion were vegan (if you care). Most relaxing stay I've had.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for all the good things you had to say! As a quick note, we've spent considerable time selecting the vendors for our in-room soaps and lotions and so am very pleased that you noticed.  if you have any other tips or suggestions you'd like to pass on for how we can make considerate choices for all of our guests, I'd be delighted to hear.

Summary: If you want to stay in a very clean and comfortable place while visiting Newport Beach California, this is the place.  From the time we walked in the front door to check in, we were impressed with the friendly staff, the cleanliness of the place and it's location (1 block from the beach).  The warm cookies sealed the deal.  The room was very clean and the bed comfortable.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and for highlighting our friendliness and cleanliness. Sounds like you had a great stay and btw..I'm right there with you on the cookies!

Summary: Stayed for 4 nights in Newport at bayshores. From the second we arrived warren greeted us with a huge welcome and we felt very comfortable/welcome the whole stay, the staff really couldn't be more helpful and friendly   Rooms were cute, maybe but small but Newport real estate at a premium. Hotel is right next to the beach   Loved the small details like afternoon cookies, free coffees and use of beach towls and boards etc  Highly recommend and will be back again as 4 nights not enough time   Thanks again
Manager Response: So glad you had a great stay and that you appreciated the small details and the attention of the staff. Looking forward to hosting you for a longer stay when you return.  Thank you for taking the time to post your review.

Summary Heading: A charming and relaxing place to stay.
Summary: Upon reading one negative review, I decided this would be a great place for my family to stay. Breakfast in the morning up on the rooftop, located a block away from the beach, quiet time after 10:00 pm. Yep, this was the place for us. The staff was excellent. They were friendly and very helpful. We stayed in the first floor suite, which gave us a little privacy, and there was a gate for quick street access. The places we wanted to visit was all within walking distance. We liked our stay so much I reserved out next stay before checking out.
Manager Response: So glad that you decided that we were the place for you and thank you for already booking your next stay! Looking forward to your return and to your further enjoyment of Bay Shores and Newport Beach.

Summary: We have stayed at Bay Shores many times during the previous 10 years and will stay here many more.  For beach bums like us, this is the perfect location.  1 short block from the ocean and a few hundred yards from the bay.  The Bay employees treat us like family and are always pleasant and helpful!  This trip was slightly affected by parking problems because of construction but that will be resolved by 2016.  We do have a couple of suggestions:  Change the toilets to a more modern, elongated design.  Make some updates to room decor and carpet going up the stairs.  After at least 10 years,  it's time for a face lift.  We really appreciate the special touches like good quality toiletries, etc.
Manager Response: We appreciate all of our guests but we particularly appreciate our repeat guests; thank you for choosing us for so many of your vacations! I'll take a look at those places that might be needing some TLC and as an update on the parking challenges, the adjacent construction project has now moved on to a point where the City has been able to restore those spaces closest to the hotel.  Hopefully, we are on our way back to normalcy but thank you for your patience!

Summary: A really great hotel run by very helpful people who genuinely want you to enjoy your stay. Nice thoughtful touches abound such as boogie boards and beach towels for the guests, tea and cookies available 24/7, and well designed comfortable rooms.  The location is fantastic!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a complimentary review. We sincerely appreciate the opportunity to host each and every guest and it was our delight to have you come and stay.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for three nights, because after a spending quiet some time on the road visiting Vegas and a couple of national parks, we wanted to spend some time on the beach.   This place is just wonderful. It is located just one block from the beach, you can see the ocean from a couple of rooms and the rooftop patio. Our room (306) was facing a quiet backroad and we could see a little bit of the bay (left) and the ocean (right). Although there was some construction work going on, we slept well and noise was not an issue.   The room was nice and I was suprised of the size. In the pictures it looked smaller. Everything was very clean and well maintained. Loved the artwork in the room.   Breakfast was nice, especially because you could have it on the rooftoop deck with a
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for writing such a complimentary and expansive review.  Sounds like you had a wonderful time in the area. Vielen Dank f√ºr Ihre Kommentare. Hoffen, dass Sie zur√ºckkehren.

Summary: Just returned home form a weekend stay- was fantastic. Service, location, rooms, d√©cor, food. Best of all was the staff they are the best. We appreciated all the little extras that were BIG to us. We will be back- love it.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for your complimentary review.  So pleased that you thought that even though we are a 'small' hotel, or service and amenities were 'big'! Hope to see you again one day.

Summary: We were going to attend a wedding on one of the harbor boats on Sat. night and stayed at the Bay Shores that night.  We were very happy with our room as it had a wonderful breeze coming from the ocean.  A new feature that we really enjoyed was the CD that was in the radio was one of those mellow music ones to sleep by.  Of course we enjoyed the hot fresh cookies in the late afternoon.  The only drawback is the parking, and that is absolutely not the fault of the management.  The city is building a new dock area but you can park at the meters in front and they will pay for it for you.  They go all out to please their guests and a good example is Warren, the night manager.  We came back late from the wedding and there was no where to park so he went out and moved his car so we
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely review and for mentioning the parking challenges we are having.  I sincerely appreciate you absolving the hotel from the distinct inconvenience that the adjacent development is imposing. While we do still have our own parking lot, and of course the attention of the staff to this difficulty, we thank you for your understanding regarding the construction.

Summary: The staff and owners simply rock.  There are so many examples of extras, that make the stay here so comfortable, that I will probably leave many out.  So, just to name the ones that come easily and immediately to mind:  freshly baked cookies in the afternoon, beach toys and towels provided, small fridge in the room, simple breakfast that has a variety of healthy choices, newspapers in the morning, and a couple of beach cruisers and wide selection of dvds to borrow.  We had a few questions, about some development in the area, and our questions were patiently and thoroughly answered.  We even got a personal note, thanking us for our stay at the hotel.  The thing is that the location is so perfect, they could probably get away with not supplying all these things, or going the extra
Manager Response: Thank you so very much for your review, I am delighted that you had a great stay and that you were equally delighted with our amenities.  It is our pleasure to go the extra mile for our guests because you are the reason we have been in the hospitality business for over fifty years. I do hope that you'll be able to come back one day, until then, on behalf of all the staff, my thanks.

Summary: We booked a last minute weekend to Newport Beach to get away from the heat in Phoenix. I picked this hotel based on the TripAdvisor reviews and the very reasonable price. I couldn't have been more pleased. Everything was exactly as advertised and the personalized service was outstanding. Especially considering how affordable this hotel is. We had the handicap accessible room on the first floor and it was very nice. The bed was comfortable and I was surprised to see shampoo AND conditioner offered. The location is great. We rented bikes for the weekend and didn't touch our car the entire stay. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Last minute bookings, aren't they the best vacations!  So glad we could give you some relief from the desert heat.  Don't hesitate to call us anytime it get's oppresive weatherwise; as you know, the cooling ocean is just steps from the hotel.

Summary: This Hotel was literally right across the street from the Beach.  The rooms were nice and clean and the staff was wonderful!  I would absolutely recommend staying here and when I come back  this is where I'm staying.  It's also very easy to get around-- driving wise and walking.
Manager Response: I am so glad that you'll be coming back to stay!  Hope the nuptials went well; very happy that we could be part of them in some small way. Thank you for the review; I really appreciate you letting others know about your experience.

Summary: This was an amazing, retro motel.  From the moment we arrived to the aroma of fresh baked cookies, until the time we departed 3 days later, we loved every moment of this extraordinary inn.  Warren, our innkeeper, was amazing.  He advised us of all of our local amenties, and offfered us the very best opportunities regarding Newport Beach.  Every aspect of the Bayshores Inn was inviting, clean, comfortable & charming.  We adored our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us and for taking the time to write such a complimentary review. I am so glad that my staff took such great care of you and that you enjoyed staying at my hotel

Summary: not the poshest, nor the trendiest but the nicest place we stayed in on our USA trip. By far the best staff - real genuine people that mean what they say and genuinely care. The whole place has a home from home feel and everything works perfectly (air con, breakfast etc). Stones throw from the beach and wonderful roof top terrace.
Manager Response: Your review means so very much to us all.  The attributes you highlighted (genuine and caring) are the very foundation of our service.  Thank you so much for taking the time to write; I hope we get the pleasure of your company once more when you tour the US again.

Summary: My wife & I thoroughly enjoyed our three night stay at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel. Just across the road is 18th Street which is on Newport Beach. We were lucky to be there to see the huge waves caused by the remains of Hurricane Marie. The hotel is a short cab fare from Balboa Island, we recommend a visit to Catalina Island, it's just an hour away on the 'flyer'. Our room was on the small side but the bed was comfortable & the bathroom was clean. The staff were very friendly & helpful. The breakfast consisted of coffee, muffins, croissants etc. which is quite adequate. Newport Beach is a wonderful place to visit & we will return to this hotel again no doubt.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming so far and for choosing my hotel!  Those waves were really something weren't they? While 'The Wedge' is always something to catch the attention, that was in a different league! Glad you stayed safe while watching Mother Nature and that if you come back, you'll be staying with us.

Summary: This hotel is great!  We quickly checked in, got towels, chairs, umbrella and walked across the road for perfect afternoon on the beach. Everyone working at the hotel was helpful and happy. The room was clean and spacious, location was ideal, breakfast was yummy. The hotel already has a ton of wonderful reviews and we know why!
Manager Response: So happy that you came to stay and that you added your voice to the "ton of wonderful reviews"! Sounds like you had fun and that my staff took good care of you.  Hope we see you again one day.

Summary: Traveling with 3 college-age kids, we stayed at Bay Shores as first stop in California. Outstanding, and better than photos suggest: friendly, convenient and fun, with great restaurants nearby. We traveled by rental car, and parking was a minor issue, as hotel was full and street parking is limited, but staff made sure it was not a problem.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and glad the kids had a great time. Yes, the parking can be a bit of a squeeze but as you found out, if our guests need to use the city lot next door, we feed the meter for you!  Hope the rest of your trip was great too and that we see you all again one day.

Summary Heading: The Best Place to Stay in Newport Beach...Period!!!
Summary: I have stayed at the Bay Shores Penninsula Hotel several times now, first on business and then recently on personal travel and I am always impressed by the stellar service and the quaint charm this 25 room hotel provides its guests.   On my most recent trip the staff was kind enough to honor our request for a beachview room and was always extremely personable and attentive to our every need.   All of the staff members are very friendly and customer focused, however I would like to make particular mention of Warren and Ralph who have always gone out of their way to ensure a memorbale stay.        You will enjoy the personal touches such as the varierty of breakfast items, afternoon cookies, bottled water, beach umbrellas, chairs and towels which are all complimentary.   The
Manager Response: We love all our guests but particularly those who like you, come back time and time again.  I am honored that, when you have such a range of choices in Newport Beach, you choose my hotel.  I will pass on your particular compliments to Ralph and Warren and am glad that all my staff took great care of you.

Summary: We booked this place on a trip from Australia and we were so happy with our choice! Staff were amazingly friendly, breakfast included and the rooms were really comfortable. I would recommend this hotel to anyone who is looking for something with a bit of old world charm that's different from every other hotel you stay in.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming so far to see us and for taking the time to write the lovely review. Glad that you appreciated our vintage vibe and for naming us 'Best on the Boulevard' - looking forward to using that quote in an future newsletter! Hope you had a safe trip home and that we get to enjoy your company one day in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights as part of our honeymoon.  We had a warm welcome and show around.  The room was available to us straight away.  The room was very nice and had all of the amenities we needed. We were able to use beach equipment free of charge from the hotel. (which is literally just across the road from the beach). They have homemade cookies on a daily basis!!  There is a roof terrace with tables and chairs. The location is amazing. We loved it here and even received a thank you postcard from the owner!
Manager Response: Congratulations on your recent marriage and thank you for honoring us with being part of your honeymoon! Sounds like you had a lovely time; perhaps we'll get the pleasure of your company on subsequent anniversaries!

Summary: Mom and I did a "bucket list" two day trip to Newport, shopping all day one day at South Coast Plaza and Crystal Court, stayed at the Bay Shores that night and shopped Fashion Island the next day. A friend warned me away from the peninsula this time of year due to " a lot of partying". However, after reading that the hotel does not do reservations for anyone under a certain age and seeing all the great reviews, we decided to go for it. Included breakfast and cookies in the afternoon helped, too! We were very pleased with the location, the property, the staff (and cookies!). Everything was neat and clean, parking a little tight but worked out on the street nearby. A quick walk to the beach for an early morning walk after coffee in the room. Did I mention the cookies? Breakfast of
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for particularly mentioning that we are not a party hotel. There are plenty of hotels in Newport Beach which are; we are just not one of them. Glad that you were able to take a couple of things off your bucket list - happy to oblige with "eating a delicious, fresh baked cookie at Bay Shores" !

Summary Heading: Best Place to stay in NB !!
Summary: Favorite place to stay when I'm in the area. Rooms are clean, hotel is in a great location close to both the Newport and Balboa piers. Food and drink are just a short stroll away in a beautiful setting regardless of your desired choice. All you need for a day at the beach is at your disposal and the staff is always there to give you options. Bruce has always come through with great suggestions and recommendations for dinner and fun.
Manager Response: So glad you had a wonderful time and thank you for being a much valued repeat guest! Sounds like you were able to enjoy many of our amenities and that my staff took care of you with regards to restaurants and attractions.  Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: A pleasant change from the typical hotel
Summary: Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel is a friendly, clean, comfortable hotel with a nice continental breakfast served each morning.  It is located just a block from the beach, is close to Newport Pier and about 1 1/2 miles from Balboa Pier.  One thing to be aware of is that not all rooms have elevator access, so if climbing stairs is difficult, be sure your room has elevator access.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us and for the nice review. Good note on the stairs for future guests; we do have plenty of lovely rooms accessible by elevator or on the ground floor. Just let us know at time of booking or when you check in.

Summary: Lovely rooms with great toiletries, safety deposit box,  fridge and wifi. The staff were friendly and helpful, free hire of beach towels, chairs, umbrellas, boggie boards and beach toys was great. Cookies in reception each afternoon was definitely a highlight for me! Also a vast selection of DVD's in reception for free hire was great.   Great location, super breakfast, quiet and safe at night and across the road from the beautiful beach, the harbour is behind the hotel and bars, restaurants, shops and a convenience store are within a 5 minutes‚Äô walk.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming so far to visit us and thank you for taking the time to leave a review.  'Cookies in reception each afternoon a highlight'? Me too! I own the hotel and still get excited by that! So glad that you got to enjoy so many of our amenities and that while you were here you felt welcomed and safe. Hope we get to see you again one day!

Summary: Me and a couple of my best friends booked a room here months ago and when we went to check in they turned us away because we were not 25 years old. When booking this room we all looked at the website and no where did it say on the website or on the confirmation that we had to be a certain age to stay at this hotel. The man running the front desk said "you must have slipped through the system" and to "sleep on the beach for all I care". He had no sympathy for us and was not helpful at all. I understand hotel age requirements and would have respected them if we had known about it prior to driving 7 hours to this hotel, but the fact that we were uninformed and then treated so harshly was so unprofessional and disrespectful. Because of this situation me and my friends had to find
Manager Response: I'm sorry, but we are not a party hotel and in checking the reservations for the 3 rooms which your group of young ladies booked, I see that your reservation was made through our website which simply will not allow a reservation to be completed without accepting the terms and conditions which clearly state "I certify that I am at least 25 years of age, which is the hotel's minimum age for guests without parental supervision in attendance."  When your group was attempting to check in, the IDs presented were for ages of only 18-19, with no adult over 25 in attendance.  This age policy is also stated in our listings with the online travel agencies, so there shouldn't be any question about it.   Regarding the veracity of your statements about other actions and comments by my staff, I will leave it to Trip Advisor's readers to form their own opinions based on the hundreds of other online reviews praising our friendly, helpful and efficient guest service.

Summary Heading: It just doesn't get any better in this area unless you are filty rich!
Summary: this is a great venue, right across from the beach, not glitzy, rather, well kept, clean and friendly.  If you are a 20 something looking to party this isn't the place for you. If you are a couple or young family looking to really have a safe and secure place for a vacation or special weekend, then this is the place.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for commenting on our atmosphere and vibe.  Small and friendly, we are delighted when we can provide a home away from home for families and for those looking for great value.  Hope we get to enjoy your company again!

Summary: If you are wanting to stay at a cute, little hotel that covers all the little things, then this is the place for you.  My husband and I try to stay here every year. The people that work here are super nice and very helpful! We have stayed here too many nights to count, and the staff always goes above and beyond to provide customer service that really stands out.  They are located right across the street from the beach, and there is a marina/beach area right behind the hotel. The hotel provides beach chairs, sand toys, boogie boards, towels and everything you need for the beach at NO charge. You can watch the sunset from the roof deck.  They provide FREE parking. Complimentary breakfast buffet. Yummy, fresh baked cookies all day. FREE movies to check out from the lobby. Fruit and
Manager Response: We love all of our guests but we particularly those like yourselves whose company we get to enjoy time and time again.  Thank you so much for making us part of your annual vacation and for taking the time to write such a nice review.  See you again next year!

Summary: During our 2 week stay in the US, this was the friendliest hotel by far. On arrival we were greated warmly and told about all the great extras the hotel offers. Not only does it offer free beach equipment, towels and body boards it also has daily yummy freshly baked cookies! The rooms were fairly basic but homely with everything you need including air conditioning. Each morning and night the beds were made and a chocolate was placed on the pillow, another lovely touch. The included breakfast was also another surprise, with freshly baked croissants, toast, sausage and bacon rolls, fruit and yogurt. The location is superb, you can see the sea from the hotels roof top terrace and the amazing Newport beach is metres away. If I had to be super critical my only 2 negatives would be
Manager Response: Thank you for making us part of your trip while you were Stateside and for writing such a positive review. I appreciate you mentioning the complimentary breakfast and the rooftop view and I've made a note to look into the power of the hairdryers in the rooms.  Sounds like we might need to at least retire the one you had in your room. Hope we see you again if you ever come back this way!

Summary: Warren greeted us at the front door, very nice and you can tell how proud he is of bay shores. This is not a luxurious hotel but if you want cozy and feel welcomed this is the place for you. The beach is nearby and they let you rent bikes and beach chairs. The continental breakfast wasn't too bad. My husband appreciated the wave and water report they post along with surfer pictures in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay and for mentioning the wave and weather report.  Our guests like that feature and, as Newport Beach is 'all about the water', we can see why!  Hope you come back soon, thank you again for your kind words.

Summary: My husband and I stayed at this hotel last week for 3 nights.  When we arrived we were pleasantly surprised!  The hotel is tastefully done and very cozy.  Ralph, Paul and Warren were so welcoming and accommodating and couldn't do enough for their guests.  The rooms were very clean and had all amenities necessary, even a refrigerator and safe were tucked away in the closet.  Our room was the "Enterprise" on the 3rd floor.  We were upgraded to a king room (another unexpected surprise)!  The hotel offered a continental breakfast each morning and best of all, there was no need to bring beach towels, chairs or umbrellas.  The hotel supplied all at no additional charge.  There also was no parking fee, another plus.  The beach was steps away from the hotel (120 steps) once you crossed
Manager Response: Thank you so much for coming to stay with us and for taking the time to leave your review.  Thank you for mentioning the proximity to the beach; just a short walk across to 18th Street and the Pacific Ocean is right there. Hope we get to enjoy your company again soon!

Summary Heading: It's the little things that stand out
Summary: What an amazing find! I'll add my twopence worth to what others have said.  The service and little touches are amazing it really feels home from home - no rules like some hotels!  It's right on the beach and a short walk to restaurants around Newport pier. Parking is free and if their car park is full there is a public car park across the way which they will pay for you.  A wide selection breakfast is included in the cost, as is free wifi and beach equipment (towels, toys, chairs, boogie boards etc). They have a wide selection DVD library which is also free.  We had our bed turned down and chocolates placed on our bed each night.  They were very welcoming bad accommodating of our 5 month old daughter although we had to bring our own pack and play as they don't have these.  They
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for the great suggestion of a 'pack and play'.  We are constantly on the look out for even more ways to make our guests stay pleasurable and that is a great idea!  I hope your return journey was safe and uneventful - hope to see you back here one day.

Summary: I have stayed there numerous times over the last 5 years both when business took me to Orange County or when family obligations did the same thing. This is a memorable location and the rooms were well appointed and very clean. The staff was very accomodating and the make your own breakfast fixins were great. Oh yeah, did I mention the chocolate chip cookies on arrival. Parking can be a bit of a challenge in the middle of summer, I imagine, but when have been there it is totally workable.
Manager Response: First of all 'thank you' for being a repeat guest - you are a real treasure!  Also thank you for mentioning the amenities and the cleanliness. And lastly thank you for mentioning the parking because it gives me another opportunity to let all our future guests know that if our parking lot is full, just swing across the street to the municipal lot, let our staff know, and they will gladly feed the meter for you for the duration of your stay! Hope we see you again soon

Summary: This hotel really exemplifies what customer service is all about.  They are super friendly and accommodating and they have so many perks for their guests. Free wifi, cookies, breakfast, parking, movie rentals, the works! The price is reasonable and the location is FANTASTIC!!! They are right in between the bay and the ocean which is perfect and they are walking distance to the bars and restaurants. They have a rooftop area with tables & chairs with views of the bay and ocean. We sat up there at night with a glass of wine and again in the morning for breakfast. Lots of flowers up there also. Just BEAUTIFUL. I cannot wait to stay at this hotel again.  It has been a couple weeks now since our trip and I just got a postcard in the mail handwritten by the staff member we spoke with
Manager Response: Yes, please do bring your little one next time.  Originally my kids, and now my grandkids, all love it here!  Thank you for your kind comments, we look forward to you coming back soon.

Summary: No complaints! Friendly staff, nice clean rooms. Short walk to the boardwalk and beach. Sun deck on roof. They loan beach chairs and umbrellas.  Nice amenities! Very pleasant stay! On a busy street but traffic noise was not a problem, and I don't like noisy places. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Funky and quaint, - I love it! I think we'll add that to our 'vintage vibe' tagline!  So glad you had a lovely stay, thank you for posting your review.

Summary Heading: Why this place is a stand-out in Newport Beach-area
Summary: Bay Shores is a stand-out in Newport Beach, and a stand-out in the whole area around Newport.  No other property has its home-like features, and friendly, comfortable, and helpful service !  -The reception area has service at the desk 24/7 -- not just someone behind a counter, but people who know the area and are happy to help with whatever residents need in directions or amenities for their stay.  -The rooms are designed for what people actually *want/need*:  plenty of lighting, a  mini-frig, small safe, and perhaps most notably, bathroom facilities that contain shelves for towels, extra shelves for storage of items, and even a shelf under the mirror, above the sink.  Rooms are on the small-side, but they are well-designed - and *comfortable.*  -Complimentary breakfast is
Manager Response: Thank you so much for posting your extensive review and for kindly mentioning so many of our amenities that had caught your eye and that you had enjoyed. My staff take a huge amount of pride in the hotel and it is wonderful to have your comments to share with them.  I hope we will have the pleasure of your company again one day, in the meantime, safe travels.

Summary: My mom and I went to this hotel because we were traveling impromptu needed a place to stay but we just happened to notice it out of the corner of our eye. We stopped and we were glad we did!  Room was awesome-very plush, wonderful and clean. Our room opened to a beautiful courtyard with a flowering, fragrant hibiscus. At the end of the day in the upstairs balcony rooftop we watched the sunset while we look out over the peninsula. Very nice staff and hard working maid service.  We had one bdrm downstairs in courtyard. The old timey elevator is in good condition though so we didn't have to walk up any stairs. The Blue Beet is one of the oldest bars in Newport-a must see.
Manager Response: Firstly, thank you so much for the review and secondly for coming so far to stay with us! I really appreciate your comments and hope that when your down this way again, we'll have the pleasure of your company.

Summary Heading: This was our 4th or 5th stay here
Summary: This was our 4th or 5th stay here. We love it. We come here once a year to watch baseball at Angels Stadium, but of course also take in the beach, Balboa Island, etc. We love the casual atmosphere and furnishings of this place. Beds are comfortable and rooms are clean. It is so close to so many things: the beach and harbor, good restaurants, cute shops, a small Whole Foods at Fashion Island. Ralph, Bruce,Warren and the rest of the staff are pleasant and helpful.
Manager Response: Hope the Angels performed as well for you as it seems our great staff did!  Thank you for the lovely review.  Hope we get to have your company for many more baseball seasons to come!

Summary Heading: 2nd time and not the last one
Summary: We stayed here for the second time. I must say nothing has changed since last year. Same nice staff, comfy rooms....and well the location...you can't beat that. We flew all the way from europe to stay here for a week. Hopefully we will be back next year. What a relaxing holiday! Thanks to the team of the Bay Shores Pensinsula
Manager Response: Vielen Dank f√ºr Ihre Bewertung. Wir lieben unsere Besucher aus Europa! Wir hoffen, Sie hatten eine gute Heimreise. Kommen Sie bald wieder!

Summary: This was our second stay at Bay Shores and as we turned off the Boulevard into the car park it really did feel "just like coming home". There's not much more can be said about Bay Shores that hasn't already been posted. Location, staff - all are excellent. We'd headed this way after spending a week in Las Vegas so it was great to be able to borrow a couple of beach towels and relax on the beach with a book after the chaos that is LV. The staff were even kind enough to accept a parcel for me before we'd checked in. Would we stay here again? Without a shadow of doubt. The hotel is so good there was even a Newport Beach resident staying there whilst his home was remodelled. Many thanks to all the staff, including housekeeping, for making our stay as enjoyable as the previous time.
Manager Response: We love our return guests!  Thank you so much for coming back to Bay Shores and for taking the time to post another great review.  Hope to see you again when you're back this way.

Summary: Very quaint beach and surf-related decor, starting with the pleasant office-entry area.  Enjoyed every employee I happened upon (including maids) - all were exceptionally cheerful and helpful.  My room had an interesting very large painting of a surfer.  There was plenty of drawer and closet space. The bathroom was clean and fresh, with nice wallpaper and light fixtures, and a magnifying mirror.  Loved the cabinets below the sink- great storage space. Turn down service with a little chocolate at night. Bottles of water and a fruit bowl were kept stocked in the room. The refrigerator was small, with no freezer section, but totally adequate for me. Cookies are set out in the lobby each afternoon. The breakfast area has a nice selection of muffins, croissants, toast, bagel
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review and for coming to stay with us.  We always appreciate it when guests are able to enjoy all that we have on offer - if you can think of anything else that we might provide for everyone's enjoyment, I'd love to hear.  Thanks again and hopefully see you again see the next time you come down the coast.

Summary: We only stayed for one night before a flight from John Wayne but wish we could have stayed for longer. Very pleasant and helpful reception staff and the freshly-baked cookies in reception were delicious! Wish we could have used the sun-deck area but hopefully will be back again to make the most of this. Good location for Newport pier and the beach. We liked the little touches in the room, the make-up wipes in the bathroom, the free water in the fridge and the fact the fridge was actually empty for us to use as we pleased (instead of the usual mini-bar)! Also wish we had time to use the vast collection of DVDs available in reception. Vintage style to the hotel but feels homely and welcoming. Thanks for a great stay and hope we will be back!
Manager Response: ...and we hope you'll be back too!  Thank you for the great review.  Glad that you had time to enjoy a few of our amenities and hope that your return trip to the UK was safe and uneventful.

Summary Heading: Four Fabulous Days on the Beach
Summary: The location for this little gem is perfect! The people make you feel like royalty or owners. Each morning there is a newspaper at your door, coffee and breakfast awaiting you in the lobby, and beach equipment just waiting for you to take it to the beach for a fun filled day.  We had our bikes, so Warren showed us where to lock them for the night. They would have been fine on the bike rack in their free, secure parking.  We walked or biked everywhere we wanted to go. In the afternoon, they bake fresh cookies, yum!  Our son just moved to the area, so we now know where to stay when we go for a visit. Check out the rooftop webcam online, you will be hooked, I was.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great time - Newport Beach is perfect for biking isn't it! Thank you for mentioning the Surfcam; we're loving how much folks are enjoying it while they are here ...and when they get home!  Looking forward to hosting you again when you come back.

Summary Heading: Best Little Hotel in Orange County!
Summary: Just wanted to say thanks for the warm welcome and such a great relaxed atmosphere that made my business trip so enjoyable. After flying in from London and drive from LAX, the Bay Shores was the perfect place to unwind and chill. And what a location!!!!! I made the trip back and forth from the NAMM show at Anaheim every day during my stay and the 40minute drive was well worth it after a day of loud guitars. The hotel and beach gave me the down time I needed to recover my senses. Many thanks to the team for making me feel at home and I will not hesitate to return on my next visit to LA......... YOU GUYS ROCK!!!!!
Manager Response: Thanks for coming back to stay with us again; I remember being able to provide you with a bit of respite from "the loud guitars" before!  So glad you decided to stay in Newport Beach once more; we'll be glad to host you anytime!

Summary: This hotel was exactly what we needed. Our kind of southern California. No fuss, warm people, laid back breakfast, pleasant clean room, easy parking, and best of all, walk across the street to the beautiful beach. No reason to ask for more when hanging out for visiting our relatives. In fact, it had the feel of a bonus romantic adventure.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review and glad we could be 'warm people' for you after the winter you've endured!  Hope your family visit went well and that you'll come and stay again.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel that feels like a B and B
Summary: Outstanding hotel that feels like a bed and breakfest..welcome note on bed, return postcard thanking us for staying; fruit in room, great breakfast selection, two free bottles of water in fridge, wonderful hosts, Ralph and Warren...call you by name, are very helpful rec places to visit. The rooms were perfect and waterviews (I think) from all. As another reviewer wrote, hotel is cute and cozy...vintage feeling and decor (modern amenities)...bed very comfortable. If you want to stay in the heart of Newport Beach this hotel gives you the best price for the location and is well worth it! We booked through Travelosity for a one night stay. Decided to stay a second night and found out their booking rate was the same as Travelosity...however, there is an additional discount for AAA
Manager Response: Thank you for your great and comprehensive review and for mentioning so many of our amenities. I also appreciate you mentioning booking directly with the hotel - when you do that, we can certainly make sure that you get the best room for your needs.  Looking forward to your next stay!

Summary: Great spot near the beach and beach towels and chairs on hand to take down free of charge, fantastic staff, very welcoming - fresh cookies on arrival!!! nice roof terrace where you can enjoy your breakfast. Stayed for a few nights on a road trip down the coast and was the best hotel by far - would def go back - 100% recommended!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for mentioning the staff - they are fantastic aren't they!  I really appreciate your '100% recommended!' rating and am so glad that we could play a welcoming part of your recent road trip.  Hope we get to enjoy your company again!

Summary Heading: Great location but a bit dated
Summary: The Bayshores is ideally set with the beach in front and the peninsula behind, great views from the rooftop terrace.  Hotel is small and a bit pricey.  Breakfast was ok, bit of a squeeze in the small room.  The staff were friendly especially the guys at the front desk.  Bedroom was tiny as was the bathroom.  Wouldn't go back unfortunately.  Newport Beach is beautiful though.  Walk to the pier, take the ferry over to Balboa and see how the other half live!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and for mentioning our great location and friendly customer service. Even though you won't be staying with us, I do hope that you'll come back to enjoy more of Newport Beach.

Summary: I stayed here strictly based on reviews while I was traveling to Newport Beach for business.  The location can't be beat.  I think the hotel is cute and cozy {very vintage} and the staff goes above and beyond.  It was a nice change of pace from the typical corporate hotels!  The personal touch {postcards rec'd after my stay} really make this place stand out.  Can't wait to come back!
Manager Response: As a former business traveler myself, I'd glad that we could give you a break from the 'typical corporate hotel' - it can be a bit of a grind can't it? Can't wait to to have you back - the fresh baked cookies will be waiting!

Summary: We booked for 4 nights because of it's no.1 rating on Trip Advisor, but did not do our research properly didn't like it and checked out after 2 nights. We thought both the men at reception were excellent, the breakfast very good, the room average. What we did not like was that the carpet on the stairs was dirty and smelt. When we looked at the hotel we should have picked up that there was no pool or bar, we like to socialise.  So it was just not for us. We enjoyed the small ferry to Balboa Island which is well worth a visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and sorry for your disappointment. "Small, friendly and with a vintage vibe" sums us up  and I appreciate you mentioning the great service you received at the Front Desk and the complimentary breakfast.  I hope you found somewhere more to your liking for the remaining of your vacation; thank you for taking the time to post your comments.

Summary: When we walked into our room it smelled a little like grandmas house - not in a good way. You know, that old, kindof musty smell. BUT - every other good thing about this hotel out-weighed what a little febreze and opening windows could do. Staff = super friendly.  Fresh cookies everyday. Yes.  Nice continental breakfast.  Fun roof-top sun deck.  Free access to beach toys, DVD library, chocolates on our beds every night, complimentary water bottles in the fridge, free wi-fi. Our room was comfortable, clean, and roomy.  Short walk to the beach. We would stay here again...even if they don't replace the blue carpet.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us and for mentioning our super friendly staff. I'm glad you enjoyed the fresh cookies, the continental breakfast and for mentioning the other amenities.   As for 'the blue carpet', sounds like I need to take a look at that and see what we can do.

Summary Heading: As ever, the place to stay in NB
Summary: Wasn't sure whether I should add another review of the BSP as I've already reviewed it on several previous occasions. Then I thought I'd better, just in case things had gone wrong. Well rest assured every is ok,  normal, the same.  We always stay here when we are in the area, not often enough but that's just the way it is. The BSP is simply our favourite hotel ever. It's small, friendly, well appointed, brilliantly located and the staff are great.  As soon as we arrive we feel "at home". Could really get used to the Newport Beach lifestyle.
