Ok it doesn't look that much, it hasn't even got a pool, if you want to get wet , walk across the street to the Pacific. What is has got is loads of charm and character. Not something you can say about many hotels these days. Just stay there
Manager Response: "doesn't look that much...loads of charm and character" - my wife thought you were describing me! Thank you so much for coming again to stay and for giving us such a lovely review.  We so appreciate our return guests especially when they come from so far away. I hope you'll be able to fit in another trip in one day.  Best wishes to all in the UK!

Summary Heading: The best way to stay in Newport Beach
Summary: We stayed here 3 days on vacation in early March. We spent lots of time reading reviews of various hotels in the area to find one we trusted for our stay and this one won that competition. The rooms are very clean, decorated cute (so my wife says) and modern. The staff is friendly, helpful, nice, accessible, always there and respectful. There is beach equipment for resident's use, movies, breakfast, fresh baked cookies (avoid these unless you can control yourself), free parking, a roof deck with lots of space and the hotel front door is only about 75 steps from the sand. A very good value. If you're reading this review, your homework is done, you've found the hotel you should be staying at, the rest don't compare.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the terrific review!  Glad you got to enjoy so many of our amenities and for mentioning them to others.  Regarding the 'self control' on the cookies, life's too short  - take the stairs and help yourself to another!

Summary: We stayed three nights at the Bay Shore in late February.  The staff was pleasant and accommodating.  Our room (306) had a partial bay view.   You can easily walk to several restaurants.  Our favorites were Blue Water Grill and Caffe Il Farro.  A fun thing to do is to take the little ferry to Balboa Island, which is a charming place to explore.  There is no pool or exercise room or such at the hotel, this is just a basic stay/sleep/have breakfast place, but it works well for those things!  Parking can get tight, but we managed fine each day.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us and for providing great suggestions for local restaurants and sightseeing. Hope we get to enjoy your company again!

Summary: we stayed 6 nights during the "rain" - even so we had a great stay, the hotel is in the best location. perfect for walking to the beach, pier and nearby restaurants and shops. The breakfast was good, much to choose from. Coffee and tea available anytime, fresh baked cookies too! Free wifi and daily newspaper is another nice touch. The rooms were very clean and comfortable, fresh fruit and water daily was another nice feature. All the staff are very friendly and accommodating - I would 100% recommend this hotel and would stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the 100% recommendation and for your great attitude towards the rain - with our statewide drought, we really needed it! I hope you were able to get out and about at least a little while you stayed with us.  Thank you again for the great review and we hope to see you again under sunnier climes.

Summary: Stayed for a week. Great location near the beach and restaurants. Beach style atmosphere and decor. Very friendly staff. Free wifi, afternoon cookies, morning newspaper and beach equipment. Recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming so far to stay with us! I'm glad that you were able to enjoy so many of our amenities.  If you're still traveling, I hope your accommodations are just as nice; if you're  already back in Ireland, I hope you got home safely.  Hope to see you again one day!

Summary Heading: Deserving of the #1 TripAdvisor rating in Newport Beach CA
Summary: From the moment we arrived until we were leaving 4 days later, we felt at home.  We were immediately greeted by Warren and got to know several other staff members over our stay, all  friendly and professional.   The breakfasts were generous and fresh, warm cookies in the evening, rooms immaculately clean, great rooftop patio with a view of the bay and the ocean both only a block away.   There is more to compliment the Bay Shore Peninsula Hotel, but you should just go, stay and discover for yourself!
Manager Response: I love your comment "just go, stay and discover for yourself".  There couldn't be a better recommendation!  Thank you for taking the time to write your review and for mentioning the amenities you enjoyed.  Hope we can enjoy a return visit soon and again, Thanks!

Summary: We had first stayed at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel in '08 and when we arrived 2/26/14 we were hoping that it was as nice as we remembered.  It was even better!  The desk manager "Ralph" was still there with his welcoming smile and cookies!  Our room was beautiful, immaculately clean and well appointed right down to the soothing CD lulling us to sleep.  Breakfast was even better than we remembered.  You can be sure that we won't wait this long to stay there again.  My all-time favorite hotel!!
Manager Response: I am pleased that your memories stayed with you long enough to return and am so glad that we didn't disappoint and in fact exceeded your expectations!  Come back again soon, I am sure that Ralph will be just as delighted as me to be there to welcome you!

Summary: The Bay Shore is an awesome little hotel right across the street from the beach and boardwalk.  We love this place.  They offer you warm chocolate chip cookies when you check in, and a great breakfast selection is also included.  Once you check in, there is no need to drive anywhere.  Everything you need is within walking distance.  The hotel provides you with beach chairs, boogie boards, skim boards, and sand toys for the kids if you want.  There is also a lovely rooftop deck to hang out on and take in the sunshine and the views.  I almost hate to share my favorite beach hotel with anyone else, but they deserve it. Shirley, La Canada CA
Manager Response: That's a tricky one isn't it - when you find something great do you you tell others!  Well, thank you for  sharing, I can assure you that as a small boutique hotel with a vintage vibe, no matter how popular we get, we're never going to change. Now, if we were to win the lottery‚Ä¶!

Summary: We stayed two nights here as part of a road trip along the pacific coast - we had room 307 - the management have made a huge effort to accommodate guests' needs and it makes for a comfortable stay. The bed was good/ everything was spotlessly clean, breakfast perfectly adequate with cereals/pastries/toast/yoghurts/juice etc. There are free DVDs to borrow - beach gear too if you want it - the beach is 5 mins walk away and lovely. My only complaint would be that the hairdryer was hopelessly under-powered! This was the cheapest hotel of our trip [out of 5] and it was definitely the best in terms of feeling valued a clients.
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review.  As I have had less and less personal need for hairdryers (even my barber is charging me less this days - what's up with that?!), I've obviously taken my eye off of this particular amenity.  Thank you for pointing out this deficiency - I'll definitely be looking in to it.  Thanks so much for coming to stay,

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay - Like Visiting Family
Summary: Loved the hotel.  Immediately felt welcomed and during our check-in.  The very clean room we stayed in for two nights had a single queen bed which was sufficient.  We weren't planning on spending much time in the room.  But the room was nice with water and fruit on the tables waiting for us.  Newspapers supplied daily, continental breakfast was very good with a huge selection to choose from. The location is great because you are located right in the middle of the peninsula.  The vantage point from the hotel deck on top of the building affords you beautiful view of the bay on one side (a few power lines here and there) and the ocean on the other.  Great sunrise/sunset advantage. Parking is supplied in the hotel lot or if it's full they will put coin in your meter for you in the
Manager Response: Thank you for your 'hands down' recommendation and for mentioning all of the amenities that you enjoyed.  I am so happy that the weather and 'Cupid' played a part in making it a great vacation!

Summary Heading: Great Mom&Pop feel, service and location
Summary: We just stayed 2 nights in a room with 2 queen beds. Room was spacious and clean. Loved the mom and pop feel. Staff was warm and welcoming. The complementary continental breakfast was a great value, plenty to choose from to start your day. Loved the complementary fruit and water bottles in room. Our room also had a refrigerator which was great. They offer free beach items to use, towels, chairs, etc. as well as free parking. The location is perfect which makes this an expensive hotel but I feel they go to great lengths to offer as much value as they can with the complementary items mentioned. We would stay there again and look forward to our next visit.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review; I am so glad that we were able to make you feel so welcomed!  Small, friendly and with a vintage vibe, it's our pleasure to provide those little extras that make your stay as restful and fun as possible. So glad you're looking forward to your next visit - we are too!

Summary Heading: Best Little Hotel in Orange County
Summary: Just wanted to say thanks for the warm welcome and such a great relaxed atmosphere that made my business trip so enjoyable. After flying in from London and drive from LAX, the Bay Shores was the perfect place to unwind and chill. And what a location!!!!! I made the trip back and forth from the NAMM show at Anaheim every day during my stay and the 40minute drive was well worth it after a day of loud guitars. The hotel and beach gave me the down time I needed to recover my senses. Many thanks to the team for making me feel at home and I will not hesitate to return on my next visit to LA......... YOU GUYS ROCK!!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great review and so pleased that we could provide some daily respite for your ears!  One of my staff members was particularly envious that you were at NAMM - if you made it to the Bonham concert too, then that would just put her over the edge!  Thank you again for the great review and btw, Pompey rocks too!

Summary Heading: Cool little hotel in balboa peninsula Newport
Summary: Really lovely hotel, a stones throw from the beach. A very homely, cosy, quality hotel with a lovely laid back atmosphere. We were a party of 6 .. Irish and Aussie ... Our bedrooms were really comfortable with lovely fluffy towels, Crabtree and Evelyn toiletries, and flat screen tv. Breakfast was an informal buffet style arrangement which suited us really well. Nice rooftop sun deck with good views. We borrowed the hotel beach chairs and umbrella for a trip to the beach. Last but not least, the staff ... They were great and extremely helpful and friendly, so thanks to Warren, Ralph, Bruce and all the team.
Manager Response: Thank you for the compliments on our hospitality - high praise indeed from two countries (Ireland and Australia) famed for their friendly and open natures!  So glad you could come and stay with us and enjoy our amenities; I hope your party gets together again and that you come and enjoy Newport Beach again at Bay Shores!

Summary: This hotel is an incredible find only one block from the Newport Beach boardwalk and the sand. My wife accompanied me on a business trip so we decided to stay at the beach.  The Bay Shores Peninsula is a wonderful family-owned beach hotel.  Warren, Ralph and team are awesome and will do anything they can to make your stay enjoyable.  I went to work during the day and my wife was all over Newport Beach.  I can't say enough good things about this hotel...and I've stayed at the Ritz Dana Point, Fairmont and other high end hotels.  Its great to see people like Warren operating a wonderful little hotel on Newport Beach.  My wife and I will definitely come back to this hotel.  P.S. homemade cookies at 3:00 everyday are awesome.
Manager Response: I am so thrilled you both had a great time. When I was traveling a lot for business, I loved it when my wife could come along and we could make a mini-break out of what might have been a lonely and tedious road trip. Thanks for mentioning the location and how convenient we are for the beach and for giving the staff a special shout out; I'll be sure to pass your compliments on.  Again thanks, and see you again soon.

Summary: Comfortable and the great ambiance of traditional California beach town. Great surfing art and wooden models of old Woodies with surf boards on top array the small lobby. Not big or luxurious but customer service is fantastic.. Staff are friendly, helpful and well informed. I much prefer this to a sterile chain hotel.  Close to everything in Newport Beach. A great get away.
Manager Response: Thank you, you captured our vibe perfectly!  So glad you had a great stay and that we were able to provide 'vintage' service. John Severson is the creative force behind the room art; just check our website for more info on this very talented painter.  Again, thanks for the review and hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Awesome Small Hotel with Terrific Special Touches
Summary: We stayed 6 nights at this fantastic hotel filled with tons of extra special touches-from the friendly and informative staff to the daily warm cookies, the nice touch of turn down service with delicious chocolates,  morning breakfast,  quality Evelyn and Crabtree toiletries, clean room with comfortable bedding, nice thick towels, large flat screen TV mounted on the wall, granite counter tops in the kitchen and tiled entryway. This small hotel was in a terrific location within walking distance to delicious restaurants, only a block from the ocean on one side and bay on the other. Knowledgeable and friendly staff with great recommendations on things to do and places to eat. If you forgot something, they will provide it. They have a nice open air roof top patio with comfortable
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us and for taking the time to write a review.  We take a lot of pride in seeking out little luxuries for our guests and so I'm so pleased you noticed all our efforts from the soap to the cookies! I'll be passing on your compliments to all the staff; again thanks for the review.

Summary Heading: Great staff in this great hotel
Summary: We stayed here for 2 nights between Jan 2-4 to attend a nearby wedding. From check in to check out, the staff was great and so accommodating even if we weren't in the room too much. We appreciated the fresh afternoon cookies, being able to borrow things to take to the beach, and letting our friends use some of the hotel's amenities too. The staff are long time employees who really seem to know the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your celebrations; our congratulations to the happy couple! I appreciate you mentioning tour experienced and knowledgeable staff; many of our employees have been with the hotel for over ten years and some in fact, over twenty! I hope when you come to stay again, you'll have more time to enjoy our other amenities until then, thanks again for the review.

Summary: Bay Shore Hotel is for those who appreciate comfortable surroundings, a great location(two blocks to the beach) and wonderful service. Everyone we encountered was friendly, informative and extremely helpful. We were made to feel welcome immediately and even though we arrived early, the room was ready for us. Our room felt like a California bungalow. Whoever decorated knows how to develop a theme, which in our case was Southern California Surfer with just the right amount of class, like the surfer boy wall paper in the bathroom with real orchid flowers above the sink. After a late night out, it was wonderful to have the bed turned down for us, with chocolates on the pillow, and a soothing CD playing. Peanut butter cookies were always available and breakfast has wonderful
Manager Response: Thank you for your wonderful review - I wish I could take credit for the decor and 'all the little things' you mentioned but as with everything else great in my life, that's my wife! Joking apart, everyone at Bay Shores takes great pride in making the hotel feel like a home away from home and nothing gives us greater pleasure than in the provision of small, thoughtful extras. Hoping you'll come and stay again soon!

Summary: This was an amazing hotel, could not have asked for more. The staff were incredible and did everything to make our stay perfect. There were lots and lots of little things that made this stay so special such as the beautiful roof top terrace where on one side you could see the harbour and the other side beach. The hotel also provides an amazing breakfast, free warm mid afternoon cookies, lots of free beach equipment inc boogie boards, deck chairs, umbrellas.  It is in great location only one road away from the beach, near all the restaurants and the pier.
Manager Response: Thank you for providing our first review of 2014 - Happy New Year to you all in the UK!   We very much appreciate you coming so far and staying with us and for describing us as "amazing" !  I hope you had a safe return journey home; when you're ready to come back, the sun, the sand and the cookies will be waiting and we'll be delighted to host you again!

Summary Heading: Pretty Good Choice Close to the Beach
Summary: I needed to find a room near Hoag Hospital for a business meeting the following day. I usually stay at the Holiday Inn Express on Coast Highway, but they didn't have any rooms available on such short notice. Based on the glowing reviews I saw on TripAdvisor, I decided to give Bay Shores a try.   The location can't be beat, given the proximity to the beach and all the nearby restaurants within a few blocks walking distance (e.g. Akropolis, Crab Cooker, Old Spaghetti Factory, etc.). Parking at the hotel itself is a little limited, but they will give you a pass to use at the lot across the street if you need to. The lobby is really cool with lighthouses and other nautical decorative touches. The person at the front desk was very friendly and gave me a room--I think it was called
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such an expansive review - the comments of seasoned travelers such as yourself are always most welcome.  I appreciate your observations on decor and space - we do bill ourselves as  "small, friendly and with a vintage vibe", -  but apologize for the non operative hairdryer which isn't part of our vibe at all !  What we lacked in size and luxury I hope we more than compensated for with genuine hospitality and look forward to hosting you again the next time you find yourself in Newport Beach.

Summary: This place was a wonderful place to stay. The staff are so friendly and helpful that we felt at home immediately. Rooms are lovely, cookies add the final touch. Wireless internet was great. We had all our questions answered with lots of recommendations for things to do. We could easily have stayed a week.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review - I'm so glad that we could make you feel right at home!  Looking forward to you coming for a whole week next time; the cookies will be waiting!

Summary: My wife celebrated her 60th birthday on the 16th of Dec, so we decided to stay at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel and go on a boat tour at night.  The Hotel is located a very short walk from the beach and has 3 floors.  We stayed on the second floor.  The room was very cozy, just the right size for the two of us.  Not a lot of parking, but there is a lot right next door.  The hotel is very charming with a beautiful little lobby and old fashioned elevator.  Warren, the owner was very friendly and answered our questions thoroughly.  The bed was very comfortable, the bathroom nice and the shower pressure was strong, which is not always the case when we are away from home.  The window in the room opens which was nice with the weather being so mild.  There is a rooftop sundeck where
Manager Response: Firstly, congratulations to your wife on her 60th birthday and thank you for coming to spend such a special event with us!  I  appreciate you mentioning little details like water pressure, cleanliness and bed comfort to your fellow travelers because those things can make all difference between a good stay, and a great stay.  We of course aim to make every guests stay the best that it can be, so if you think of any other little extras we might provide, please don't hesitate to let me know.

Summary: This is the perfect hotel for a family vacation. They have everything you need to enjoy the beach, chairs, towels, and even toys for the kids. It's a little pricy, but well worth it. I love the fresh bagels in the morning and cookies every afternoon. The staff is so accommodating, and all the rooms are clean and fresh. It's just the perfect place to stay for a beach vacation. Plus everything you need for your stay is within walking distance so you can park your car and not have to worry about driving at all the whole time you're here!
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to stay with us and for taking the time to write such a nice review. I'm so glad that you found everything to your liking and that your children were able to enjoy the beach toys.  I'll share your sentiments with my staff; they will be thrilled that you noticed their high level of service. Come back soon!

Summary: Stayed here for 5 nights and enjoyed every minute. Rooms are very clean and fresh with everything you need and are cleaned every day. They have a breakfast room where you help yourself . The hotel is very close to the beach on one side and the harbour on the other. There are bars and restaurants within a short walk .  The hotel staff are great special shout out to Warren who recommended restaurants to us and also gave us a voucher for a free dessert and will help with anything. They have chairs and boogie boards for you to take to the beach if you want to.  Newport beach is great not crowded at all and has a good relaxed atmosphere Balboa island is also very nice .They also have a rooftop terrace where you can watch the sunset.  Cannot recommend this hotel enough would go back
Manager Response: We're all so glad you had a wonderful time during your recent stay with us. Thank you for mentioning the amenities you enjoyed (boogie boards, roof top lounge etc) so that other visitors can enjoy them too. I hope you had a safe journey home and very much look forward to you coming back to see us one day soon.

Summary Heading: Perfect place for a trip to Newport Beach
Summary: The Bay Shores Peninsula is a fantastic boutique hotel based in a perfect place to enjoy the beach or explore Newport. The room is comfy and has everything you could want and the breakfast ensures you are fully fed for the day ahead. The thing that really stands out most of all though is the friendliness of the stay and their determination to ensure you have a great stay. They really care about their guests. This place is extremely good value for money and comes highly recommended.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing the Bay Shores Peninsula as providing "everything you could want"!  We are just delighted to have made your stay a delight and hope that the next time you cross the Atlantic, you'll give us the opportunity to welcome you again.

Summary: My Husband and I love to travel and when we get fantastic customer service we love to tell about it!  The Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel far surpassed our expectations.  We found it on line and booked it due to its close proximity to the beach.  We were overwhelmed by the customer service! Warren made us feel right at home as soon as we arrived. The room had a "Beach House" feel and you cross the street and you are at Newport Beach! We watched a couple of movies in our room (current blockbusters), got beach chairs and whatever else we needed just by signing our signature with a promise to return them.  No hidden charges! The breakfast was great and sitting up on the balcony was lovely.  You can see the harbor on one side and the ocean on the other.They even have fresh cookies every
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review.  I am so glad that you were able to come and stay with us so we could extend the Bay Shores signature hospitality to you. I too look forward to you coming back ...the fresh baked cookies will be waiting!

Summary: Stayed in So Cal in various locations for 2 weeks and this was undoubtably the best by a mile! Welcoming staff, beautiful room, lovely breakfast, parking taken care of, the loan of beach equip if required, rooftop terrace, cookies to die for..... we extended our stay by an extra night and Warren and the team could not have made us feel more welcome. On our arrival back in the UK there was a lovely postcard from Warren, what a nice personal touch. Will definately go again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for coming all the way from Lancashire to visit us - one of my favorite counties in England! I am so glad that we were able to extend the same hospitality to you that I have experienced when I've been in your part of the world.  Come again soon - and when you do, could you bring some of that wonderful Hotpot in your suitcase!

Summary: Stayed here for a few days early November. Location is awesome, staff are all very nice. We stayed in the Bay Suite, 2 bdr, 2 bath. We liked it for the space, private terrace, fireplace for chilly evenings. Did not use the kitchen except for the fridge, there is no dishwasher if that matters to you. The rooms are older, so the bathrooms are quite small, with no counter space, at least in our suite. The beds are comfortable, but wish they had duvets instead of blankets and bedspreads. Was very clean, could even see the vacuum marks on the carpet after they cleaned:) but it would be nice if they perhaps updated the furniture abit. Overall, very nice quiet place to stay. No amenities, so if you need a pool etc, then this is not the place for you. Must admit, we did wish it had a
Manager Response: Glad you enjoyed your stay in The Bay Suite; when I have the whole gang down, that's where we stay as a family too - we love the fireplace as well! I appreciate your observations about some of the hotel appointments being a little bit older, your recognition of the friendliness of the staff and the cleanliness of the property.  You've captured us perfectly - small, friendly and with a vintage vibe! I've also noted your comment on duvets - they are in a lot of hotel properties now and I'll definitely look into it.  Thank you for taking the time to write the review and we look forward to you coming again.

Summary: We don't stay in hotels because we want to enjoy what the hotel has to offer.  We stay in hotels so we can take advantage of everything nearby.  It's nice when the hotel offers unique options like a rooftop deck to view the Pacific and the bay, where you can watch surfers, see the local marinas and enjoy a meal or beverage, just like you were on your own porch.  It's also very nice when the hotel offers rooms that are stylishly diverse, clean and comfortable.  I like a room where you can sleep with the windows open.  That's what we found at the Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel.  Friendly, helpful staff, too.  Need directions, they will tell you how to get there and provide a free map.  Want to talk, they are happy to oblige you in conversation.    Breakfast is included with the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for the nice compliments regarding the staff.  I'm sorry if you only found high sugar options for breakfast during your stay as we regularly provide a wide range of options to include fresh fruit, hard boiled eggs, yoghurt and low sugar cereals.  I will definitely review the menu though to make sure that everything we are providing is of the highest quality so our guests have the very best start to their day. Thank you again for your review and I look forward to your return visit!

Summary: Stayed on recommendation of friends who had visited twice before. You almost don't want to advertise this hotel in case it gets so booked up you cant get in! Such a great place with wonderful staff, cute rooms and home made cookies. Yards from the amazing beach one way and the same to the sandy banked estuary the other.. location is brilliant. Its on a main road but we had no problem with the traffic noise and slept well every night.The room itself was really well maintained and an average size. Turn down at night was a lovely touch with a chocolate on the pillow!!  The bathroom was decorated with "surfer" wallpaper in a pastel yellow.. and there was a good supply of La Source toiletries. Clean thick towels and a good shower.super clean every day!  The roof terrace is great for
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a comprehensive (and dare I say, glowing!) review. We all really appreciate the kind words of praise along with pointing out all the amenities you enjoyed,  so others can enjoy them too.  Come back soon; no matter how many great reviews are written about us, I am sure we'll still be able to find a great room for you!

Summary: What a gem. Located across the street from the beach and a walkway to the bike path, this classic small hotel provides just the right home for a visit to Newport Beach. Super friendly staff, ample breakfast options, cookies in the evening and a powerful shower will get you value for your cost. While not, by any means, luxurious, this hotel makes up for the lack of polish with character and comfort. There is a certain soulfulness to this hotel. Amenities like beach towels, boogie boards, beach toys and chairs help make your stay both comfy and fun. Start the day off right with some boogie boarding in the surf.  Close to all Balboa Peninsula attractions.
Manager Response: Small friendly and with a vintage vibe, that's us! I am so glad you enjoyed the ambiance of our little hotel and that you took the time to write such a lovely review. Come back soon for more cookies and character; again thanks!

Summary Heading: Honest, detailed stay - skeptical about this hotel? So was I
Summary: In my review searching of hotels on Tripadvisor it is almost a phenomenon to come across a hotel with 95% "Excellent" reviews.  Surely, they must be fake or the hotel has cash in the room for you, but honestly this was a great bed and breakfast with a super awesome location.  I can honestly say I would not rate it "Excellent" as this is a bed and breakfast, not a hotel - this is where the disconnect starts for me as I think it should be under B&B reviews and not hotels, but front the staff to the amenities are just awesome.  The hotels location is less than a block from the beach, while not on the beach directly - it is a walk across the street (Busier street) and then you are smack in the middle of it.  Being off the beach a bit gives it a little more privacy.    The looks of
Manager Response: Thank you for your extensive review; I know potential guests will find your attention to all of our amenities really useful. Thank you for saying that all the staff were awesome; they will certainly appreciate the comments as they take real pride in their work.  Looking forward to hosting you again.

Summary: I am so very excited to be coming for another visit over Thanksgiving. This is positively my favorite place to stay in Newport Beach (8th or 9th time I believe). Wonderful staff, rooms are very well taken care of, fresh baked cookies in the afternoon and a great breakfast (also free). We just can't get enough of the beach, shops and the fantastic restaurants just a few steps away.
Manager Response: It really does sound like you'll be 'home for the holidays'!  We so look forward to having the pleasure of hosting you again at this special time.  Travel safely on your way to us!

Summary: I stayed at the hotel one night.  It is right on the beach and the beach is wonderful.  It is quiet, relaxed and very friendly.  All extras are free including parking.  Free freshly baked cookies in the lounge after 15.00 hours.  My only reserve is that the rooms are not large.  Perfectly adequate for me on my own but maybe not so much for a couple.  However the bed was big and comfortable.  Staff were all very helpful.  They have a large DVD library which is free for guests, in fact so many attentive details and the roof top terrace is a lovely place to sit and enjoy the view.  There are many restaurants within walking distance.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to our Country and for making Bay Shores part of your journey. I really appreciate your review and for mentioning so many of our amenities. We'd love to have the pleasure of your company if you return this way again, safe travels for the rest of your vacation.

Summary: I booked this hotel after reading other reviews and it lived up to the expectations.  Very helpful & friendly staff, clean & well appointed rooms, excellent location to the beach and restaurants, free beach chairs & toys, free breakfast, free parking and best of all is the wonderful customer service (greeting card on bed, turn down at night & ohhh those cookies).  I would definitely stay and recommend here again. We enjoy smaller hotel venues instead of the mega chains and this one fits the bill.
Manager Response: On behalf of all independent hotel owners everywhere, thank you for being our treasured guest and for choosing the unique experience only a boutique hotel can provide. I so appreciate you taking the time to write your review, I hope you come up the Coast to stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Great location - 75 steps from the ocean and 75 from the Bay!
Summary: As with other reviewers we had a great stay at the hotel, and after having stayed at a 4 Diamond hotel in San Diego before our visit here were a bit apprehensive. Location is excellent - across the beach and bay. Free car parking. Staff were very attentive and helpful. Great buffet breakfast to start the day and we took ours on the sundeck on the 4th floor, with views of both the ocean and bay. A short walk to Newport pier and restuarants and bar - the car did move for the 3 days of our stay. Beach towels, chairs and body boards provided without charge. Will definitely return. Thanks to all for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: On behalf of all the employees, thank you for coming to stay and for posting your review. I really appreciate you mentioning the hotel's proximity to both the bay and the beach and for commenting on the staff. Location and service are the stock in trade at Bay Shores and I am so glad that you found both to your liking. Hope you come back one day to see us again.

Summary Heading: Had a Great Time - Lots of Fun
Summary: Well to start with we really enjoyed staying at the Bay Shores Peninsula hotel. Others have said so many good things so it‚Äôs hard to come up with something different.   One of the most important things to understand is what you‚Äôre looking for in a place to stay. Do you want a spa ‚Äì resort experience with waiter‚Äôs pool side to take your drink order, or a place where you just pour yourself a drink and head up to the roof deck and take in the sunset? Do you want valets or free parking? Do you want to plan a trip to the beach, just walk across the street? Do you want to be able to dine at the hotel or go walking and explore what is available in the neighborhood? We‚Äôve enjoyed staying at both types of facilities; but typically we go with the latter.    Overall the Bay Shores
Manager Response: In all my years as a hotel owner, I don't think we have ever received such an extensive review!! Thank you so much for taking the time (and it must have taken a lot of time!) to provide future guests with such a comprehensive description of your recent experience. From the rooftop to the parking lot you covered it all to include the lovely way you described our elevator, an 'old timer' - now if I could just get such a graceful description applied to me! Again, thanks for the wonderful review; I sincerely hope you come and be our guest again soon.

Summary Heading: I want to stay here again
Summary: I stayed at the hotel with my wife for our honeymoon almost a year ago. We loved the place soooooo much that we still visit their website and see the pictures. The location was great, you can just walk to the beach. The staff is great and the breakfast is yummie. They also give out boards to use for surfing etc. We will come back, this is a promise to the hotel! We cant wait to see you guys again. Rustam
Manager Response: We are so touched that we are part of some of your very special and happy memories! To see new photos, you can also stay in touch with us on Facebook; we'd love to have the pleasure of your company there too. Looking forward to being part of your future happiness!

Summary: My wife and i tried another "little inn" in Newport Beach 1 time and then we came across Bayshores while riding our bikes around. The staff was so greatful to show us a room, and thats all it took, we've been staying there for the last 4 years. Location is awesome, staff is awesome, friendly and very helpful. Great "FREE" breakfast in lobby every day. OH YA -- the Spunkmeyer cookies in the afternoon, MMMMM. Great location to the bars and restuarants by the pier. ( walking distance )  Rooftop is great to hang out and unwind with loved one and bottle of wine. This is our 5star hotel by far. "do not hesitate to stay here" Its not the RITZ, Its BETTER.     Bill and Julie, Mesa AZ.
Manager Response: Dear Bill & Julie: thank you for taking the time to write and for being one of our highly valued and appreciated return guests. Like you, I just love our rooftop lounge so thank you for recommending that to others and for passing on the room tips to other travelers.

Summary: The location is great, accommodations are great, room was clean quiet and very comfortable. We came here based off of other reviews and were not disappointed, the price here was very reasonable for Newport. We usually go to Newport a couple of times a year and we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: So glad you had a great stay and that when you come back you're planning on being our guests again. Thank you for taking the time to let other folks know about us and for being so complimentary.

Summary: Always a great stay. I grew up in Newport, also. I see other natives have left reviews.  In fact, it feels like home away from home. The staff is unfailingly superior. The rooms are very clean. Breakfast is great and healthy. The roof is perfect for a glass of wine to end the day. Walking to great restaurants is easy. (Love the Crab Cooker!) I can't wait to come back. I just wish Gladys, the Jack Russell, could come, too!
Manager Response: I'm sorry we can't accommodate Gladys too; I know that Gus my Weimaraner, who also has to sadly stay home, would love her company - I can just see their opposite sizing complimenting each other perfectly!  Thank you so much for your lovely comments and tips for our future guests.

Summary: Picked this place based solely on Trip Advisor. Very clean for an older property. Excellent customer service. Nice amenities for the beach at no extra cost. Great continental breakfast in the morning, more than just the bagels, yogurt, and fruit most boutique hotels have. The staff really seemed to want to make your stay as pleasant as possible. Walking distance to everything near the Newport Pier. Parking at the property is a little tight. If you want a good view, ask for the third floor.
Manager Response: So glad you came down the Coast to spend some time with us - thank you for the review and the recommendations for future guests. I really appreciate you mentioning our service and amenities as that is what Bay Shores is all about, value and hospitality.  Hope you come to stay again!

Summary: I grew up in Newport Beach and enjoy returning for my high school reunions.  The last three visits we have stayed at the BayShores Peninsula Hotel and it has been great each time.  This is not a luxury hotel but a small boutique hotel, with nicely-decorated surf-themed rooms and a very friendly staff.  The free breakfast is light but all you need, and some food is available all day ( they put fresh-baked cookies out in the afternoon).  The rooms are stocked with fresh fruit and free water in the fridge.  They also provide beach equipment---towels, boogie boards, etc.) and we make good use of that.  the location is just right, a block off the ocean beach and only a half-block from the bay.  The Newport Pier commercial area is A short walk away.  Welike to go and watch the surfers
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such an extensive review. We love our repeat guests and look forward to the next time we can extend our hospitality to you.

Summary Heading: Perfect for a relaxing trip California Style
Summary: What a fantastic find!!  I was a little nervous about the Bay Shore hotel as we typically stay in 4-5 star hotels but our time at Bay Shores was fabulous.  It is very California cool with fantastic ocean/Cali decor.  There is a free breakfast every morning and the staff is fantastic. I would recommend this hotel to anyone!!
Manager Response: Thank you for the wonderful review and thank you for taking a chance on us!  Love to have you back one day - we'll be here ready to offer you a terrific boutique hotel experience.

Summary: Enjoyed a fantastic staycation with my 3 little ones. This really exceeded my expectations! The location was perfect.  The staff did everything to make us feel comfortable and feel welcome.They have all the beach equipment so we didn't need to drag anything with us.The continental breakfast was not the average they have hot sandwiches, fresh fruit, croissants, yogurt, hot and cold cereal and more.The fresh cookies every afternoon is also a sweet touch along with a wide celection of movies was a great way to relax after a long day at the beach.This was by far the best hotel stay we've ever had.
Manager Response: I am so glad that you and your young family had a 'fantastic stayation'; we love hosting our local visitors as well as those from further afield. Sounds like you were able to take advantage of many of our amenities from beach toys to movies - it makes me very pleased to know that the things we have on hand are the items that our guests enjoy. Come stay again soon!

Summary: The greeting was professional and friendly.  I left pleased to have stayed there.    This is an older building, but don‚Äôt let that scare you away.  It is highly maintained and clean.  The location is only one block from the ocean and one block from the bay.  The patio on top of the building gives a great view of both.  Thankfully it is located just a bit past the noisier areas of town.  There is no nickel and diming here.  Beach towels and beach toys are ready for you to use.  The newspaper is placed in from of your door each morning.  If you need to wash something, they provide the soap.  Breakfast had a nice variety of the things you would expect.  This is a class operation.
Manager Response: Thank you the review and for commenting on our value and customer service.  Glad you enjoyed our little extras - we're always happy to receive suggestions on other services we might provide so if you have ideas, please send them along. Next time you're ready to take a break from the Lone Star State, we'll be here ready to welcome you back.

Summary: we stayed two nights at this throw back in time. it may not be much to look at on the outside, but the quality of service and accommodation  take a back seat to no place. from the moment we walked in and were greeted by warren and another gentleman, we were treated like long lost kin. the entire staff was warm, efficient and made our stay one to remember. the 3 p.m. cookies didn't hurt either, nor did the rooftop deck. one small admonition, if you have a room on balboa blvd, don't try to sleep with the window open. between the cars and the drunks across the street, it was very loud. much better to close the windows and turn on the air
Manager Response: Glad we could make your stay one to remember and that you had the chance to enjoy our rooftop deck and fresh baked cookies.  Sorry you had some disturbance from across the street; some things we just can't control :(  On behalf of the staff and myself, thank you for your stay and for taking the time to post this review.

Summary: Right from the minute you walk in the door you are made to feel right at home. It's no wonder this little gem has won some great awards. The rooms are comfortable and nicely decorated. It's an easy walk to the town center and only 75 steps to the beach. The best part is all the extras. Free to guest are boogie boards, bikes, all sorts of beach toys, towels you name it they'll have it. Breakfast is great too and the cookies at 3 are a nice touch. The staff are great too. Warren even sent us a thank you note for staying. Now that's what I call service.
Manager Response: We're very proud of our "little gem" and we're glad we were able to make you feel right at home. Great customer service is our stock in trade so thank you letting potential customers know about your wonderful experience. Hope you come back down the Pacific Coast to see us again soon!

Summary: Just the cutest place ever.  The staff is wonderful and accomodating.  The night front desk guy is as good as it gets when it comes to service.  Although somewhat dated when it comes to the rooms the location and cuteness of the place overwhelms you.  You can walk to restaruants and the beach in 5 minutes.  Speaking of restaurants the best clam chowder i have ever eaten is 2 minutes away at the crab house restaurant down the street.  If you want small and quaint this is your place.
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and for capturing the essence of who we are - small, friendly and with a vintage vibe! Glad you were able to enjoy our local clam chowder; totally agree, absolutely delicious.  Come back soon, we'll all be waiting to give you the same great service.

Summary Heading: Best Place to stay on the Peninsula!
Summary: We love this place! First of all, this adorable small hotel has everything you need for the beach, at no extra charge.  Beach umbrellas, chairs, towels, boogie boards, frisbees and sand toys are all available for you to use.  What a deal and a convenience, for those of us that fly into town with only our clothes! Our room was small but freshly decorated and the bathroom seemed to be recently remodeled. There was everything we needed, coffee maker, mini fridge, a safe, wifi, air-condition, flat screen tv (although we never used it). Each morning they put out a nice light breakfast spread (no charge).  There is fresh coffee and fruit available in the kitchen all day long. Cookies in the lobby at 3:00.   Warren and Ralph in the lobby are wonderfully friendly and extremely helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing to stay with us and for being so appreciative of the little extras we provide.  I'm glad that the staff were able to make your staff enjoyable and that Newport Beach provided so much to enjoy you didn't even need to turn the TV on!  Thank you for the review; we look forward to you coming back soon.

Summary: What a great place. The owner has added these little touches everywhere that just make you feel welcome.You're a block away from the beach, there are free chairs, boogie boards , and umbrellas for guests to use if needed. There was a relaxation CD in the CD player in my room. There was a newspaper delivered in the AM , there are fresh cookies baked in the lobby in the afternoon. Breakfast is included. Restaurants are 5  minutes away. The rooms are cozy.The staff is very friendly and accomodating. There is also free Wi-Fi . I will definitely stay there the next time I am in town.Cant say enough.This owner has style.
Manager Response: Well thank you for saying "the owner has style" but I have to say, I can hear my wife laughing at that one!  I owe a lot to my family in the decorating department and to the whole staff for their ideas on the little extras it gives us a great deal of pleasure to provide. Anyway, I certainly appreciate the comment and thank you for taking the time to leave the review. Hope you're back this way soon.

Summary: This was a great place to stay.  The room was absolutely adorable--decorated like a guest cottage with lovely artful touches, comfy bed, mini-fridge, free wifi and coffee-maker.  The inn is very small and personal.  Feels a little like staying at your great aunt's guest house, but without the great aunt to contend with.  They have a kitchen with fresh fruit, pastries, hard-boiled eggs and other snacks.  Freshly-baked cookies lure people in in the afternoon. The hotel is one crosswalk away from the beach, and they have free towels, chairs, beach toys readily available to borrow.  It is within walking distance of Newport Pier and a crab restaurant that does takeout.  The rooftop lounge is amazingly relaxing--at 4 stories, this might actually be the tallest building in the area,
Manager Response: Thank you for your lovely and comprehensive review. Sounds like you had a wonderful time - whale watching, crab dinner and, perhaps best of all,  no Great Aunt!  Please come back next time you need to beat the heat of Phoenix, we'd love to share your company again.

Summary: We visit this area regularly and we always stay at the bay Shores. It feels like a second home. We are always treated as if we are VIPs. Cookies in the afternoon are a great touch. Staff is super friendly and helpful. Rooms are perfect. Simply can't say enough good about this place.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming to see us again and for leaving such nice comments for future visitors. We're always so pleased to have you to stay - come back soon!

Summary: Fabulous hotel (more like guest house really) between the inlet and the sea on the Balboa peninsula, Newpot Beach. Took my teenage daughter for 8 day trip, and really cannot speak too highly of the hotel. The staff are welcoming and just so helpful all the time. On checking in, my daughter said to me 'there's an ambience about this place I am going to love' & it did not disappoint! No need for a pool, the beach is just over the road and the hotel provides beach towels, chairs, umbrellas and boogie boards. Free wifi (essential for teenagers) and comprehensive selection of dvds should you wish to watch one. Love the informality of the place, even though efficient. The light breakfast was perfect  & we ate ours on the sun terrace every day. All day coffee, fruit and afternoon
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for coming so far to stay with us. As a family hotel, we try to provide a little something for every age group so we're glad that your daughter was able to make good use of the free wifi.  We hope you come to visit again; we'd be delighted to welcome you again.

Summary: Our stay at Bay Shores could not have been better. The staff is super friendly, perfect location to get almost anywhere, free parking, free wifi, great breakfast in their darling little kitchen, they will loan you chairs, umbrellas, beach toys, towels for the day. Fresh cookies everyday at 3pm.  Free DVD rentals, rooftop deck is a wonderful place to sip a beer or wine at sundown. Comfy beds, super clean rooms, charming decor. Great maid service. This place is the best and we can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: I am so glad that you can't wait to come back because nothing would give us greater pleasure than to be able to show you the same hospitality you just enjoyed.  Thank you for sharing your experience with others through your review; we all appreciate your kind words.

Summary Heading: Perfect location for relaxed beach vacation
Summary: I booked here because of the TripAdvisor rating, which is well deserved.  It's a small place so the service is excellent and personal. The room was very comfortable with so many extra touches to make you feel looked after.  Perfect location for the beach, restaurants and shops around the Newport Pier, and a great base to explore other  beaches and the malls.
Manager Response: I booked here because of the TripAdvisor rating, which is well deserved.  It's a small place so the service is excellent and personal. The room was very comfortable with so many extra touches to make you feel looked after.  Perfect location for the beach, restaurants and shops around the Newport Pier, and a great base to explore other beaches and the malls.   Thank you for coming to stay with us and thank you for mentioning our service. For us, it is our top priority so I am so glad we were able to meet, and perhaps exceed your expectations. I hope we'll see you again one day; thank you for taking the time to write your review.

Summary Heading: the best place in newport to stay!
Summary: My husband and I stayed her last March and this past weekend. We wont stay anywhere else when in the area. So many pros about this place..location, free parking, clean rooms, friendly staff, great breakfast, beach equipment/towels, dvds, refridgerator, clean bathrooms, nice decor, seating on the rooftop, great views!! Believe all the good reviews with why this the th #1 place to stay when in Newport Beach!
Manager Response: Thank you for the review and thank you being a return guest! I really appreciate you mentioning all of the amenities it is our pleasure to provide for great guests like you, I hope we see you again really soon.

Summary: Every time I am visiting my family in SoCal, I stay at the Bay Shores. Rooms are vintage in flavor, but clean and in beautiful condition. The staff makes you feel like family and you are inches from the beach. I will never stay anywhere else. Nancy G
Manager Response: We just love all of our return guests and nothing makes us happier than knowing we have made someone feel at home.  The next time you come to SoCal to visit your real family, your Bay Shores family will be happy to host you again!

Summary: We like the friendliness of the staff and the place was real clean and that is a plus for us.  When we got to our room there was a welcoming card on the bed.  fresh hot cookies every day at 3pm.  We will be going back again.  No pool but a block from the beach so it makes up for it.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, I am glad you found us to be friendly and welcoming. All my staff are dedicated to providing the very best in hospitality so we all look forward to you coming back again!

Summary: We found this place online and decided to stay for our anniversary.  We each have (corporate) hospitality background and are Starwood members. Bay Shores blow us away!  No hidden fees, genuinely friendly staff and our favorite, practically everything was included in the price. One very reasonable price includes the room, parking, bottled water, fresh fruit, full breakfast, movie rentals, beach towels, boogie boards, beach umbrellas and fresh baked cookies in the afternoon!  We already booked for next year and want to bring our family because it was completely affordable. We will recommend this little slice of heaven to everyone who will listen to us!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and for already booking for next year!  We're looking forward to showing the same hospitality to your entire family when you return, in the meantime, with your extensive experience, if you can think of any other amenities you have enjoyed while staying at other hotels that could work well at Bay Shores, please don't hesitate to let me know.

Summary: We stayed at the Bay Shores Hotel on our recent trip to California.  Since I haven't been back to this area of California in over 40 years it was like deja vu but not in an unpleasant way.  This place was equipped with all the modern conveniences.  The rooms were spotless and comfortable.  It was nice to be able to walk to the beach and to the many bars and restaurants.  The innkeeper recommended an Italian restaurant for dinner that was very good.  It was apparent that the owners have taken great pride and care in maintaining this property.  They put a lot of thought in making available extra amenities, such as boogie boards, beach towels, cookies, magazines, water in the in-room refrigerator, etc., etc., etc.  There are so many extras such as a magnifying mirror in the
Manager Response: Thank you for your extensive and positive review. It really helps potential guests and so I appreciate you mentioning the many amenities and the small courtesies it is our pleasure to extend. I do hope we'll see you again when you're on the West Coast again!

Summary Heading: Enjoyed this more than Balboa Bay Club
Summary: Two words: rooftop patio!  We live 15 minutes away so we are in Newport all the time.  We've passed by this place without really noticing it. We stayed here three days prior to the Fourth of July and were completely delighted!  Two out of the three nights, we had the beautiful rooftop deck all to ourselves.  You look to one side and you see the harbor and look to the other side and see and hear the ocean.  It's steps away from anywhere you want to be. Rooms are a touch small but not much time was spent there. Everything is very well maintained. Beach equipment is supplied free of charge. Continental breakfast was so much better than expected. Could not recommend this hotel enough!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to write your review. Seeing you are a local, I am thrilled that you picked my hotel for the 4th and that you particularly enjoyed the rooftop patio - I hope you had a great view of the parade and the fireworks!  As you're only 15 minutes away, stop by and say 'Hi' next time you're driving by - you know what time the cookies come out of the oven!

Summary: We couldn't ask for more for the price! This hotel offers amenities found in higher end hotels for a reasonable price. Linens, bath products and turn down service are nice! The hotel is just off the beach and provides complimentary towels and beach toys, boards...etc. We would recommend this hotel to families, those traveling on business or couples looking for a getaway. It has it all! We will be back.
Manager Response: Value and service are our top priorities so I am very glad that both were to your liking. We've just upgraded our line of bath products so I am very pleased that they were worthy of note in your review.  Looking forward to your next visit; thank you for taking the time to write.

Summary: Cannot say enough good things about this hotel. We arrived early after two days in Disneyland and were looking forward to some relaxation. Ralph and Lisa were fantastic! Ralph was able to get us into our room by 1:30 which can be unheard of when checking into hotels.   The room is so cute! I love the nautical beach theme it makes you feel like you are right at home.  The hotel has a free DVD library that carries all the latest and greatest films. Fresh home made chocolate chip cookies are set out every day around 3, take them up to the rooftop sun deck to see the view!   We ate at Charlies Chili and Fly n Fish Oyster Bar and Grill, both were excellent.  If your looking for a fabulous hotel steps from the beach that offers free parking, breakfast, movies, and beach equipment,
Manager Response: Yes, Disneyland can be quite exhausting can't it so I am pleased that my staff was able to get you off your feet early! Thank you for the great review and the restaurant recommendations; that's always useful for other guests. Glad we were able to make you feel right at home - come back soon!

Summary: We stayed for 6 days mid June 2013.  Perfect location, within walking distance to the beach, the bay, the pier, restaurants & shops.  Wonderful room amenities, we loved the fresh fruits & the bed was heavenly (need to find out the brand).  Breakfast had a lot of choices (Didn't have to repeat, yeah!),  great coffee & a great selection of teas.  Loved the rooftop deck!  Thanks for feeding the meter by the way.  We found a new hotel whenever we are in Southern Cal.  We can't wait to come back.
Manager Response: And we can't wait to have you back!  I'm sorry I don't know the brand of bed off the top of my head by I am certain that our General Manager Ralph does and I'll have him drop you a line. I'm glad that you felt well taken care of from the galley kitchen all the way up to the rooftop lounge!  See you next time you're in Southern California!

Summary: We stayed at bay shores for four nights in late May early June.  Wonderful retro motel with ultra modern (great) service.   Good sized room with double glazing.   Very comfortable bed.  Clean, clean and clean.   Breakfast is excellent, as is the access to coffee and tea all day.   The cookies in the afternoon are a nice touch and welcome after a walk to the beach.  Well located for the beach and restaurants.  Also for Balboa Island if you like a walk.  Can't think of any negatives.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review and for mentioning our 'retro vibe'. Our guests have a lot of fun with the 50's/60's surfing theme - we have to thank the artist John Severson for that and his amazing talent. As a walker myself, I'm glad you were able to enjoy the charms of the neighborhood and Balboa Island and that there were fresh cookies to welcome you back after your stroll!

Summary: Extremely clean room, not fancy but just fine. Staff is very personable and helpful. The breakfast was a great treat and offered many items to choose from. I really appreciated the location, just steps from the beach. We felt very comfortable here and would return. thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Bay Shores and Newport Beach for your vacation - I hope the weather was a little kinder than the Midwest has been dealing out to you this year. I am glad that the breakfast gave you a great start to your day and that my staff made you feel welcome and comfortable. I look forward to hosting you when your travels send you this way again; thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We just stayed at the Bay Shore last weekend. When we arrived, we were early - Check in is 3pm and we arrived at 1:30, so we assumed we could leave our bags and walk around until our room was ready. But Ralph called housekeeping to see if any rooms were ready for us. There were some ready; As we were standing in the lobby, he noticed that my husband is rather tall (6'5") and we had only reserved a room with a qureen bed. He said a room with a king bed was available and do we want a free upgrade? Of course we took it and the weekend started off on the right foot. One of the best things about this hotel is that they think of every convenience and do not nickle and dime you for everything. Free water bottles in you room refrigerator. Free fruit in your room, turn down service and
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us; I am so glad that we were able to make your stay enjoyable. It's our pleasure to provide all of the little extras that make for a great getaway and if you can think of anything else that might have added to your enjoyment, please do not hesitate to send us an email.  Hope you'll be back our way again one day - all the little extras will be there waiting!

Summary: This is an old botique hotel. Nothing fancy or modern. Think of it as visiting relatives in Newport Beach.  The staff is great...couldn't be any nicer or willing to assist. The breakfast and free fruit and cookies are a nice touch.  Rooms are dated but spotless. Very clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for thinking of us as 'relatives' - we like to think that everyone who comes to stay becomes part of the Bay Shores Family. Cookies and fruit are our pleasure to provide; hope you come to stay with us again soon.

Summary Heading: Like staying in your best friends guest room
Summary: So we decided to stay overnight in Newport Beach, on our way to Catalina. Booked one night. When we arrived it started  The staff was amazing, checked us in and we went up to our room 304. It was small, but cute. The room is a corner room with windows on two sides. Ocean view, out the front, and the harbor out the other.  Breakfast in the morning, like going into your friends kitchen, and helping yourself.  If your expecting a five star hotel, this isn't for you, if your looking for charm, this is it.  Love the place... Oh, the only downside  The Elevator isn't working.....
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write, I hope you had a great trip to Catalina! I am glad that you found the staff to be 'amazing' and the property charming.  Sorry that the elevator was 'out' during your stay - it was part of our scheduled maintenance plan and we're sorry for any inconvenience that it might have caused.  Hope to see you again if you're back in the area!

Summary: We stayed for 6 nights at the end of May. Our family of six stayed in the two bedroom suite up on the third floor. Bottom line: This was one of the best hotel experiences we have had, and we have traveled extensively staying mostly at 4-5 star resorts. Was this hotel directly on the beach? No. Did this hotel have a pool or hot tub? No. Room service? Nope. So why would I rate this as one of the best hotel experiences we have had?   Service.  Plain and Simple.  Warren, Lisa and all of the staff at this hotel consistently went the extra mile to ensure our comfort in every way possible. For example, Warren cheerfully came up to our suite at least 3-4 times to help us with one of the TV's. Keep this in mind- the elevator was out of service so he was climbing stairs over and over
Manager Response: Thank you so much for highlighting what the hotel has, what is does not and what we do the very best, provide "excellent and courteous service". I am so glad that your family had a wonderful vacation and we all very much look forward to your return!

Summary: My husband and I celebrated our anniversary/mothers day weekend here at the Bay Shores and right from the moment we arrived the folks there made us feel welcome. Our room was a decent size and very comfortable. They have beach equipment you can use on the beach and a movie library for your viewing entertainment. Every afternoon Warren the front desk man would make warm cookies. The breakfast selection was very good and this to was included in our stay. The hotel is a very short walk or bike ride to either the beach or the bay. We brought our bikes and were able to lock them up to a poll in the parking lot. Parking is tight but there is a metered lot across the street for any over flow and the hotel will keep the meter fed if you should have to use it. We never did. There is also
Manager Response: If it's not to late, "Happy Mothers Day" and "Happy Anniversary"! Thank you for choosing to spend these special days with us; I'm so pleased that you had a great vacation. Thank you for taking the time to write such an expansive review alerting others to all the amenities you got to enjoy.  I hope we see you again soon!

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel in a great beach location
Summary: We stayed at this hotel for one night.  We were greeted by a very friendly and helpful staff member that checked us into our room early, which was great.  The hotel is conveniently located within walking distance from the beach (2 minutes) and the peer.  The room was nicely sized, very clean and included all the amenities you would expect. I also received a personalized greeting card on my pillow.  The rate includes free wireless internet and continental breakfast.  Coffee is available all day and cookies are provided at 3:00PM everyday (these were delicious!).  Secure parking is also provided.  When I arrived home after my vacation, I received a personalized post card from the hotel, thanking me for my stay.  This was a nice conclusion to my vacation.
Manager Response: Happy that we could accommodate your early check in and that you noticed and enjoyed our extra touches. Providing the cookies bring us a lot of pleasure so I'm glad that you were able to enjoy them. So pleased that you had a lovely vacation and a safe return home.

Summary Heading: A GREAT FIND ABOUT 77 STEPS FROM THE SAND
Summary: We took a chance and it paid off royally. From the greeting at the front desk to the roof-top viewing and all in-between this is one great, quaint, small hotel. We found ourselves within an easy walk not just of the beach and pier...where we watched whales and dolphins...but to a score of excellent restaurants too. Anything you need to rent is available. Great location, but they do not rest on that factor. They maintain the place with pride and the staff is extremely helpful and attentive. A little better breakfast selection would be nice, but it is ok. The only thing we found weird was that the pillows on the bed appeared to be sized for toddlers. We will return...though we will bring pillows from home. This is about a 6.5 hour drive for us, so we will be back soon.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a chance on us! I'm glad that you found the staff responsive to your needs and that you loved our location.  I'll be checking into your pillow observation to see if our kids pillows have migrated into that room - thank you for bringing it to my attention. Being only 6.5 hours away, we're practically neighbors! Looking forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: All it's cracked up to be
Summary: Stayed here 2 nights in March based on Trip Advisor reviews. it was a great stay for us. First thing that happened was that I showed up with an extra person as my daughter decided to join us at the last minute. Adjustments were made with no problem.  Hotel is in a great location. I woke up early as usual and took my iPad and a provided beach chair down to the beach with a cup of excellent coffee from the breakfast room. When my wife and daughter woke up, we gathered breakfast and headed for the roof with a great view. Bike rental place just a block away and numerous restaurants within walking distance. Didn't use the car till we left. Very clean and nice. Hope I can get back here someday.
Manager Response: The beach and a great cup of coffee is how I like to start my day too! Glad we could adjust to your extra guest needs and that you all enjoyed the rooftop.  I hope you can come back one day too; thank you for the great review.

Summary: Booked this hotel based on Trip Advisor reviews for a one night stay while in Newport Beach on business. Like all the other reviews would have liked to spend several nights at this lovely hotel. The staff were warm and friendly, loved all the little extras, and being so close to the beach at this price was unbelievable for this area!! Definitely lived up to my high expectations and can't wait to come back! Thanks Bridget for the postcard - I definitely enjoyed my stay and it was a pleasure meeting you at check-in as well as your colleagues!
Manager Response: We wish we could have hosted you longer too!  Perhaps next time you'll be here for vacation and we'll be able to share more of our lovely area and more of the hotels amenities. Great tip about the 3rd floor corner room - one of my favorites too! Glad I could provide you with great value for your business budget; travel safely while you're out there on the road.

Summary: The Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel is a great find.  We were celebrating our 33rd anniversary on our way to visit family.  The room was clean and comfortable, cookies were yummy, and turndown with chocolates a treat so rarely offered any more.  Being able to walk to the beach in the morning was a highlight also.  Breakfast was varied and we hated to leave!  We checked out a movie, but were too busy enjoying Newport to watch it, but they have quite a selection along with beach equipment if needed.  The desk clerk gave us a great recommendation for dinner also.  Will definitely come again if in the area.
Manager Response: We always feel special when people choose to spend their special moments with us, so on behalf of everyone at Bay Shores Peninsula Hotel - Happy Anniversary!  Thank you for the lovely review; we look forward to your return.

Summary: We only stayed one night, but, it was really wonderful.  They greeted us with honest smiles and extraordinary friendliness.  They were so helpful with details, all we had to do was ask.  Warm cookies greeted us, too.  The room was clean and had fresh flowers in the bathroom!  Chocolate on our turned down bed at night made me miss my Mom!  We wanted to stay longer but we had to move on.  It was a bit farther to the ocean that we thought.  Still an easy walk but we discovered we are just soooo spoiled in Oregon to such quick and easy access to park and get to the surf.  This was a wonderful sandy beach.  We watched the surfers and could even see them from our room!  Everything in the room worked properly.  Great coffee, cold milk on cereal, and even boiled eggs that were cooked
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review; I'm glad you were able to enjoy all our amenities from the rooftop for the view to the galley kitchen for the boiled eggs! Regarding the parking, I think this might possibly be a misunderstanding as both our onsite and offsite parking are always free but if you could contact me at the hotel, I'd love to personally address your comment. Again, thank you for staying with us, Fred.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in Newport Beach
Summary: We really enjoyed our 2 night stay here. The staff was very friendly and our room was clean and spacious.  Some of the highlights were: -the delicious lemon and chocolate chip cookies! -the location is only a block away from the beach and even closer to the bay -continental breakfast with lots of options, plus coffee available throughout the day -rooftop deck with a great view -free parking -use of the computer in the lobby to print out boarding passes/directions  Wish we could have stayed longer!
Manager Response: I wish you could have stayed longer too - then you could have alerted me to the LEMON and chocolate chip cookies! One of my favorite combinations - the staff must have sneaked those in on my day off! So glad you had a great stay and we look forward to your return. Hope the flight back was good; pleased that the lobby computer was of service to you with the boarding passes.

Summary Heading: Very well located and excellent staff!!
Summary: The Hotel is located in a very strategic point, where you can easily access the beach, the village and the bay. The staff is definitively the best thing the hotel have to offer, they are knowledgeable and welcoming. The rooms are not new, but it is very well maintained and have beautiful surf art works, that gave a special touch to the staying. The roof terrace is a special nice feature of the Hotel, where you can enjoy views and sunsets time. The parking is small, but the hotel will help with the public parking in front. The big problem I found is the noise from the highway, which looks like a common problem along the south California coast. The best option, until the hotel instal special soundproof windows, is asking to stay in a lateral room, which may cost a little more.
Manager Response: Thank you for traveling coast to coast to stay with us! I very much appreciate your compliments about my staff and for mentioning our amenities.  Yes, the traffic can sometimes be noisesome, particularly on busy weekends, and with spring break winding up for us here, it sounds like it was heavy during your stay.  Good tip on asking for an off-street room; they definitely benefit from being on the Bay.

Summary Heading: Location!Location!Location!Amenities - Cookies - StaffWhat a wonderful place!
Summary: A hidden gem! This is what a hotel should be like! They set the bar high for awesome guest experience!  Beach towels Beach toys  Beach chairs! It's all included!!!!!  Awesome cookies after a day on the beach that's 1 block away!!!!  Tons of movies! Free! Included Breakfast is perfect!  Sun deck!!! On roof Everything within walking distance!!!  This will be our new hotel of choice when visiting the beach cities!  Warren is an awesome host!  The gal in the morning 4/27/13 was very informative and great host! Directed us right to whale watching at a great price!  The power went out while we were here but Warren and his staff knew exactly what to do and made sure all the guests were ok and whatever we needed he made it happen ... The power was out for 2 hrs! But it wasn't no big
Manager Response: What can I say? Wow! Thank you for taking the time to write such a comprehensive review. I am sorry that we lost power while you were our guest but glad that our staff training kicked in and we had you covered. Also glad that you had the chance to go whale watching - it is an awesome experience isn't it. Again, thank you and we look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary: What a hidden gem  this place is, didn't think we would find a place like this in America. This place says its a Hotel but the high level of personal interaction and general atmosphere makes it feel more like staying at a 5 Star B&B. The  service is amazing, Ralph and the rest of  the staff were very helpful and friendly. The attention to detail is very high particularly in the rooms where they have thought of everything you need to make your stay comfortable. The Hotel is located  2-3 mins from the beach and towels, boogie boards and even chairs are provided by the Hotel. The view from the rooftop courtyard is amazing. I would definitely stay here again if I am ever back in the US, highly recommend you try it out
Manager Response: So glad you chose to stay with us! I appreciate you noticing the smalls details we provide to make everyone feel as comfortable as possible.  Thank you for coming so far to enjoy or hospitality - come back soon.

Summary: The best hotel in the area for closeness to the beach and surrounding area. It's as simple as that.   one slight negative - I wish that the owners would change the flooring/carpets as particularly around the stairs and doors they look a little shabby.   Always greeted with a smile however and very helpful in every way.
Manager Response: Thank you for your visit - we always enjoy greeting returning friends! I've noted your comment about the carpets and I'll be taking a walk through of the whole property to see where we are on our scheduled maintenance.  Looking forward to you coming back; btw, love The Midlands - Worcester Cathedral is a favorite!

Summary Heading: Great value for money and authentic atmosphere
Summary: We stayed as a mixed group for a conference in Anaheim seeking a non-business style hotel.  Loved the convenience for walk to beach and dining.  Easy access for quick trip to Fashion Island after work.  Staff was delightful and helpful.  Will definitely return if in the area.  Fresh cookies a bonus!!
Manager Response: Vi √§lskar v√§rd v√•ra internationella resen√§rer! Tack f√∂r era kommentarer, glad att du gillade butikerna. Vi ser fram emot din retur.
